en-mt: For example, white blood cell deficiency status < 4×109/L including lymphocyte population < 1×109/L and elevated levels of aspartate aminotransferase and viremia were found in 1,099 COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: The levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin were increased in the blood of some patients, and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte sedimentation were increased in the blood of most patients.
targetString: Viwango vya enzaimu za ini na misuli na myoglobin viliongezeka kwenye damu ya baadhi ya wagonjwa na protini ya C-reactive na kusafishwa kwa erythrocyte viliongezeka kwenye damu za wengi wa wagonjwa.
en-mt: Levels of liver and muscle enzymes and myoglobin increased in the blood of some patients and C-reactive protein and erythrocyte purification increased in the blood of the majority of patients.

sourceString: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a fibrin degradation product present in the blood, was elevated, and lymphocyte count was progressively reduced.
targetString: Kwa wagonjwa walio na visa vya hali mbaya, kiwango cha D-dimer, bidhaa ya kushusha hadhi ya fibrini ndani ya damu, iliinuliwa na idadi ya lymphocyte iliendelea kupungua.
en-mt: In patients with severe cases, the level of D-dimer, a debilitating byproduct of fibrini in the blood, was elevated and lymphocyte numbers continued to decrease.

sourceString: Abnormalities in chest radiography are found in most COVID-19 patients and featured by bilateral patchy shadows or ground glass opacity in the lungs.
targetString: Hali zisizo za kawaida katika vipimo vya kifua zilipatikana kwa wagonjwa wengi wa COVID-19 na hali hizo zilikuwa pamoja na vivuli vya njia mbili au kufungana kwa mapafu hivi kwamba visiweze kuonekana.
en-mt: Abnormalities in chest tests were found in many COVID-19 patients and those conditions included two-way shadows or pulmonary confinement such that they could not be seen.

sourceString: Patients often develop an atypical pneumonia, acute lung injury, and acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
targetString: Wagonjwa mara nyingi hukuwa na nimonia isiyo ya kawaida, majeraha mabaya ya mapafu na matatizo mabaya ya kupumua yaani acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
en-mt: Patients often have abnormal pneumonia, severe lung injuries and severe respiratory problems i.e. acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).

sourceString: When ARDS happens, uncontrolled inflammation, fluid accumulation, and progressive fibrosis severely compromise the gas exchange.
targetString: Kukitokea ARDS, kuchomeka kusikodhibitiwa, kukusanyika kwa majimaji na kuendelea kufura kwa mishipa kunahitilafiana vibaya na hali ya kupishana kwa gesi.
en-mt: ARDS, uncontrolled burning, hydraulic assembly and continued swelling of nerves are in conflict with the gas overlap.

sourceString: Dysfunction of type-I and type-II pneumocytes decreases the surfactant level and increases surface tension, thus reducing the ability of the lungs to expand and heightening the risk of lung collapse.
targetString: Kutofanya kazi kwa mikamba ya hewa ya type-I na type-II hupunguza viwango vya mshtuko vya bidhaa oevu na kuzidisha viwango vya mshutuko wa eneo, hivyo kupunguza uwezekano wa mapafu kupanuka na kuweka hatari zaidi ya mapafu kukosa kufanya kazi.
en-mt: The inactivity of the type-I and type-II air currents reduces the shock levels of wet products and increases the area's shock rates, thus reducing the likelihood of the lungs expanding and putting more risk of the lungs malfunctioning.

sourceString: Therefore, the worst chest radiographic findings often parallel the most severe extent of the disease.
targetString: Kwa hivyo, matokeo ya vipimo vya hali mbaya zaidi ya kifua huwa sambamba na kiwango kibaya zaidi cha ugonjwa.
en-mt: Thus, the results of tests for the most serious chest condition tend to correspond to the worst rate of disease.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 demonstrated the desquamation of pneumocytes, hyaline membrane formation, and interstitial lymphocyte infiltration, and multinucleated syncytial cells in the lungs of a patient who died of the disease, consistent with the pathology of viral infection and ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Mnamo tarehe 18, Februari 2020, uchanganuzi wa kwanza wa kipatholojia wa COVID-19 uliashiria kubambuliwa kwa sehemu za ndani za mapafu, muundo wa utandu wa hyaline, kuingia kwa lymphocytes mwilini kupitia vijia na seli za zenye nyulia nyingi kwenye mapafu ya mgnjwa ambaye alikufa kutokana na ugonjwa huu, kwa ulinganifu na patholojia ya maambukizi ya virusi na ARDS na sawa na ule wa wagonjwa wa SARS na MERS.
en-mt: On February 18, 2020, the first pathological analysis of COVID-19 indicated the infestation of the lungs, the structure of hyaline membranes, the entry of lymphocytes into the body through the lymphocytes and cells of the multi-cell in the lungs of a patient who died from this disease, in line with the pathology of viral infection with ARDS and similar to that of SARS and MERS patients.

sourceString: The detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) was used as the major criteria for the diagnosis of COVID-19.
targetString: Ugunduzi wa RNA ya SARS-CoV-2 kupitia msururu wa reverse-transcriptase polymerase (RT-PCR) ulitumika kama utaratibu msingi wa upimaji wa COVID-19.
en-mt: The discovery of SARS-CoV-2 RNA via reverse-transcriptase polymerase (RT-PCR) sequences served as the primary mechanism for COVID-19 testing.

sourceString: However, due to the high false-negative rate, which may accelerate the epidemic, clinical manifestations started to be used for diagnosis (which no longer solely relied on RT-PCR) in China on February 13, 2020.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kutokana na kiwango cha juu cha visa vya ugonjwa uliopo kutopatikana kupitia vipimo, jambo linaloweza kueneza janga hili, ishara za kimatibabu zilianza kutumika kwa ajili ya upimaji (ambayo haitegemei tena RT-PCR pekee) nchini China mnamo tarehe 13 Februari 2020.
en-mt: However, due to the high rate of existing cases not being available through testing, which could spread the pandemic, medical tokens began to be used for testing (which is no longer based on RT-PCR alone) in China on 13 February 2020.

sourceString: A similar situation also occurred with the diagnosis of SARS.
targetString: Hali sawa na hiyo pia ilitokea kupitia upimaji wa SARS.
en-mt: A similar situation also occurred through SARS testing.

sourceString: Therefore, a combination of disease history, clinical manifestations, laboratory tests, and radiological findings is essential and imperative for making an effective diagnosis.
targetString: Kwa hivyo, jumla ya historia ya ugonjwa, udhihirisho wa kimatibabu, majaribio kwenye mahabara na matokeo ya rediolojia ni muhimu na yanafaa kwa ajili ya kufanya vipimo vya ufanisi.
en-mt: Therefore, the total history of disease, medical exposure, tests on the testes and resect results are important and suitable for conducting effective tests.

sourceString: On February 14, 2020, the Feng Zhang group described a protocol of using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic SARS-CoV-2 RNA fragments at 20 × 10-18 mol/L to 200 × 10-18 mol/L (10-100 copies per microliter of input) using a dipstick in less than an hour without requiring elaborate instrumentation.
targetString: Mnamo tarehe 14 Februari 2020, kikundi cha Feng Zhang kilifafanua utaratibu wa kutumia mbinu ya SHERLOCK inayotegemea CRISPR kugundua SARS-CoV-2, ambayo inagundua vipande vya RNA vya kisinthetiki vya SARS-CoV-2 katika vipimo vya 20 × 10-18 mol/L hadi 200 × 10-18 mol/L (nakala 10-100 kwa kila lita ndogo ya mweko) kwa kutumia chuma cha kutumbukiza kwa chini ya saa moja bila kuhitaji kifaa cha uwezo changamano.
en-mt: On 14 February 2020, Feng Zhang's group defined a procedure for using the CRISPR-based SHERLOCK technique to detect SARS-CoV-2, which detects synthetic RNA fragments of SARS-CoV-2 in doses of 20 × 10–18 mol/L to 200 × 10–18 mol/L (10–100 copies per microliter of the console) using a metal plunge for less than an hour without requiring a complex capacity device.

sourceString: Hopefully, the new technique can dramatically enhance the sensitivity and convenience if verified in clinical samples.
targetString: Tunatumai kwamba mbinu hii mpya inaweza kuboresha kwa njia ya kipekee umuhimu na urahisi ikiwa itathibitishwa katika sampuli za kliniki.
en-mt: We hope that this new approach can uniquely improve the importance and convenience if proven in clinical samples.

sourceString: Due to the lack of experience with the novel CoV, physicians can mainly provide supportive care to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of therapies that have been used or proposed before for the treatment of other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other viral diseases (Table ​(Table2).2).
targetString: Kutokana na ukosefu wa uzoefu wa CoV mpya, wataalamu wa matibabu wanaweza kutoa tiba ya msaada kwa wagonjwa wa COVID-19, huku wakijaribu aina mbalimbali za tiba ambazo zimetumika au kupendekezwa hapo awali kutibu CoV vingine kama vile SARS-CoV na MERS-CoV na aina nyingine ya magonjwa yanayosababishwa na virusi (Jedwali (Jedwali la2).2).
en-mt: Due to the lack of experience of new CoV, medical professionals may provide supportive therapy to COVID-19 patients, while attempting a variety of remedies that have been used or previously recommended to treat other CoVs such as SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV and other types of virus-borne diseases (Table (Table 2).2).

sourceString: These therapies include current and potential treatments with antiviral drugs, immunosuppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, Chinese medicine, and psychological support.
targetString: Matibabu haya ni pamoja na matibabu ya kisasa na yanayowezekana na dawa zinapambana na virusi, kikandamizi vya kinga, steroids, plasma kutoka kwa wagonjwa waliopona, Msaada wa dawa na wa kisaikolojia kutoka China.
en-mt: These therapies include modern and possible treatments and drugs fighting viruses, immune suppressants, steroids, plasma from recovered patients, pharmacological and psychoactive support from China.

sourceString: Even plasma from recovered patients was proposed to be used for treatment.
targetString: Hata plasma kutoka kwa wagonjwa waliopona ilipendekezwa kutumika kwa matibabu.
en-mt: Even plasma from recovered patients was recommended to be used for treatment.

sourceString: Pharmaceutical companies are racing to develop antibodies and vaccines against the virus.
targetString: Kampuni za bidhaa za dawa zinang'ang'ana kuunda antibodi na chanjo dhidi ya virusi hivi.
en-mt: Pharmaceutical product companies are scrambling to develop antibodies and vaccines against this virus.

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 mainly attacks the lungs in the beginning and probably also attacks, to a lesser degree, other organs that express ACE2, such as the gastrointestinal system and the kidneys.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 hushambulia sana mapafu mwanzoni na pengine pia hushambulia viungo vingine vinavyodhihirisha ACE2 japo kwa kiwango cha chini, kama vile mfumo wa matumbo ya gesi na figo.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 attacks the lungs at first and may also attack other organs that manifest ACE2 at low levels, such as the gaseous bowel system and kidneys.

sourceString: Nevertheless, respiratory dysfunction and failure are the major threat to the patients and the major cause of death.
targetString: Licha ya hayo, kutofanya kazi kwa njia za pumu na kufeli ndiyo tishio kuu kwa wagonjwa na sababu kuu ya vifo.
en-mt: Despite this, asthma inactivity and failure are the main threat to patients and the leading cause of death.

sourceString: Thus, respiratory support is critical to relieve the symptoms and save lives and includes general oxygen therapy, high-flow oxygen, noninvasive ventilation, and invasive mechanical ventilation depending on the severity of the disease.
targetString: Hivyo, msaada wa kupumua ni muhimu kuondoa maumivu na huokoa maisha na hujumuisha tiba ya kawaida ya hewa safi, mtiririko wa hewa safi, kusaidiwa kupumua bila kutumia mashine ya pembeni na kusaidiwa kupumua kwa mashine ya pembeni kwa kutegemea hali ya ugonjwa.
en-mt: Thus, breathing aid is necessary to remove pain and saves lives and includes regular clean air therapy, clean air flow, assisted breathing without using a peripheral machine and assisted breathing with a peripheral machine depending on the condition of the disease.

sourceString: Patients with severe respiratory symptoms have to be supported by extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), a modified cardiopulmonary bypass technique used for the treatment of life-threatening cardiac or respiratory failure.
targetString: Wagonjwa walio na hali mbaya ya pumu lazima wasaidiwe kwa njia ya extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), na mbinu ya cardiopulmonary bypass inayotumika katika matibabu ya kukosa kufanya kazi kwa moyo au njia ya pumu ambayo ni hatari.
en-mt: Patients with severe asthma conditions must be supported through extracorporeal membrane oxygenation (ECMO), and cardiopulmonary bypass technique used in the treatment of heart failure or asthma pathway that is dangerous.

sourceString: In addition, the maintenance of electrolyte balance, the prevention and treatment of secondary infection and septic shock, and the protection of the functions of the vital organs are also essential for SARS-CoV-2 patients.
targetString: Vilevile, kudumisha usawa wa electrolyte, kuzuia na kutibu maambukizi ya pili na kutofanya kazi kwa viungo vya mwili na ulinzi wa utendakazi wa viungo muhimu pia ni muhimu kwa wagonjwa wa SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Similarly, maintaining electrolyte balance, preventing and treating secondary infections and organ dysfunction and protection of the functioning of vital organs are also important for SARS-CoV-2 patients.

sourceString: It has been known that a cytokine storm results from an overreaction of the immune system in SARS and MERS patients.
targetString: Pia inafahamika kwamba mlipuko wa saitokini hutokana na mfumo wa kinga ya mwili wa wagonjwa kutoa antibodi kupita kiasi kupigana na SARS na MERS.
en-mt: It is also known that the salmonella outbreak is due to the immune system of patients giving excessive antibody to fight SARS and MERS.

sourceString: Cytokine storm is a form of systemic inflammatory response featured by the release of a series of cytokines including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ, and MCP-1.
targetString: Mlipuko wa saitokini ni namna ya makabiliano ya kimfumo ya kuchomeka ambao unaohusisha kutolewa kwa misururu ya saitokini ikiwa ni pamoja na TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ na MCP-1.
en-mt: Catalytic eruption is a form of catalytic scorching that involves the release of saturation sequences including TNFα, IL-1β, IL-2, IL-6, IFNα, IFNβ, IFNγ and MCP-1.

sourceString: These cytokines induce immune cells to release a vast number of free radicals which are the major cause of ARDS and multiple organ failure.
targetString: Cytokine hizi huiingiza seli za kinga ili kuachilia idadi kubwa ya fanifu huru ambazo ndizo chanzo kikubwa cha ARDS na viungo kufeli mara nyingi.
en-mt: These cytokines inactivate immune cells to release a large number of loose organs that are the main cause of ARDS and organs fail often.

sourceString: Immunosuppression is essential in the treatment of cytokine storms, especially in severe patients.
targetString: Kukandamizwa kwa kinga ya mwili ni muhimu katika matibabu ya mlipuko wa saitokini, hasa kwa wagonjwa walio katika hali mbaya.
en-mt: Antibody suppression is important in the treatment of salmonella outbreaks, especially in patients in critical condition.

sourceString: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an anti-IL6 monoclonal antibody, have been used to treat cytokine storm.
targetString: Corticosteroids na tocilizumab, antibodi inayopambana na IL6 ya kloni moja, zimetumika kutibu mlipuko wa saitokini.
en-mt: Corticosteroids and tocilizumab, an antibody antibody that fights single-celled IL6, have been used to treat salmonella outbreak.

sourceString: Other immunosuppression treatments for cytokine storm include the modulation of T cell-directed immune response; the blockade of IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF; JAK inhibition; blinatumomab; suppressor of cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC inhibitors.
targetString: Matibabu mengine ya kukandamiza kinga kwa ajili mlipuko wa saitokini ni pamoja na kudhibitiwa kwa kinga ya mwili inayoelekezwa na seli ya T; mzibo wa IFN-γ, IL-1, na TNF; kuzuiwa kwa JAK; blinatumomab; kikandamizi cha cytokine signaling 4; na vizuizi vya HDAC.
en-mt: Other immune suppression treatments for a salmonella outbreak include the control of the T-cell-directed antibody; the IFN-γ, IL-1, and TNF orbits; blocked by JAK; blinatumomab; cytokine signaling 4; and HDAC restrictions.

sourceString: Steroids, as immunosuppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Steroids, kana vikandamizi vya kinga, zilitumika pakubwa katika matibabu ya SARS ili kupunguza athari ya uharibifu wa kuchomeka.
en-mt: Steroids, such as immune suppressants, were widely used in the treatment of SARS to reduce the destructive effect of burning.

sourceString: However, steroids at high dosages were not beneficial to severe lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Hata hivyo, dozi za juu za steroids hazikuwa na manufaa kwa jeraha mbaya la mapafu kwa wagonjwa wa SARS na COVID-19.
en-mt: However, high doses of steroids were not useful for serious lung injury in SARS and COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Instead, they may cause severe side effects, especially avascular osteonecrosis, dramatically affecting the prognosis.
targetString: Badala yake, zinaweza kusababisha athari mbaya, hasa ukosefu wa damu kwenye mifupa uliathiri pakubwa kutambuliwa kwa ugonjwa.
en-mt: Instead, they can cause serious side effects, especially the lack of blood in the bones significantly affected the diagnosis of the disease.

sourceString: Nevertheless, short courses of corticosteroids at low-to-moderate doses have been recommended to be used prudently for critically ill COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Licha ya hayo, viwango vidogo vya corticosteroids vya dozi ya chini hadi ya wastani imependekezwa kutumika ipasavyo kutibu wagonjwa walio katika hali mbaya wa COVID-19.
en-mt: Despite this, small doses of low-to-moderate dose corticosteroids have been recommended to be used appropriately to treat patients in critical cases of COVID-19.

sourceString: At the time of writing, no effective antiviral therapy has been confirmed.
targetString: Kufikia wakati wa kuandika makala, hakuna tiba faafu dhidi ya virusi ambayo imethibitishwa.
en-mt: As of the time of writing the article, no effective treatment against the virus has been proven.

sourceString: However, intravenous administration with remdesivir, a nucleotide analog, has been found to be efficacious in an American patient with COVID-19.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kudungwa kwa dawa remdesivir inayodungwa ndani ya mishipa, ambayo ni nucleotide iliyo na sukari na fosfeti, imepatikana kuwa faafu kwa mgonjwa wa Marekani aliye na COVID-19.
en-mt: However, injecting remdesivir injectable into the veins, which is a nucleotide containing sugar and phosphorus, has been found to be effective in a US patient with COVID-19.

sourceString: Remdesivir is a novel antiviral drug developed by Gilead initially for the treatment of diseases caused by Ebola and Marlburg viruses.
targetString: Remdesivir ni dawa ya mpya ya kupambana na virusi inayoundwa na Gilead hapo awali kwa matibabu ya ugonjwa uliosababishwa na Ebola na virusi vya Marlburg.
en-mt: Remdesivir is a new antiviral drug being developed by Gilead previously for the treatment of Ebola and Marlburg virus.

sourceString: Later, remdesivir also demonstrated possible inhibition of other single stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.
targetString: Baadaye, remdesivir pia ilionyesha kuzuia uwezekano wa kutokea virusi vingine vya RNA vya namna moja ikiwa ni pamoja na virusi vya MERS na SARS.
en-mt: Subsequently, remdesivir also showed the possible inhibition of other single-stranded RNA viruses including MERS and SARS viruses.

sourceString: Based on these, Gilead has provided the compound to China to conduct a pair of trials on SARS-CoV-2-infected individuals, and the results are highly anticipated.
targetString: Kwa misingi hii, Gilead imetoa dawa hiyo kwa China ili iendeshe jozi ya majaribio kwa watu walioambukizwa SARS-CoV-2 na matukio yanatarajiwa sana.
en-mt: On these grounds, Gilead has provided the drug to China to run a pair of trials for people infected with SARS-CoV-2 and events are highly anticipated.

sourceString: In addition, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been suggested as potential therapies for patients with acute respiratory symptoms.
targetString: Isitoshe, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, na ribavirin zimependekezwa kuwa tiba zinazowezekana kwa wagonjwa walio na dalili za matatizo mabaya ya kupumua.
en-mt: Furthermore, baricitinb, interferon-α, lopinavir/ritonavir, and ribavirin have been proposed as potential treatments for patients with symptoms of severe respiratory problems.

sourceString: Diarrhea, nausea, vomiting, liver damage, and other adverse reactions can occur following combined therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.
targetString: Kuendesha, kichefuchefu, kutapika, kuharibika kwa ini na hali nyingine mbaya zinaweza kutokea kufuatia jumla ya tiba na lopinavir/ritonavir.
en-mt: Running, nausea, vomiting, liver impairment and other serious conditions can occur following total therapy with lopinavir/ritonavir.

sourceString: The interaction of these treatments with other drugs used in the patients should be monitored carefully.
targetString: Mwingiliano wa matibabu haya na dawa nyingine zilizotumika kwa wagonjwa unapaswa kufuatiliwa kwa makini.
en-mt: The interaction of this treatment with other drugs used in patients should be carefully monitored.

sourceString: Plasma from recovered patients and antibody generation
targetString: Plasma kutoka kwa wagonjwa waliopona na uzalishaji wa antibodi
en-mt: Plasma from patients recovered by antibody production

sourceString: The collection of the blood from patients who recovered from a contagious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthy individuals from catching the disease has a long history.
targetString: Ukusanyaji wa damu kutoka kwa wagonjwa ambao walipona kutokana na ugonjwa wa kuambukizana ili kutibu wagonjwa wengine wanaougua kutokana na ugonjwa sawa au kulinda wahudumu wa afya kupata ugonjwa una historia ndefu.
en-mt: Blood collection from patients who recovered from infectious disease to treat other patients suffering from the same disease or to protect healthcare workers from getting sick has a long history.

sourceString: Indeed, recovered patients often have a relatively high level of antibodies against the pathogen in their blood.
targetString: Hakika, wagonjwa waliopona mara nyingi wana viwango vya juu vya antibodi ikilinganishwa na pathogeni kwenye damu zao.
en-mt: Indeed, recovered patients often have higher antibody levels compared to the pathogeni in their bloodstream.

sourceString: Antibodies are an immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight pathogens and other foreign objects and they recognize unique molecules in the pathogens and neutralize them directly.
targetString: Antibodi ni immunoglobulin (Ig) zinazozalishwa na B lymphocytes kupambana na viini na vitu vingine vya kigeni na zinatambua molekyuli maalum kwenye viini na kupambana nazo moja kwa moja.
en-mt: Antibodies are immunoglobulin (Ig) produced by B lymphocytes to fight germs and other foreign substances and they recognize specific molecules in germs and directly fight them.

sourceString: Based on this, plasma was collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 and was injected into 10 seriously ill patients.
targetString: Kutokana na haya, plasma iliyokusanywa kutoka kwa damu za kikundi cha wagonjwa ambao walipona kutokana na COVID-19 ilitumika kuwadunga wagonjwa 10 waliokuwa katika hali mbaya sana.
en-mt: As a result, plasma collected from the blood of a group of patients who recovered from COVID-19 was used to inject 10 patients who were in critical condition.

sourceString: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, accompanied by reduced inflammation and viral loads and improved oxygen saturation in the blood.
targetString: Dalili zao ziliboreka ndani ya saa 24, ikiwa ni pamoja na kupungua kwa hali ya kuchomeka na viwango vya virusi na kuboreka kwa kuloweshwa kwa hewa safi ndani ya damu.
en-mt: Their symptoms improved within 24 hours, including decreased burnout and virus levels and improved exposure to fresh air into the bloodstream.

sourceString: However, verification and clarification are necessary to propose the method for large-scale use before specific therapies are not yet developed.
targetString: Hata hivyo, uthibitishaji na ufafanuzi ni muhimu ili kupendekeza njia ya matumizi ya viwango vikubwa kabla ya tiba mahususi kuundwa.
en-mt: However, validation and clarification are necessary in order to suggest a method for the use of large concentrations before specific remedies are formulated.

sourceString: In addition, given the therapeutic effects, some disadvantages associated with the plasma should be considered carefully.
targetString: Pia, athari za kimatibabu zikiangaziwa, baadhi upungufu unaohusiana na plasma unapaswa kuzingatiwa kwa makini.
en-mt: Also, if the medical effects are highlighted, some plasma-related deficiencies should be carefully considered.

sourceString: For example, antibodies can overstimulate the immune response and cause cytokine release syndrome, which is potentially a life-threatening toxicity.
targetString: Kwa mfano, antibodi zinaweza kuchochea kinga ya mwili kupita kisasi na kusababisha saitokini kuzalishwa, ambayo ina uwezekano wa kuwa na uchafu wa kutishia maisha.
en-mt: For example, antibodies can stimulate the body's immune system to pass retaliation and cause the salmon to be produced, which is likely to contain life-threatening contaminants.

sourceString: The concentration of antibodies in the blood is usually low, and the demand for the plasma is large to treat critically ill patients.
targetString: Mrundiko wa antibodi kwenye damu huwa ni wa chini na hitaji la plasma ni la juu ili kutibu wagonjwa.
en-mt: Antibody flow in the blood tends to be low and the need for plasma is high to treat patients.

sourceString: It is difficult to develop and produce specific antibodies rapidly enough to fight against a global epidemic.
targetString: Ni vigumu kuunda na kuzalisha antibodi mahususi kwa haraka zaidi ili kupambana na janga la ulimwengu mzima.
en-mt: It is difficult to create and produce specific antibodies more quickly to combat a worldwide pandemic.

sourceString: Thus, it is more critical and practical to isolate B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes encoding effective antibodies or screen for effective antibodies against essential proteins of the virus.
targetString: Hivyo ni muhimu zaidi kutoa seli za B kutoka kwa wagonjwa waliopona na kutambua misimbo ya kijenetiki inayosimbua antibodi faafu au kuchunguza kutafuta antibodi faafu dhidi ya protini muhimu ya virusi.
en-mt: So it is more important to extract B cells from recovered patients and identify the genetic codes that decode the appropriate antibody or investigate finding suitable antibodies against a key viral protein.

sourceString: This way, we can readily scale up the production of the antibodies.
targetString: Kwa njia hii, tunaweza kupandisha uzalishaji wa antibodi.
en-mt: This way, we can ramp up antiboard production.

sourceString: TCM has been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for thousands of years.
targetString: TCM pia imetumika kutibu aina ya magonjwa nchini China kwa miaka mingi.
en-mt: TCM has also been used to treat a variety of diseases in China for many years.

sourceString: However, its effects largely rely on a combination of multiple components in a formula that varies depending on the diagnosis of a disease based on the theories of TCM.
targetString: Hata hivyo, athari zake zinategemea pakubwa ujumuishaji wa viambajengo vingi kwenye fomula inayotofautiana kwa kutegemea uchunguzi wa ugonjwa kulingana na nadharia za TCM.
en-mt: However, its effects are largely dependent on the integration of multiple ingredients into a formula that differs by relying on disease screening based on TCM theories.

sourceString: Most of the effective components remain unknown or are vague as it is difficult to extract and verify such components or their optimal combinations.
targetString: Viambajengo vingi faafu bado havijulikani au si bayana kwa vile ni vigumu kuopoa na kuthibitisha viambajengo kama hivyo au ujumuishaji wao bora.
en-mt: Many of the appropriate ingredients are still unknown or not clear as it is difficult to recover and verify such ingredients or their best integration.

sourceString: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific therapy for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the major alternative treatments for patients with light to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from severe stages.
targetString: Kwa sasa, kutokana na ukosefu wa tiba faafu na mahususi kwa COVID-19, TCM imekuwa mojawapo ya tiba kuu mbadala kwa wagonjwa walio na dalili hafifu hadi za wastani au kwa wale ambao wamepona kutoka katika hatua mbaya zaidi.
en-mt: Currently, due to the lack of effective and specific treatments for COVID-19, TCM has become one of the main alternative treatments for patients with mild to moderate symptoms or for those who have recovered from the most severe stages.

sourceString: For example, Shu Feng Jie Du capsules and Lian Hua Qing Wen capsules were found to be effective for COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: Kwa mfano, tembe za Shu Feng Jie Du na Lian Hua Qing zilipatikana kuwa zinatibu COVID-19 kwa ufanisi.
en-mt: For example, the pills of Shu Feng Jie Du and Lian Hua Qing were found to be effectively treating COVID-19.

sourceString: Top cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were observed in several provinces in China that used TCM in 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%), and Hunan (50%), whereas Hubei province, which used TCM in only approximately 30% of its COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate (13%).
targetString: Viwango vya juu vya tiba katika matibabu ya wagonjwa wa COVID-19 vilionekana katika mikoa nyingi nchini China iliyotumia TCM kutibu 87% ya wagonjwa wao, ikiwa ni pamoja na Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%) na Hunan (50%), Huku mkoa wa Hubei, ambapo TCM ilitumika kwa takriban 30% pekee ya wagonjwa wao wa COVID-19, ulikuwa na kiwango cha chini zaidi cha tiba kwa (13%).
en-mt: The highest cure rates in the treatment of COVID-19 patients were seen in most provinces in China that used TCM to treat 87% of their patients, including Gansu (63.7%), Ningxia (50%) and Hunan (50%), while Hubei province, where TCM was used for only about 30% of their COVID-19 patients, had the lowest cure rate at (13%).

sourceString: However, this is quite a rough comparison as many other impact factors such as the number and severity of the patients should be included in the evaluation.
targetString: Hata hivyo, huu ni ulinganisho wa juujuu kwa sababu vigezo vingine vya athari kama vile idadi na hali ya wagonjwa vinapaswa kujumuishwa kwenye tathmini.
en-mt: However, this is a superficial comparison because other impact variables such as the number and status of patients should be included in the evaluation.

sourceString: On February 18, 2020, Boli Zhang and coworkers published a study to compare western medicine (WM) treatment alone with combined treatment of WM and TCM.
targetString: Mnamo tarehe 18 Februari 2020, Boli Zhang na wafanyakazi wenza walichapisha utafiti wa kulinganisha matibabu ya dawa za magharibi (WM) pekee na jumla ya matibabu ya WM na TCM.
en-mt: On 18 February 2020, Boli Zhang and co-workers published a study comparing western medicine (WM) treatments exclusively with total WM and TCM treatments.

sourceString: They found that the times needed for body temperature recovery, symptom disappearance, and hospitalization were remarkably shorter in the WM+TCM group than in the WM only group.
targetString: Waligundua kwamba muda unaohitajika kwa kurejesha nyuzi joto ya mwili, kupotea kwa dalili na kulazwa hospitalini ulipungua pakubwa katika kikundi cha WM+TCM kuliko kikundi cha WM pekee.
en-mt: They found that the time required for recovery of body temperature, loss of symptoms and hospitalization decreased significantly in the WM+TCM group than in the WM group alone.

sourceString: Most impressively, the rate for symptomatic worsening (from light to severe) was remarkably lower for the WM+TCM group than for the WM only group (7.4% versus 46.2%) and the mortality was lower in the WM+TCM group than WM only group (8.8% versus 39%).
targetString: Matokeo mema zaidi ni kuwa, viwango vya hali ya wagonjwa wenye dalili kuwa mbaya zaidi (kutoka kwa hali hafifu hadi mbaya zaidi) ilipungua pakubwa kwa kikundi cha WM+TCM kuliko kwa kikundi cha WM pekee (7.4% dhidi ya 46.2%) na viwango vya vifo vilipungua katika kikundi cha WM+TCM kuliko kikundi cha WM pekee (8.8% dhidi ya 39%).
en-mt: The most positive result is that the rates of the condition of patients with symptoms worsening (from mild to worse) decreased significantly for the WM+TCM group than for the WM group alone (7.4% vs. 46.2%) and mortality rates decreased in the WM+TCM group than in the WM group alone (8.8% vs. 39%).

sourceString: Nevertheless, the efficacy and safety of TCM still await more well-controlled trials at larger scales and in more centers.
targetString: Licha ya hayo, ufanisi na usalama wa TCM bado unasubiri majaribio yaliyodhibitiwa vyema zaidi katika viwango vikubwa na katika vituo vingi zaidi.
en-mt: Despite this, TCM's efficacy and safety still await more well-controlled trials at larger levels and in more intensive facilities.

sourceString: It would also be intriguing to characterize the mechanism of actions and clarify the effective components of TCM treatments or their combinations if possible.
targetString: Itakuwa ni jambo la kuvutia kuzipa sifa taratibu za hatua na kuweka wazi viambajengo faafu vya matibabu ya TCM au ujumuishaji wavyo ikiwezekana.
en-mt: It would be interesting to characterize the mechanisms of action and to disclose the appropriate TCM treatment ingredients or integration where possible.

sourceString: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 mostly experience great fear of the highly contagious and even fatal disease, and quarantined people also experience boredom, loneliness, and anger.
targetString: Wagonjwa wanaoshukiwa au waliothibitishwa kuwa na COVID-19 mara nyingi hupitia hali ya hofu kubwa ya ugonjwa huu unaoambukiza sana na hata kuwauwa watu, na watu walio kwenye karantini pia wanapitia hali ya uchovu, upweke na hasira.
en-mt: Patients suspected or confirmed to have COVID-19 often experience a heightened sense of fear of this highly contagious and even deadly disease, and people in quarantine also experience fatigue, loneliness and anger.

sourceString: Furthermore, symptoms of the infection such as fever, hypoxia, and cough as well as adverse effects of the treatments such as insomnia caused by corticosteroids can lead to more anxiety and mental distress.
targetString: Pamoja na hayo, dalili za maambukizi kama vile joto jingi mwilini, ukosefu wa hewa safi ya kutosha kwenye viungo vya mwili na kikohozi pamoja na athari mbaya za matibabu kama vile ukosefu wa usingizi unaosababishwa na dawa zinazopunguzwa hali ya kuchomeka kwa mwili yanaweza kusababisha wasiwasi na msongo wa mawazo.
en-mt: Despite this, symptoms of infection such as high temperatures, lack of adequate fresh air in the joints and cough as well as medical side effects such as lack of sleep caused by medications that reduce the body's burns can cause anxiety and stress.

sourceString: In the early phase of the SARS outbreak, a range of psychiatric morbidities including persistent depression, anxiety, panic attacks, psychomotor excitement, psychotic symptoms, delirium, and even suicidality were reported.
targetString: Katika awamu ya awali ya mkurupuko wa SARS, matatizo mbalimbali ya kiakili yanayojumuisha mfadhaiko uliokithiri, wasiwasi, mashambulizi ya hofu, msisimko wa kiakili, dalili za matatizo ya kiakili, hali ya kusumbuliwa kiakili na hata watu kutaka kujitoa uhai ziliripotiwa.
en-mt: In the initial phase of the SARS outbreak, various mental disorders that include extreme stress, anxiety, panic attacks, mental arousal, symptoms of mental distress, mental distress and even suicides were reported.

sourceString: Mandatory contact tracing and quarantine, as a part of the public health responses to the COVID-19 outbreak, can make people more anxious and guilty about the effects of the contagion, quarantine, and stigma on their families and friends.
targetString: Kufuatilia watu waliogusana na karantini ya lazima, kama sehemu ya majibu ya afya ya umma kwa mkurupuko wa COVID-19, kunaweza kuwatia watu wasiwasi zaidi na maasumu kuhusu athari za maambukizo, karantini na unyanyapaa kuhusu familia na marafiki.
en-mt: Tracking people who have come into contact with mandatory quarantine, as part of the public health response to the COVID-19 outbreak, can further exacerbate people's concerns and concerns about the impact of infection, quarantine and stigma on family and friends.

sourceString: Thus, mental health care should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected individuals, and people in contact with them as well as the general public who are in need.
targetString: Hivyo, tiba ya afya ya kiakili inapaswa kutolewa kwa wagonjwa wa COVID-19, watu wanaoshukiwa na watu waliogusana nao pamoja na umma wa jumla ambao wanahitaji.
en-mt: Thus, mental health treatment should be provided to COVID-19 patients, suspected people and people who came into contact with them as well as the general public who need them.

sourceString: The psychological support should include the establishment of multidisciplinary mental health teams, clear communications with regular and accurate updates about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and applications to avoid close contact with each other.
targetString: Msaada wa kisaikolojia unapaswa kujumuishwa katika kuundwa kwa timu za tasnia mbalimbali za afya ya kiakili, mawasiliano wazi na taarifa za mara kwa mara ambazo ni sahihi kuhusu mkurupuko wa SARS-CoV-2 na mipango ya matibabu na matumizi ya vifaa vya kielektroniki vya kitaaluma na programu za kuepuka kugusana na wengine.
en-mt: Psychological support should be included in the creation of multi-disciplinary mental health industry teams, clear communication and regular information that is accurate about the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak and treatment plans and the use of professional electronic devices and apps to avoid contact with others.

sourceString: Effective vaccines are essential for interrupting the chain of transmission from animal reservoirs and infected humans to susceptible hosts and are often complementary to antiviral treatment in the control of epidemics caused by emerging viruses.
targetString: Chanjo faafu ni muhimu katika kukatiza msururu wa usambazaji kutoka kwa wanyama na binadamu walioambukizwa kwa watu walio hatarini na zinatumika pamoja na matibabu dhidi ya virusi katika kudhibiti majanga makubwa yanayosababishwa na virusi vinavyoibuka.
en-mt: Effective vaccines are crucial in cutting off the supply chain from infected animals and humans to vulnerable populations and are used alongside anti-viral treatments in managing major pandemics caused by emerging viruses.

sourceString: Efforts have been made to develop S protein-based vaccines to generate long-term and potent neutralizing antibodies and/or protective immunity against SARS-CoV.
targetString: Jitihada zimewekwa kuunda chanjo za protini ya S ili kuzalisha antibodi thabiti na ya kutumika muda mrefu na/au kinga ya mwili ya ulinzi dhidi ya SARS-CoV.
en-mt: Efforts are underway to develop S protein vaccines to produce a robust and long-used antibody and/or antibody for protection against SARS-CoV.

sourceString: Live-attenuated vaccines have been evaluated in animal models for SARS.
targetString: Chanjo za kutoka kwa virusi vilivyopunguziwa makali zimetathminiwa katika miundo ya wanyama kwa ajili ya SARS.
en-mt: Vaccines from the severed virus have been evaluated in animal structures for SARS.

sourceString: However, the in vivo efficacy of these vaccine candidates in elderly individuals and lethal-challenge models and their protection against zoonotic virus infection have yet to be determined before a clinical study is initiated.
targetString: Hata hivyo, ufanisi wa chanjo hizi kwa watu wazee na miundo ya viwango vyao kuuwa virusi na ulinzi wa dhidi ya virusi vinavyotokana na wanyama bado haujabainishwa kabla utafiti wa kimatibabu uanzishwe.
en-mt: However, the effectiveness of these vaccines in older people and the structures of their levels of virus killing and protection against animal-borne viruses have not yet been determined before medical research can be initiated.

sourceString: This is probably because SARS died down 17 years ago and no new case has been reported since.
targetString: Hii pengine ni kwa sababu SARS ilikufa miaka 17 iliyopita na hakuna maambukizi mapya ambayo yameripotiwa tangu wakati huo.
en-mt: This is probably because SARS died 17 years ago and no new infections have been reported since.

sourceString: In contrast, sporadic cases and clusters of MERS continue to occur in the Middle East and spread to other regions owing to the persistence of zoonotic sources in endemic areas.
targetString: Kwa ulinganisho, visa na mkusanyiko hapa na pale wa MERS unaendelea kufanyika katika Mashariki ya Kati na kuenea katika maeneo mengine kutokana na vyanzo vya wanyama katika maeneo yanayoshuhudia maaenezi ya ugonjwa.
en-mt: By comparison, cases and accumulation here and there of MERS continue to take place in the Middle East and spread to other areas due to animal sources in areas experiencing disease transmission.

sourceString: Vaccination strategies have been developed for MERS by using inactivated virus, DNA plasmids, viral vectors, nanoparticles, virus-like particles and recombinant protein subunits and some have been evaluated in animal models.
targetString: Mikakati ya chanjo imeundwa kwa ajili ya MERS kwa kutumia virusi vilivyolemazwa, plasmidi za DNA, mikondo ya virusi, chembechembe ndogo, chembechembe zinazofanana na virusi na vitengo vidogo vya protini vilivyounganishwa tena na zingine vimetathminiwa katika miundo ya wanyama.
en-mt: Vaccine strategies have been developed for MERS using disabling viruses, DNA plasmids, viral currents, small particles, virus-like particles and small recombinant protein units and others have been evaluated in animal structures.

sourceString: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 for non-immune individuals is an urgent and critical task for controlling the ongoing epidemic.
targetString: Uundaji wa chanjo salama na faafu dhidi ya SARS-CoV-2 kwa watu wasiokuwa na kinga ya mwili ni jukumu la dharura na muhimu la kudhibiti janga hili linaloendelea.
en-mt: The development of a safe and effective vaccine against SARS-CoV-2 in immunocompromised individuals is an urgent and critical task to contain this ongoing pandemic.

sourceString: However, it is challenging to overcome the difficulty because of the long period of time (averaged 18 months) needed for vaccine development and the dynamic variations of CoVs.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kuna changamoto la kuondokana na ugumu huu kwa sababu ya muda mrefu unaohitajika (kwa wastani miezi 18) kuunda chanjo na mambo mbalimbali yanayobadilika ya CoV.
en-mt: However, there is a challenge to overcome this difficulty because of the long time required (on average 18 months) to create a vaccine and the various changing aspects of the CoV.

sourceString: As a novel disease, COVID-19 has just started to manifest its full clinical course throughout thousands of patients.
targetString: Kama ugonjwa mpya, COVID-19 imeanza tu kujidhihirisha kikamilifu kimatibabu kwa maelfu ya wagonjwa.
en-mt: As a new disease, COVID-19 has only just begun to fully manifest itself medically for thousands of patients.

sourceString: In most cases, patients can recover gradually without sequelae.
targetString: Katika hali nyingi, wagonjwa wanaweza kupona polepole bila hali inasababishwa na ugonjwa uliotangulia.
en-mt: In many cases, patients can recover slowly without the condition being caused by a previous illness.

sourceString: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with high morbidity and mortality in patients with severe cases.
targetString: Hata hivyo, sawa na SARS na MERS, COVID-19 pia inahusishwa na hali ya juu ya kuweza kupata ugonjwa na viwango vya vifo kwa wagonjwa walio na hali mbaya.
en-mt: However, similar to SARS and MERS, COVID-19 is also associated with a higher susceptibility to disease and mortality rates in critically ill patients.

sourceString: Therefore, building a prognosis model for the disease is essential for health-care agencies to prioritize their services, especially in resource-constrained areas.
targetString: Kwa hivyo, kukuza muundo unaotegemea uzoefu wa kimatibabu kwa ajili ya ugonjwa ni muhimu kwa mashirika ya tiba ya afya kuzipa kipaumbele huduma zao, hasa katika maeneo yasiyo na rasilimali za kutosha.
en-mt: Therefore, developing a structure based on medical experience for disease is critical for health care organizations to prioritize their care, especially in areas without adequate resources.

sourceString: Based on clinical studies reported thus far, the following factors may affect or be associated with the prognosis of COVID-19 patients (Table ​(Table33):
targetString: Kulingana na utafiti wa kimatibabu ulioripotiwa kufikia sasa, vigezo hivi vinaweza kuathiri au kuhusishwa na hali ya kuwepo kwa COVID-19 kwa wagonjwa (Jedwali (Jedwali la 33):
en-mt: Based on the medical research reported so far, these variables may affect or be associated with the presence status of COVID-19 in patients (Table (Table 33):

sourceString: Age: Age was the most important factor for the prognosis of SARS, which is also true for COVID-19.
targetString: Umri: Umri ilikuwa kigezo muhimu katika kuchunguza SARS, ambacho pia ni ukweli katika COVID-19.
en-mt: Age: Age was an important parameter in detecting SARS, which is also a reality in COVID-19.

sourceString: COVID-19 mainly happened at the age of 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in a study of 8,866 cases as described above.
targetString: COVID-19 kimsingi ilitokea sana kwa watu walio na umri wa 30-65 huku 47.7% ya wagonjwa hao wakiwa na zaidi ya 50 katika uchunguzi wa visa 8,866 kama ilivyofafanuliwa hapa juu.
en-mt: COVID-19 primarily occurred predominantly in people aged 30-65 with 47.7% of those patients being over 50 in the 8,866 case study as detailed above.

sourceString: Patients who required intensive care were more likely to have underlying comorbidities and complications and were significantly older than those who did not (at the median age of 66 versus 51), suggesting age as a prognostic factor for the outcome of COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Wagonjwa waliohitaji matibabu ya kina walikuwa na uwezekano mkubwa wa kuwa na hali nyingine ya ugonjwa na matatizo na walikuwa na umri mzee kuliko wale ambao hawakuwa nayo (katika umri wa wastani wa 66 dhidi ya 51) na kuashiria umri kuwa kigezo cha matokeo ya wagonjwa wa COVID-19.
en-mt: Patients who needed intensive treatment were more likely to have other disease conditions and complications and were older than those who did not have it (at an average age of 66 vs. 51) and marked age as a determinant of COVID-19 patient outcomes.

sourceString: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has infected more men than women (0.31/100,000 versus 0.27/100,000), as described above.
targetString: Ngono: SARS-CoV-2 imeathiri wanaume wengi zaidi ya wanawake (0.31/100,000 dhidi ya 0.27/100,000), kama ilivyofafanuliwa hapa juu.
en-mt: Sex: SARS-CoV-2 has affected more men than women (0.31/100,000 vs. 0.27/100,000), as detailed above.

sourceString: Comorbidities and complications: Patients with COVID-19 who require intensive care are more likely to suffer from acute cardiac injury and arrhythmia.
targetString: Magonjwa na hali za afya za awali: Wagonjwa waliokuwa na COVID-19 waliohitaji matibabu wana uwezekano wa kuambukizwa jehaha mbaya la moyo na moyo kutopiga vyema.
en-mt: Diseases and pre-existing health conditions: Patients with COVID-19 who needed treatment are more likely to contract a bad heart rhythm and heart failure to beat properly.

sourceString: Cardiac events were also the main reason for death in SARS patients.
targetString: Matukio ya moyo pia yalikuwa sababu kuu ya vifo kwa wagonjwa wa SARS.
en-mt: Cardiovascular events were also a leading cause of death in SARS patients.

sourceString: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also bind to ACE2-positive cholangiocytes, which might lead to liver dysfunctions in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Imeripotiwa kwamba SARS-CoV-2 pia inaweza kuunganisha kwenye seli za mfuko wa baili za ACE2-positive, jambo linaloweza kusababisha kutofanya kazi kwa maini ya wagonjwa wa COVID-19.
en-mt: It has been reported that SARS-CoV-2 can also attach to ACE2-positive baili-bag cells, a phenomenon that can lead to inactivity in the liver of COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: It is worth noting that age and underlying disease are strongly correlated and might interfere with each other.
targetString: Ni muhimu kutaja kwamba umri na magonjwa sugu yana mahusiano makubwa na yanaweza kuingiliana.
en-mt: It is important to mention that age and chronic diseases have strong ties and can overlap.

sourceString: Abnormal laboratory findings: The C-reactive protein (CRP) level in blood reflects the severity of inflammation or tissue injury and has been proposed to be a potential prognostic factor for disease, response to therapy, and ultimate recovery.
targetString: Matokeo yasiyo ya kawaida ya mahabara. Kiwango cha protini ya C-reactive (CRP) ndani ya damu inaakisi hali ya kuchomeka au majeraha ya tishu na zimependekezwa kuwa kigezo cha uwezo wa kupona, hali ya kupokea tiba na uponyaji hatimaye.
en-mt: Unusual results of the squabbles. The level of C-reactive protein (CRP) in the blood reflects the state of burns or tissue injuries and have been suggested to be a criterion for recovery capacity, conditions for receiving therapy and healing eventually.

sourceString: The correlation of CRP level to the severity and prognosis of COVID-19 has also been proposed.
targetString: Uhusiano kati ya viwango vya CRP na uzito na uwezo wa kupona kutokana na COVID-19 pia umependekezwa.
en-mt: A relationship between CRP levels and weight and ability to recover from COVID-19 has also been suggested.

sourceString: In addition, elevated lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) may also help predict the outcome.
targetString: Pia, lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), na creatine kinase (CK) pia zinaweza kusaidia kutabiri matokeo.
en-mt: Also, lactate dehydrogenase (LDH), aspartate aminotransferase (AST), alanine aminotransferase (ALT), and creatine kinase (CK) can also help predict outcomes.

sourceString: These enzymes are expressed extensively in multiple organs, especially in the heart and liver, and are released during tissue damage.
targetString: Enzaimu hizi zinadhihirika moja kwa wingi ndani ya viungo vingi vya mwili, hasa ndani ya moyo na ini na hutolewa wakati wa kuharibika kwa tishu.
en-mt: These enzymes are manifest in many parts of the body, especially in the heart and liver and are produced during tissue damage.

sourceString: Thus, they are traditional markers for heart or liver dysfunctions.
targetString: Hivyo, ndiyo ishara za tangu jadi za kutofanya kazi kwa moyo au ini.
en-mt: Thus, they are the traditional signs of heart or liver dysfunction.

sourceString: Major clinical symptoms: Chest radiography and temporal progression of clinical symptoms should be considered together with the other issues for the prediction of outcomes and complications of COVID-19.
targetString: Dalili kuu za kimatibabu: Upimaji wa kifua na maendeleo ya muda ya dalili za kimatibabu zinapaswa kuzingatiwa pamoja na masuala mengine kwa ajili ya utabiri wa matokeo na matatizo ya COVID-19.
en-mt: Major medical symptoms: Chest testing and the temporary development of medical symptoms should be considered along with other considerations for the prediction of COVID-19 outcomes and complications.

sourceString: Use of steroids: As described above, steroids are immunosuppressant commonly used as an adjunctive therapy for infectious diseases to reduce the severity of inflammatory damage.
targetString: Matumizi ya steroids: Ilivyofafanuliwa hapa juu, steroids ni vikandamizi vya kinga ambavyo hutumika sana kama tiba ya ziada kwa magonjwa ya kuambukizana ili kupunguza kiwango cha uharibifu wa kuchomeka.
en-mt: Use of steroids: Described above, steroids are protective stimulants that are widely used as complementary treatments for infectious diseases to reduce the rate of burnout damage.

sourceString: Since a high dosage of corticosteroids was widely used in severe SARS patients, many survivors suffered from avascular osteonecrosis with life-long disability and poor life quality.
targetString: Kwa vile dozi ya juu ya dawa zinazopunguza kuchomeka kwa viungo zilitumika sana kwa wagonjwa wa hali mbaya ya SARS, wengi wa wahasiriwa waliugua kutokana na ukosefu wa damu kwenye mifupa na ulemavu ya muda mrefu na hali mbaya ya maisha.
en-mt: As high doses of drugs that reduce organ insertion were widely used in patients of severe SARS conditions, many of the victims fell ill due to lack of blood in the bones and chronic disability and poor living conditions.

sourceString: Thus, if needed, steroids should be used at low dosage and for a short time in COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Hivyo, ikihitajika, steroids zinapaswa kutumika kwa dozi ya chini na kwa muda mfupi kwa wagonjwa wa COVID-19.
en-mt: So, if needed, steroids should be used at low doses and for short duration for COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: Mental stress: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients have suffered from extraordinary stress as they often endured long periods of quarantine and extreme uncertainty and witnessed the death of close family members and fellow patients.
targetString: Msongo wa akili: Kama ilivofafanuliwa hapa juu, wakati wa mkurupuko wa COVID-19 wagonjwa wengi waliugua kutokana na mfadhaiko usio wa kawaida kwa vile walistahimili vipindi virefu vya karantini na hali ya shauku na wakaona vifo vya wanafamilia wa karibu na wagonjwa wenzao.
en-mt: Mental Illness: As described above, during the COVID-19 outbreak many patients fell ill from unusually severe stress as they endured long periods of quarantine and a sense of passion and saw the deaths of close family members and fellow patients.

sourceString: It is imperative to provide psychological counseling and long-term support to help these patients recover from the stress and return to normal life.
targetString: Ni muhimu kutoa ushauri wa kisaikolojia na msaada wa muda mrefu ili kusaidia wagonjwa kupona kutokana na mfadhaiko na kurejelea hali ya kawaida ya maisha.
en-mt: It is important to provide psychological counselling and long-term support to help patients recover from depression and to resume normal living conditions.

sourceString: According to demographic studies so far, COVID-19 seems to have different epidemiological features from SARS.
targetString: Kulingana na utafiti wa kidemografia kufikia sasa, COVID-19 inaonekana kuwa na vipengele vya kiepidemiolojia tofauti na vya SARS.
en-mt: Based on demographic research so far, COVID-19 appears to have epidemiological features different from that of SARS.

sourceString: In addition to replicating in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can efficiently replicate in the upper respiratory tract and causes mild or no symptoms in the early phase of infection, similar to other CoVs that cause common colds.
targetString: Pamoja na kuzalishwa katika njia ya chini ya kupumua, SARS-CoV-2 inaweza kuzalishwa katika sehemu ya juu ya njia ya kupumua kwa ufanisi na kusababisha dalili za wastani au kutoonyesha dalili zozote katika awamu ya awali ya maambukizi, sawa na virusi vingine vya CoV vinavyosababisha homa kali.
en-mt: As well as being produced in the lower respiratory tract, SARS-CoV-2 can be produced in the upper part of the respiratory tract effectively causing moderate symptoms or not showing any symptoms in the initial phase of infection, similar to other CoV viruses that cause high fever.

sourceString: Therefore, infected patients at the early phase or incubation period can produce a large amount of virus during daily activities, causing great difficulty for the control of the epidemic.
targetString: Kwa hivyo, wagonjwa walioambukizwa katika awamu ya mapema au kipindi cha kuatamia wanaweza kuzalisha kiwango kikubwa cha virusi wakati wa shughuli za kila siku, kusababisha ugumu mkubwa kwa udhibiti wa janga.
en-mt: Thus, infected patients in the early phase or inoculation period can produce large amounts of the virus during daily operations, causing significant difficulties for pandemic control.

sourceString: However, the transmission of SARS-CoV was considered to occur when the patients are severely ill, while most transmission did not happen at the early phase.
targetString: Hata hivyo, usambazaji wa SARS-CoV ulizingatiwa kufanyika wakati wagonjwa ni wagonjwa vibaya sana, ingawa usambazaji mwingi haukufanyika katika awamu ya mapema.
en-mt: However, SARS-CoV distribution was observed to take place when patients are critically ill, although most of the distribution did not take place in the early phase.

sourceString: Thus, the current outbreak of COVID-19 is much more severe and difficult to control than the outbreak of SARS.
targetString: Hivyo, mkurupuko wa sasa wa COVID-19 ni mbaya zaidi na ni mgumu kudhibiti kuliko mkurupuko wa SARS.
en-mt: Thus, the current COVID-19 outbreak is more serious and difficult to control than the SARS outbreak.

sourceString: Great efforts are currently underway in China including the lockdown of Wuhan and surrounding cities and continuous quarantine of almost the entire population in hopes of interrupting the transmission of SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Juhudi kubwa zinaendelea kwa sasa nchini China ikiwa ni pamoja na kufungwa kwa shughuli za kawaida mjini Wuhan na miji iliyo karibu na kuendeleza karantini kwa karibu watu wote kwa matumaini ya kukatisha usambazaji wa SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Significant efforts are currently underway in China including a virtual lockdown in Wuhan and nearby cities and continuing quarantines for nearly all people in hopes of discouraging SARS-CoV-2 transmission.

sourceString: Although these actions have been dramatically damaging the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new patients is declining, indicating the slowdown of the epidemic.
targetString: Ingawa hatua hizi zimekuwa zikiharibu uchumi kwa njia mbaya na sekta zingine za nchi, idadi ya wagonjwa wapya inapungua na kuashiria kupungua kwa janga hili.
en-mt: Although these measures have been devastating to the economy and other sectors of the country, the number of new cases is decreasing and signaling a slowdown in the pandemic.

sourceString: The most optimistic estimate is that the outbreak will end by March and the downswing phase will last for 3-4 months.
targetString: Makadirio ya matumaini zaidi ni kwamba mkurupuko huu utakakwisha kufikia Machi na awamu ya athari zake kwake itadumu kwa miezi 3-4.
en-mt: The most optimistic estimate is that this outbreak will be over by March and the phase of its impact on him will last for 3-4 months.

sourceString: However, some other experts are not that optimistic.
targetString: Hata hivyo, baadhi ya wataalamu hawana matumaini sana.
en-mt: However, some experts are not so optimistic.

sourceString: Paul Hunter, et al., estimated that COVID-19, which seems substantially more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.
targetString: Paul Hunter na wenzake, walikadiria kwamba COVID-19, ambao kimsingi unaonekana kuambukiza zaidi ya SARS, hautaisha mwaka wa 2020.
en-mt: Paul Hunter and colleagues, estimated that COVID-19, which is primarily seen as more infectious than SARS, will not end in 2020.

sourceString: Ira Longini, et al., established a model to predict the outcome of the epidemic and suggested that SARS-CoV-2 could infect two-thirds of the global population.
targetString: Ira Longini na wenzake, waliunda utaratibu wa kutabiri matokeo ya janga hili na kupendekeza kwamba virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 huenda vikaambukiza thuluthi mbili ya watu kote ulimwenguni.
en-mt: Ira Longini and his colleagues created a mechanism to predict the outcome of the pandemic and suggested that the SARS-CoV-2 virus could infect two-thirds of people around the world.

sourceString: A Canadian group reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in both mid-turbinate and throat swabs of patients who recovered and left the hospital 2 weeks earlier, which indicates that the newly identified virus could become a cyclical episode similar to influenza.
targetString: Kikundi cha wanakanada waliripoti kwamba SARS-CoV-2 iligunduliwa katika vipimo vya mikondo ya hewa na koo vya wagonjwa waliopona na kutoka hospitalini wiki 2 mapema, jambo linaloashiria kwamba virusi vipya vilivyotambuliwa vinaweza kuwa vya vipindi vya kujirudia kama vile homa ya mafua.
en-mt: A group of Canadians reported that SARS-CoV-2 was detected in tests of air currents and throats of recovered patients and from the hospital 2 weeks earlier, suggesting that the newly identified virus may be of recurrence periods such as influenza.

sourceString: However, promising signs have occurred in China based on the declining number of new cases, indicating the current strategies might have been working.
targetString: Hata hivyo, ishara za matumaini zimetokea nchini China kwa msingi wa kupungua kwa idadi ya visa vipya, hii ikionyesha kwamba mikakati ya sasa huenda imekuwa ikifanya kazi.
en-mt: However, hopeful signs have emerged in China on the basis of a decline in the number of new cases, indicating that current strategies may have been working.

sourceString: Ebola was originally predicted to cause up to a million cases with half a million deaths.
targetString: Ebola ilitabiriwa awali kusababisha hadi visa milioni moja na vifo vya watu nusu milioni.
en-mt: Ebola was initially predicted to cause up to one million cases and half a million deaths.

sourceString: However, via strict quarantine and isolation, the disease has eventually been put under control.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kupitia kanuni madhubuti ya karantini na kutenga watu, ugonjwa huu hatimaye umedhibitiwa.
en-mt: However, through strict quarantine and isolation regulations, this disease has finally been brought under control.

sourceString: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that SARS-CoV-2 might become weaker in infectivity and eventually die down or become a less pathogenic virus co-existent with humans.
targetString: Inawezekana, sawa na SARS-CoV, kwamba virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 vinaweza kuwa dhaifu katika maambukizi na hatimaye kufa au kuwa na kiwango cha chini cha virusi vinavyoambukiza na iwe inapatikana miongoni mwa wanadamu.
en-mt: It is possible, similar to SARS-CoV, that the SARS-CoV-2 virus may be weak in infection and eventually die out or have a low level of infectious virus and be found among humans.

sourceString: A comparison of the epidemic of COVID-19 with that of SARS and MERS is provided below (Fig. ​(Fig.55).
targetString: Ulinganisho wa janga la COVID-19 na lile la SARS na MERS umetolewa hapa chini (Picha. ​(Picha.55).
en-mt: A comparison of the COVID-19 pandemic to that of SARS and MERS is given below (Images. (Photo.55).

sourceString: SARS-CoV-2 is highly transmittable through coughing or sneezing, and possibly also through direct contact with materials contaminated by the virus.
targetString: SARS-CoV-2 inasambazwa zaidi kupitia kikohozi au kupiga chafya na pia inaweza kusambazwa kupitia kugusana moja kwa moja na vifaa viliyochafuliwa na virusi.
en-mt: SARS-CoV-2 is mostly spread through coughing or sneezing and can also be transmitted through direct contact with virus-contaminated devices.

sourceString: The virus was also found in feces, which raises a new possibility of feces-to-mouth transmission.
targetString: Virusi hivi pia vilipatikana kwenye kinyesi jambo linaloibua uwezekano mpya wa usambazaji kutoka kwa kinyesi hadi mdomoni.
en-mt: This virus was also found in the feces which raises new possibilities for transmission from feces to the mouth.

sourceString: A recent study on 138 cases reported that 41% of the cases were possibly caused by nosocomial infections, including 17 patients with other prior diseases and 40 health-care providers.
targetString: Utafiti wa hivi majuzi kwa visa 138 uliripoti kwamba 41% ya visa vilisababishwa na maambukizi ndani ya hospitalini, ikiwa ni pamoja na wagonjwa 17 walio na magonjwa mengine ya awali na watoa huduma 40 wa matibabu.
en-mt: A recent study for 138 cases reported that 41% of cases were caused by infections inside the hospital, including 17 patients with other prior illnesses and 40 medical providers.

sourceString: Thus, great precaution should be used to protect humans, especially health-care providers, social workers, family members, colleagues, and even bystanders in contact with patients or infected people.
targetString: Kwa hivyo, tahadhari kubwa inapaswa kuchukuliwa ili kuwalinda binadamu, hasa watoa huduma ya afya, wafanyakazi wa jamii, wanafamilia, wafanyakazi wenza na hata watu wengine wanaowagusa wagonjwa au watu walioambukizwa.
en-mt: Therefore, great care should be taken to protect human beings, especially health care providers, social workers, family members, co-workers and even other people who touch sick or infected people.

sourceString: The first line of defense that could be used to lower the risk of infection is through wearing face masks; both the use of surgical masks and N95 respirator masks (series # 1860s) helps control the spread of viruses.
targetString: Hatua ya kwanza ya kujikinga inayoweza kutumika kupunguza hatari ya maambukizi ni kupitia kuvaa barakao za uso; kutumia barakoa za matibabu na barakoa za N95 za kusaidia pumu (matoleo ya # 1860) husaidia kudhibiti kuenea kwa virusi.
en-mt: The first preventive measure that can be used to reduce the risk of infection is through wearing face coverings; using medical masks and N95 asthma-relief masks (versions #1860) help control the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Surgical face masks prevent liquid droplets from a potentially infected individual from traveling through the air or sticking onto surfaces of materials, where they could be passed on to others.
targetString: Barakoa za uso za kimatibabu zinazuia matone ya majimaji kutoka wa mtu anayeweza kuwa ameambukizwa dhidi ya kusafirishwa hewani au kukwama kwenye sehemu za bidhaa, ambapo yanaweza kupitisha kwa watu wengine.
en-mt: Medical face masks prevent liquid droplets from being infected from being transported into the air or stuck in product surfaces, where they can pass to other people.

sourceString: However, only N95 (series # 1860s) masks can protect against the inhalation of virions as small as 10 to 80 nm, with only 5% of the virions being able to penetrate completely; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and both are approximately 85 nm.
targetString: Hata hivyo, barakoa za N95 pekee (matoleo ya # 1860) zinaweza kulinda dhidi ya kupumua ndani viini vidogo hata kwa vipimo vya 10 hadi 80 nm, huku 5% ya viini hivyo vikiweza kupenyeza kikamilifu; SARS-CoV-2 ni sawa na SARS-CoV kwa ukubwa na ni takriban 85 nm.
en-mt: However, only N95 masks (#1860 versions) can protect against breathing into small germs even at doses of 10 to 80 nm, with 5% of them fully penetrating; SARS-CoV-2 is similar to SARS-CoV in size and is approximately 85 nm.

sourceString: Since particles can penetrate even five surgical masks stacked together, health-care providers in direct contact with patients must wear N95 (series # 1860s) masks but not surgical masks.
targetString: Kwa vile vipande vidogo vinaweza kupenyeza hata barakoa tano zilizowekwa pamoja, watoa huduma ya afya wanaogusana na wagonjwa lazima wavae barakoa za N95 (matoleo ya # 1860) lakini sio barakoa za kimatibabu.
en-mt: Since small pieces can penetrate even five masks put together, health care providers in contact with patients must wear N95 masks (version #1860) but not medical masks.

sourceString: In addition to masks, health-care providers should wear fitted isolation gowns in order to further reduce contact with viruses.
targetString: Pamoja na barakoa, watoa huduma ya afya wanapaswa kuvaa magwanda yenye vipengele hitajika ili kupuguza zaidi mgusano na virusi.
en-mt: In addition to masks, health care providers should wear the required masks to further reduce contact with the virus.

sourceString: Viruses can also infect an individual through the eyes.
targetString: Virusi pia vinaweza kuathiri watu kupitia macho.
en-mt: The virus can also affect people through the eyes.

sourceString: On January 22, 2020, a doctor was infected with SARS-CoV-2 although he wore an N95 mask; the virus might have entered his body through his inflammatory eyes.
targetString: Mnamo tarehe 22 Januari 2020, daktari fulani aliambukizwa SARS-CoV-2 ingawa alivaa barakoa ya N95; huenda virusi viliingia mwilini mwake kupitia macho yake yaliyokuwa yakimwasha.
en-mt: On 22 January 2020, a certain doctor contracted SARS-CoV-2 even though he wore an N95 mask; The virus may have seeped into his body through his eyes that were lighting him up.

sourceString: Thus, health-care providers should also wear transparent face shields or goggles while working with patients.
targetString: Hivyo, watoa huduma ya afya wanapaswa pia kuvaa vikinga uso vinavyoona au miwani wakiwa wanashughulikia wagonjwa.
en-mt: Therefore, health care providers should also wear face shields or glasses while caring for patients.

sourceString: For the general public in affected or potentially affected areas, it is highly suggested that everybody wash their hands with disinfectant soaps more often than usual, try to stay indoors for self-quarantine and limit contact with potentially infected individuals.
targetString: Kwa jumla ya umma katika maeneo yaliyoathirika au yaliyo na uwezekano wa kuathirika, inapendekezwa sana kwamba kila mtu aoshe mikono yake kwa kutumia sabuni ya kusafisha nyingi kuliko kawaida, jaribu kukaa nyumbani kwa karantini ya kibinafsi na kupunguza kugusana na watu ambao huenda wameambukizwa.
en-mt: For the general public in affected or potentially vulnerable areas, it is highly recommended that everyone wash their hands with more sanitizing soap than usual, try to stay home for personal quarantine and limit contact with people who may have been infected.

sourceString: Three feet is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from a patient.
targetString: Mita tatu inazingatiwa kuwa ni umbali unaofaa kwa watu kukaa mbali ya mgonjwa.
en-mt: Three metres is considered an appropriate distance for people to stay away from the patient.

sourceString: These actions are effective methods to lower the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.
targetString: Hatua hizi ni njia zinazofaa za kupunguza hatari ya maambukizi pamoja na kuzuia kuenea kwa virusi.
en-mt: These measures are effective ways to reduce the risk of infection as well as prevent the spread of the virus.

sourceString: Although SARS-CoV-2 came as a new virus to the human world, its high homology to SARS-CoV as reported on 7 January 2020 should have caused high alert to China based on her deep memory of the SARS outbreak in 2003.
targetString: Ingawa virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 vilikuja kama virusi vipya kwa ulimwengu wa binadamu, kufanana sana kwake na SARS-CoV kama ilivyoripitwa tarehe 7 Januari 2020 kungepaswa kutoa tahadhari kubwa kwa China kutokana na kumbukumbu lao la mkurupuko wa SARS wa 2003.
en-mt: Although the SARS-CoV-2 virus came as a new virus to the human world, its strong similarity to SARS-CoV as it was called on 7 January 2020 should have drawn great attention to China given their reference to the 2003 SARS outbreak.

sourceString: However, not until 19 January 2020 did the director of the Center of Disease Control of Wuhan comfort the citizens by saying that the novel virus has low contagiousness and limited reproductivity from human to human and that it is not a problem to prevent and contain the disease.
targetString: Hata hivyo, ilikuwa hadi tarehe 19 Januari 2020 ambapo mkurugenzi wa Kituo cha Kudhibiti Magonjwa cha Wuhan aliwafariji wananchi kwa kusema kwamba virusi hivi vipya vina viwango vya chini vya maambukizi na uwezo wa chini wa kuzalishana kutoka kwa mtu hadi mwingine na kwamba si tatizo kuzuia na kudhibiti ugonjwa huu.
en-mt: However, it was not until 19 January 2020 that the director of the Wuhan Centre for Disease Control comforted the public by saying that the new virus has low infection rates and low ability to produce from person to person and that it is not a problem to prevent and control the disease.

sourceString: This message remarkably relaxed the alarm of the public, especially when the entire country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and the critical time was missed to contain the disease at its minimal scale in Wuhan.
targetString: Ujumbe huu ulipunguza pakubwa wasiwasi wa umma, haswa wakati nchi nzima ilikuwa ikijiandaa kwa Tamasha la Spring, na walikosa kukabiliana na ugonjwa huo wakati haukuwa umeenea zaidi Wuhan.
en-mt: This message greatly eased public concerns, especially as the rest of the country was preparing for the Spring Festival, and they failed to deal with the disease when it was no longer more prevalent in Wuhan.

sourceString: The disease control agencies in China may take this hard lesson and make critical improvements in the future.
targetString: Mashirika ya kudhibiti ugonjwa nchini China yanaweza kujutia hili na kufanya uboreshaji muhimu siku za usoni.
en-mt: Disease control agencies in China may regret this and make important improvements in the future.

sourceString: For example, these agencies should be (1) more careful when making public announcements as every word counts to citizens and can change their attitude and decisions; (2) more sensitive and reactive to unusual information from clinics rather than waiting for formal reports from doctors or officials; (3) more restrictive to contain a potential epidemic at its early stage rather than attempting to comfort the public; and (4) more often to issue targeted and effective drills to increase the public's awareness about epidemic diseases and to test and improve the response system of the society periodically.
targetString: Kwa mfano, mashirika haya yanapaswa kuwa (1) makini zaidi yanapofanya matangazo ya umma kwa sababu kila neno lina maana kwa wananchi na linaweza kubadilisha mitazamo na maamuzi yao; (2) kuwa makini zaidi na kuchukulia hatua taarifa zisizo za kawaida kutoka katika kliniki kuliko kusubiri kupokea ripoti rasmi kutoka kwa madaktari au maafisa; (3) kuweka vikwazo zaidi ili kudhibiti uwezekano wa kutokea janga katika awamu yake ya awali kuliko kujaribu kuifariji umma na (4) mra kwa mara kutoa majaribio faafu zaidi ili kuongeza ufahamu wa umma kuhusu magonjwa ya janga na kujaribu kuboresha mfumo wa majibu ya jamii muda baada ya muda.
en-mt: For example, these organizations should be (1) more careful when making public announcements because every word has meaning for citizens and can change their attitudes and decisions; (2) be more careful to react to abnormal reports from clinics than to wait for the receipt of official reports from doctors or officials; (3) impose more restrictions to control the possibility of a pandemic in its initial phase than to try to comfort the public and (4) MRA by consistently providing more effective experiments to increase public awareness of epidemic diseases and to try to improve the social response system time after time.

sourceString: The outbreak of COVID-19 caused by the novel virus SARS-CoV-2 started in the end of December 2019.
targetString: Mkurupuko wa COVID-19 uliosababishwa na virusi vipya vya SARS-CoV-2 ulianza mwishoni mwa Disemba 2019.
en-mt: The COVID-19 outbreak caused by the new SARS-CoV-2 virus began in late December 2019.

sourceString: In less than two months, it has spread all over China and near 50 other countries globally at the time of this writing.
targetString: Katika muda wa chini ya miezi miwili, ugonjwa umeenea kote nchini China na karibu nchi nyingine 50 kote ulimwenguni kufikia wakati huu tunapoandika.
en-mt: In less than two months, the disease has spread across China and nearly 50 other countries around the world by this time as we write.

sourceString: Since the virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and the symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the outbreak of COVID-19 has created a sense of SARS recurring.
targetString: Kwa vile virusi hivi vinafanana sana na SARS-CoV na dalili pia ni sawa kati ya COVID-19 na SARS, mkurupuko wa COVID-19 umesababisha dhana ya kutokea tena kwa SARS.
en-mt: Since this virus is very similar to SARS-CoV and symptoms are also similar between COVID-19 and SARS, the COVID-19 outbreak has led to the hypothesis of SARS recurrence.

sourceString: However, there are some remarkable differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are essential for containing the epidemic and treating the patients.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kuna baadhi ya tofauti za kimsingi kati ya COVID-19 na SARS, ambazo ni muhimu katika kudhibiti janga hili na kutibu wagonjwa.
en-mt: However, there are some fundamental differences between COVID-19 and SARS, which are important in controlling the pandemic and treating patients.

sourceString: COVID-19 affects more elderly individuals than youth and more men than women, and the severity and death rate are also higher in elderly individual than in youth.
targetString: COVID-19 inaathiri zaidi watu wazee kuliko vijana na wanaume zaidi kuliko wanawake na uzito wake na viwango vya vifo viko juu miongoni mwa watu wazee kuliko vijana.
en-mt: COVID-19 affects more older people than young people and men more than women and its weight and mortality rates are higher among older people than younger people.

sourceString: SARS has higher mortality than COVID-19 (10.91% versus 1.44%).
targetString: SARS inasababisha vifo kwa asilimia ya juu kuliko COVID-19 (10.91% dhidi ya 1.44%).
en-mt: SARS is causing deaths at a higher percentage than COVID-19 (10.91% vs. 1.44%).
