targetString: Mashirika ya serikali kimataifa zinashughulikia athari za kiuchumi na ya kijamii ya hali ya hatari ya COVID-19.
en-mt: Government agencies internationally are addressing the economic and social impacts of the COVID-19 state of emergency.

sourceString: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development has launched a platform to provide timely and comprehensive information on policy responses in countries around the world, as well as viewpoints and advice.
targetString: Shirika la Muungano wa Kiuchumi na Maendeleo imeanzisha jukwaa ya kutoa taarifa kwa wakati na kamili ya mwitikio wa sera katika nchi kote ulimwenguni, pamoja na maoni na mashauri.
en-mt: The Organization for Economic and Development Coalition has established a platform for timely and comprehensive reporting of policy responses in countries around the world, as well as feedback and consultations.

sourceString: From policies to strengthen health systems and the world economy to addressing the effects of lockdown and restrictions on travel, the digital hub includes a Country Policy Tracker, and aims to help countries learn from each other and to facilitate a co-ordinated global response to the coronavirus challenge.
targetString: Kutoka sera za kuimarisha mifumo ya afya na uchumi wa dunia kushughulikia madhara ya kufungwa kwa shughuli za kawaida kwa muda na vikwazo vya usafiri, kituo cha kidijitali ina Ufuatiliaji wa Sera za Nchi, na inalenga kusaidia nchi kujifunza kutoka nchi zingine na kuwezesha mwitikio uliopangwa wa kimataifa kwa changamoto ya virusi vya korona.
en-mt: From policies to strengthen health systems and the global economy to addressing the effects of temporary lockdowns and travel restrictions, the digital channel has Country Policy Tracking, and aims to help countries learn from other countries and facilitate a planned global response to the coronavirus challenge.

sourceString: The Chinese government has been criticized by the United States, UK Minister for the Cabinet Office Michael Gove, and Brazil President Jair Bolsonaro's son Eduardo Bolsonaro for its handling of the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.
targetString: Serikali ya Uchina imelaumiwa na Marekani, Waziri wa Ofisi ya Waziri Uingereza Michael Gove, na Eduardo Bolsonaro mwana wa Rais wa Brazil Jair Bolsonaro kwa kushughulikia janga hili, ambayo ilianza katika mkoa wa Uchina wa Hubei.
en-mt: The Chinese government has been blamed by the United States, British Cabinet Office Minister Michael Gove, and Eduardo Bolsonaro son of Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro for handling the pandemic, which began in the Chinese province of Hubei.

sourceString: A number of provincial-level administrators of the Communist Party of China (CPC) were dismissed over their handling of the quarantine efforts in Central China, a sign of discontent with the political establishment's response to the outbreak in those regions.
targetString: Baadhi ya wasimamizi katika mkoa wa Chama cha Kikomunisti ya Uchina (CPC) walifutwa kufuatia jinsi walishughulikia juhudi za karantini Uchini wa kati, ishara ya kutoridhika na mwitikio wa wanasiasa kwa mkurupuko katika maeneo hayo.
en-mt: Some supervisors in the Communist Party of China (CPC) region were sacked following their handling of the quarantine efforts in the Central Plains, a sign of dissatisfaction with politicians' response to the outbreak in those areas.

sourceString: Some commentators believe that this move was intended to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from the public's anger over the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Watangazaji wengine wanaamini kuwa msimamo huu ilikuwa ya kulinda katibu mkuu wa Chama cha Kikomunisti ya Uchina Xi Jinping kutoka hasira ya umma juu ya mkurupuko wa virusi vya korona.
en-mt: Some broadcasters believe this stance was to protect Chinese Communist Party general secretary Xi Jinping from public anger over the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: Some Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian rejected an earlier acknowledgement of the coronavirus outbreak starting in Wuhan, in favour of conspiracy theories about the COVID-19 originating from the U.S. or Italy.
targetString: Ofisa wengine wa Uchina, k.m. Zhao Lijian alikataa kukiri mwanzo wa mkurupuko wa virusi vya korona hapo awali Wuhan, na kukubali nadharia za njama kuhusu COVID-19 kutokea kwanza Marekani au Italia.
en-mt: Other Chinese officials, e.g. Zhao Lijian, refused to acknowledge the beginning of the coronavirus outbreak in the past Wuhan, and accepted conspiracy theories about COVID-19 to occur first in the United States or Italy.

sourceString: The U.S. administration of Donald Trump has referred to the coronavirus as "Chinese virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that China's "censorship supercharged a virus that has now turned into a global pandemic", which has in turn been criticized by some critics as racism and "distract[ing] from his administration's failure to contain the disease".
targetString: Utawala wa Marekani ya Donald Trump ilitaja virusi vya korona kama "virusi vya Uchina" au "virusi vya Wuhan" wakisema kuwa "udhibiti wa taarifa Uchina ilianzisha virusi ambayo sasa imebadilika kuwa janga la kimataifa", ambayo imekosolewa na baadhi ya wakosoaji kama ubaguzi wa rangi na "kukengeusha fikira kutoka kushindwa kwa utawala wake kudhibiti ugonjwa huo".
en-mt: Donald Trump's US administration referred to the coronavirus as the "China virus" or "Wuhan virus" saying that "the censorship of information China introduced a virus that has now evolved into a global pandemic", which has been criticised by some critics as racist and "a distraction from his administration's failure to control the disease".

sourceString: The Daily Beast obtained a U.S. government cable outlining a communications stratagem with apparent origins in the National Security Council, with the strategy being quoted as "Everything is about China.
targetString: Tovuti ya serikali ya Marekani The Daily Beast inayoeleza mbinu za utangazaji inayoaminiwa kutoka kwa Tume ya Kimataifa ya Usalama, na mbinu ikisemekana kuwa "Kila kitu ni kuhusu Uchina.
en-mt: The US government website The Daily Beast describes the methods of publicity believed to come from the International Security Commission, with the methodology being said to be "Everything is about China.

sourceString: We're being told to try and get this messaging out in any way possible, including press conferences and television appearances."Outlets such as Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have claimed that China's efforts to send aid to virus-stricken countries is part of a propaganda push for global influence.
targetString: Tunaambiwa kujaribu kutoa ujumbe huu kwa njia yoyote iwezekanayo, ikiwemo mikutano na waandishi wa habari na katika televisheni."Vyombo vya habari kama Politico, Foreign Policy, na Bloomberg zimesema kuwa juhudi za Uchina kutuma msaada kwa nchi zilizoathiriwa na virusi ni kueneza propaganda ya ushawishi wa kimataifa.
en-mt: We are told to try to deliver this message in any way possible, including press conferences and on television." Media outlets like Politico, Foreign Policy, and Bloomberg have argued that China's efforts to send aid to virus-hit countries are spreading propaganda of international influence.

sourceString: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there is "a geo-political component including a struggle for influence through spinning and the 'politics of generosity'".
targetString: Mkubwa wa sera za nchi za kigeni wa EU Josep Borrell alionya kuwa kuna "sehemu ya mawasiliano ya kimataifa ikiwemo mapambano ya ushawishi kupitia uvumi na 'siasa za ukarimu'".
en-mt: EU foreign policy chief Josep Borrell warned that there was "a cross-section of international contacts including the struggle for influence through speculation and 'politics of generosity'".

sourceString: Borrell also said that "China is aggressively pushing the message that, unlike the US, it is a responsible and reliable partner."
targetString: Borrell alisema pia kuwa "Uchina inatoa ujumbe kwa nguvu kuwa, tofauti na Marekani, ni mshiriki anayewajibika na kuaminika."
en-mt: Borrell also said that "China is giving a strong message that, unlike the United States, it is a responsible and reliable participant."

sourceString: China has also called for the US to lift its sanctions off of Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while reportedly sending aid to the latter two countries.
targetString: Uchina pia imetaka Marekani kuondoa vikwazo dhidi ya Syria, Venezuela na Irani, ilhali inasemekana kuwa wanatuma msaada kwa nchi mbili za mwisho zilizotajwa.
en-mt: China has also demanded that the US lift sanctions on Syria, Venezuela and Iran, while they are said to be sending aid to the last two countries mentioned.

sourceString: Jack Ma's donation of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by US sanctions on 3 April.
targetString: Msaada wa Jack Ma ya barakoa 100,000 kuelekea Cuba ilizuiliwa na vikwazo vya Marekani tarehe 3 Aprili.
en-mt: Jack Ma's aid of 100,000 masks to Cuba was blocked by the U.S. embargo on April 3.

sourceString: US authorities have also been accused of diverting aid meant for other nations to their own country.
targetString: Mamlaka za Marekani pia zimelaumiwa kwa kuchukuwa msaada iliyotolewa kwa nchi zingine kuelekea nchi yao.
en-mt: U.S. authorities have also been accused of taking aid given to other countries towards their own country.

sourceString: And there have been mask-related disputes reported between other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.
targetString: Na kumekuwa na mabishano yanayohusiana na barakoa zilizoripotiwa na nchi zingine, kama vile Ujerumani, Austria na Uswisi; na Jamhuri ya Czech na Italia.
en-mt: And there have been controversies related to masks reported by other countries, such as Germany, Austria and Switzerland; and the Czech Republic and Italy.

sourceString: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of ventilators destined for Spain.
targetString: Zaidi ya hayo, Uturuki ilinasa mamia ya vifaa vya kusaidia kupumua zilizokuwa zinaelekea Uhispania.
en-mt: In addition, Turkey seized hundreds of breathing aids destined for Spain.

sourceString: In early March, the Italian government criticized the European Union's lack of solidarity with coronavirus-affected Italy.
targetString: Mwanzoni wa Machi, serikali ya Italia ililaumu ukosefu wa ushikamano wa Umoja wa Ulaya na nchi iliyoathirika na virusi vya korona virus ya Italia.
en-mt: In early March, the Italian government blamed the EU's lack of solidarity with the country affected by the Italian virus.

sourceString: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "Only China responded bilaterally.
targetString: Maurizio Massari, balozi wa Italia katika EU, alisema kuwa "Uchina pekee ilitoa majibu kati ya nchi hizo mbili.
en-mt: Maurizio Massari, Italy's ambassador to the EU, said that "China alone provided a response between the two countries.

sourceString: Certainly, this is not a good sign of European solidarity."
targetString: Kwa hakika, hii sio ishara nzuri kwa ushikamano wa Ulaya.
en-mt: This is certainly not a good sign for European solidarity.

sourceString: On 22 March, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian president Vladimir Putin arranged the Russian army to send military medics, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical equipment to Italy.
targetString: Tarehe 22 Machi, baada ya mawasiliano ya simu na Waziri Mkuu wa Italia Giuseppe Conte, Rais wa Urusi Vladimir Putin alipanga jeshi la Urusi kutuma madaktari wa kijeshi, gari maalum za kuua viini vya magonjwa, na vifaa vingine vya kimatibabu kuelekea Italia.
en-mt: On March 22, after a phone call with Italian Prime Minister Giuseppe Conte, Russian President Vladimir Putin arranged for the Russian military to send military doctors, special disinfection vehicles, and other medical supplies to Italy.

sourceString: Italy's La Stampa newspaper cited an anonymous "high-level political source" that 80 percent of Russia's aid was "useless or of little use to Italy".
targetString: Gazeti la Italia ya La Stampa ilinukuu taarifa na mtu asiyetambulika "katika nyanja za juu ya kisiasa" kuwa asilimia 80 ya msaada wa Urusi "haikuwa ya kufaa au kwa manufaa chache kwa Italia".
en-mt: The Italian newspaper La Stampa quoted a statement by an unidentified person "in the highest political spheres" that 80 percent of Russia's support "was not suitable or of limited benefit to Italy".

sourceString: The source accused Russia of embarking on a "geopolitical and diplomatic" charm offensive.
targetString: Aliyetoa taarifa hiyo alilaumu Urusi kwa kuanzisha vita vya "kisiasa na kidiplomasia".
en-mt: The ombudsman blamed Russia for waging a "political and diplomatic" war.

sourceString: The President of Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, and Italian Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.
targetString: Rais wa Lombardy, Attilio Fontana, na Waziri wa Mashauri ya Kigeni Luigi Di Maio alipuuza ripoti hizo za vyombo vya habari na kutoa shukrani zao.
en-mt: Lombardy's president, Attilio Fontana, and Foreign Minister Luigi Di Maio dismissed the media reports and expressed their gratitude.

sourceString: Russia also sent a cargo plane with medical aid to the United States.
targetString: Urusi pia ilituma ndege ya mizigo iliyobeba msaada wa kimatibabu hadi Marekani.
en-mt: Russia also sent a cargo plane carrying medical aid to the United States.

sourceString: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when offering assistance to US colleagues, [Putin] assumes that when US manufacturers of medical equipment and materials gain momentum, they will also be able to reciprocate if necessary."
targetString: Msemaji wa Kremlin Dmitry Peskov alisema kuwa "wakati wa kutoa msaada kwa washirika Marekani, [Putin] hudhani kuwa wakati watengenezaji wa vifaa na zana za kimatibabu wa Marekani wakipata kasi, wataweza pia kusaidia baadaye kama inahitajika."
en-mt: Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said that "when it comes to providing support to allies in the United States, [Putin] assumes that while U.S. equipment and medical equipment manufacturers gain momentum, they will also be able to help later as needed."

sourceString: The planned NATO "Defender 2020" military exercise in Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, the largest NATO war exercise since the end of the Cold War, will be held on a reduced scale.
targetString: Shughuli ya kijeshi ya "Utetezi 2020" ya NATO Ujerumani, Poland, na mataifa ya Baltiki, hali ya vita vya NATO kubwa zaidi tangu kumalizika kwa Vita Baridi, zitafanywa kwa kiwango kilichopunguzwa.
en-mt: The "Defense 2020" military operations of NATO Germany, Poland, and the Baltic states, NATO's largest state of war since the end of the Cold War, will be conducted at a reduced rate.

sourceString: The Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament's general secretary Kate Hudson criticized the Defender 2020 exercise: "In the current public-health crisis, it jeopardizes the lives not only of the troops from the US and the many European countries participating but the inhabitants of the countries in which they are operating."The Iranian government has been heavily affected by the virus, with around two dozen parliament members infected as well as fifteen other current or former political figures.
targetString: Katibu Mkuu wa Kampeni ya Upunguzaji wa Sila za Vita za Nyuklia Kate Hudson alilaumu shughuli ya Utetezi 2020: "Katika hali ya hatari ya sasa ya afya ya umma, inahatarisha si maisha ya jeshi pekee kutoka Marekani na nchi za Ulaya kadhaa zinazohusika bali pia wakzai wa nchi wanakofanya operesheni."Serikali ya Irani imeathirika sana na virusi, na takriban wabunge ishirini na nne wameambukizwa pamoja na wanasiasa kuni na tano wa sasa au wa kitambo.
en-mt: Secretary-General of the Campaign for the Reduction of Nuclear War Weapons Kate Hudson blamed the Advocacy 2020 activity: "In the face of current public health risks, it endangers not only the lives of military personnel from the United States and several European countries involved but also the members of the country where they are operating." The Iranian government has been hit hard by the virus, with about twenty-four members of parliament infected along with five current or former politicians.

sourceString: Iran's President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on 14 March 2020, saying that his country is struggling to fight the outbreak due to lack of access to international markets as a result of the United States sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has prompted calls for the United States to adopt social policies common in other wealthy countries, including universal health care, universal child care, paid family leave, and higher levels of funding for public health.
targetString: Rais wa Irani Hassan Rouhani aliandika barua ya umma kwa viongozi wa dunia akiomba msaada tarehe 14 Machi 2020, akisema kuwa nchi yake inajitahidi kukumbana na mkurupuko kwa sababu ya kutofikia soko za kimataifa kufuatia vikwazao vya Marekani dhidi ya Irani.Mkurupuko imesababisha wito kwa Marekani kuchukua sera za kijamii ambazo ni za kawaida katika nchi zingine zenye mali, ikiwemo huduma za afya kwa umma, utunzaji wa umma ya watoto, likizo iliyolipwa ya familia, na viwango vya juu ya ufadhili wa afya ya umma.
en-mt: Iranian President Hassan Rouhani wrote a public letter to world leaders asking for help on March 14, 2020, saying that his country is struggling to cope with an outbreak because of the lack of access to international markets following US sanctions against Iran.The outbreak has led to calls for the US to adopt social policies that are common in other affluent countries.  including public health care, public child care, paid family leave, and high levels of public health funding.

sourceString: Political analysts anticipated it may negatively affect Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea worsened due to the pandemic.
targetString: Wachambuzi wa kisiasa walitarajia huenda ikaathiri vibaya uwezekano wa Donald Trump kuchaguliwa tena katika uchaguzi wa rais wa 2020.Uhusiano wa kidiplomasia kati ya Japan na Korea Kusini zilikuwa mbaya zaidi kwa sababu ya janga hili.
en-mt: Political analysts expected it could negatively impact Donald Trump's chances of re-election in the 2020 presidential election.Diplomatic relations between Japan and South Korea were even worse because of the pandemic.

sourceString: South Korea criticized Japan's "ambiguous and passive quarantine efforts" after Japan announced anybody coming from South Korea will be placed in two weeks' quarantine at government-designated sites.
targetString: Korea Kusini ilishutumu juhudi za Japan "zisizoeleweka vizuri na kutoshughulika za karantini" baada ya Japan kutangaza kila mtu anayetoka Korea Kusini atawekwa katika karantini kwa muda wa wiki mbili katika vituo vya serikali.
en-mt: South Korea denounced Japan's "poorly understood and ineffective quarantine efforts" after Japan announced everyone leaving South Korea would be quarantined for two weeks in government facilities.

sourceString: The South Korean society was initially polarized on President Moon Jae-in's response to the crisis.
targetString: Jamii ya Korea Kusini iligawanyika mwanzoni kwa itikio la Rais Moon Jae-in kwa hali ya hatari.
en-mt: South Korean society was divided at first by President Moon Jae-in's reaction to the state of emergency.

sourceString: Many Koreans signed petitions either calling for the impeachment of Moon over what they claimed to be government mishandling of the outbreak, or praising his response.The pandemic has allowed countries to pass emergency legislation in response.
targetString: Raia wa Korea wengi walitia sahihi maombi yaliyotaka kuondolewa kwa Moon juu ya madai ya serikali kutoshughulikia vyema mkurupuko, au kusifu mwitikio wake.Janga hili limeruhusu nchi kupitisha sheria za dharura kwa mwitikio.
en-mt: Many Koreans signed petitions calling for Moon's removal over the government's alleged mishandling of the outbreak, or praised his response. The pandemic has allowed states to pass emergency laws in response.

sourceString: Some commentators have expressed concerns that it could allow governments to strengthen their grip on power.
targetString: Watangazaji wengine wametoa maoni kuwa ingeruhusu serikali kuimarisha uongozi wao mamlakani.
en-mt: Other broadcasters have commented that it would allow the government to consolidate their grip on power.

sourceString: In Hungary, its parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule by decree indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those deemed to have spread false information about the virus and the government's handling of the crisis.
targetString: Huko Hungary, bunge ilipiga kura kuruhusu waziri mkuu, Viktor Orbán, kuongoza kisheria kwa muda usiojulikana, kusimamisha bunge pamoja na uchaguzi na kuadhibu wale walioonekana kueneza taarifa za uongo kuhusu virusi na usimamizi wa serikali kwa hali ya hatari.
en-mt: In Hungary, parliament voted to allow the prime minister, Viktor Orbán, to rule legally indefinitely, suspend parliament as well as elections and punish those who appeared to spread false information about the virus and government management of the state of emergency.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of supply shortages, stemming from globally increased usage of equipment to fight the outbreaks, panic buying, and disruption to factory and logistic operations.
targetString: Mkurupuko wa virusi vya korona imelaumiwa kwa matukio kadhaa ya kukosekana kwa bidhaa,
en-mt: The coronavirus outbreak has been blamed for several instances of product shortages,

sourceString: The United States Food and Drug Administration has issued warnings about shortages of drugs and medical equipment due to increased consumer demand and supplier disruption.
targetString: Usimamizi wa Chakula na Dawa wa Marekani ulitoa ilani kuhusu upungufu wa dawa na vifaa vya kimatibabu kutokana na kuongezeka kwa hitaji kutoka kwa watumiaji na kuvurugwa kwa usambazaji wa bidhaa.
en-mt: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration issued notices regarding shortages of medicines and medical supplies due to increased demand from consumers and disruptions in product supply.

sourceString: Several localities also witnessed panic buying that led to shelves being cleared of grocery essentials such as food, toilet paper, and bottled water, inducing supply shortages.
targetString: Maeneo mengi pia yalishuhudia watu kununua kwa hofu jambo lililosababisha maduka kukosa bidhaa muhimu za kama vile vyakula, karatasi shashi na maji ya chupa na kuibua upungufu wa usambazaji wa bidhaa.
en-mt: Many areas also saw people buying in panic which led to stores missing essential goods such as groceries, paper and bottled water, and caused a shortage of supplies.

sourceString: The technology industry in particular has been warning about delays to shipments of electronic goods.
targetString: Sekta ya teknolojia hasa imekuwa ikitoa tahadhari kuhusu kuchelewa kusafarishwa kwa bidhaa za kielektroniki.
en-mt: The tech sector in particular has been sounding the alarm about the delay in the rollout of electronic products.

sourceString: According to WHO director-general Tedros Adhanom, the demand for personal protection equipment has risen 100-fold.
targetString: Kwa mujibu wa mkurugenzi mkuu wa WHO, Tedros Adhanom, hitaji la vifaa vya kujilinda kibinafsi limeongezeka mara 100.
en-mt: According to WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom, the need for personal protective equipment has increased 100-fold.

sourceString: This demand has led to the increase in prices of up to twenty times the normal price and also induced delays on the supply of medical items for four to six months.
targetString: Hitaji hili limesababisha kuongezeka kwa bei kwa hadi mara ishirini ya bei ya kawaida na pia kusababisha kuchelewa kwa usmbazaji wa vifaa vya kimatibabu kwa kati ya miezi minne na sita.
en-mt: This requirement has led to price increases of up to twenty times the normal price and also led to delays in the supply of medical equipment for between four and six months.

sourceString: It has also caused a shortage of personal protective equipment worldwide, with the WHO warning that this will endanger health workers.
targetString: Imesababisha pia ukosefu wa vifaa za kujikinga kibinafsi duniani, na WHO kuonya kuwa hii itahatarisha wafanyakazi wa afya.
en-mt: It has also led to a global shortage of personal protective equipment, with the WHO warning that this would endanger health workers.

sourceString: In Australia, the pandemic provided a new opportunity for daigou shoppers to sell Australian products into China.
targetString: Nchini Australia, janga hili kubwa lilitoa fursa mpya kwa wauzaji wa bidhaa nje ya nchi kuuza bidhaa kutoka Australia nchini China.
en-mt: In Australia, the pandemic created new opportunities for exporters to export products from Australia to China.

sourceString: The activity has created a shortage of baby formula in some supermarkets and was subsequently banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and the Wuhan region, and the ensuing high demand for food products, both areas have been spared from acute food shortages.
targetString: Shughuli hiyo imesababisha upungufu wa chakula cha watoto katika baadhi ya maduka makubwa na hivyo ilipigwa marufuku na serikali ya Australia.Licha ya kuenea pakubwa kwa visa vya COVID-19 katika maeneo ya Italia ya Kaskazini na Wuhan, na kuendelea kua kwa hitaji la bidhaa za chakula, sehemu hizo mbili zimesazwa katika upungufu mkubwa wa chakula.
en-mt: The activity has led to a shortage of children's food in some supermarkets and was therefore banned by the Australian government.Despite the high prevalence of COVID-19 cases in Northern Italy and Wuhan, and the continued demand for food products, the two areas have been caught up in severe food shortages.

sourceString: Measures by China and Italy against the hoarding and illicit trade of critical products have been successful, avoiding acute food shortages that were anticipated in Europe as well as in North America.
targetString: Hatua za Uchina na Italia dhidi ya kuhodhi na biashara haramu ya bidhaa muhimu zimefanikiwa, na kuzuia ukosefu mkubwa wa vyakula zilizotarajiwa Ulaya na Marekani Kaskazini vilevile.
en-mt: Chinese and Italian measures against the hoarding and illegal trade of essential commodities have been successful, preventing the severe food shortages expected in Europe and North America as well.

sourceString: Northern Italy with its significant agricultural production has not seen a large reduction, but prices may increase according to industry representatives.
targetString: Italia Kaskazini na uzalishaji wake mkubwa wa bidhaa za kilimo haijapata upungufu mkubwa, lakini bei huenda ikapanda kulingana na wawakilishi wa viwanda.
en-mt: Northern Italy with its large production of agricultural products has not experienced a major shortage, but prices are likely to rise, according to industry representatives.

sourceString: Empty food shelves were only encountered temporarily, even in Wuhan city, while Chinese government officials released pork reserves to assure sufficient nourishment of the population.
targetString: Ukosefu wa vyakula dukani ulishuhudiwa kwa muda tu, hata katika jiji la Wuhan, huku maafisa wa Serikali ya Uchina wakitoa hifadhi za nyama ya nguruwe ili kuhakikishia watu kuwepo kwa chakula cha kutosha.
en-mt: Store food shortages were only seen for a while, even in Wuhan, with Chinese government officials providing pork stocks to reassure people of adequate food.

sourceString: Similar laws exist in Italy requiring food producers to keep reserves for such emergencies.
targetString: Sheria kama hizo pia zipo Italia zinazohitaji wazalishaji wa vyakula kuweka akiba kwa hali ya dharura kama huu.
en-mt: Similar laws also exist in Italy requiring food producers to save for emergencies like this.

sourceString: Damage to the global economy has been felt in China: according to a media report on 16 March, the economy in China was very hard hit in the first two months of 2020 due to the measures taken by the government to curtail virus spread, and retail sales plunged 20.5%.
targetString: Kuharibika kwa uchumi wa kimataifa kumekuwa na athari mbaya nchini China: kulingana na ripoti ya vyombo vya habari ya tarehe 16 Machi, uchumi wa China uliathirika pakubwa katika miezi miwili ya kwanza ya 2020 kwa sababu ya hatua zilizochukuliwa na serikali kupunguza kuenea kwa virusi na mauzo ya rejareja yalipungua kwa 20.5%.
en-mt: The global economic slowdown has had a devastating impact on China: according to a press report dated March 16th, China's economy suffered significantly in the first two months of 2020 because of measures taken by the government to limit the spread of the virus and retail sales fell by 20.5%.

sourceString: As mainland China is a major economy and manufacturing hub, the viral outbreak has been seen to pose a major destabilizing threat to the global economy.
targetString: Kwa vile eneo la bara la China ni kitovu kikuu cha uchumi na viwanda, mkurupuko wa virusi hivi umeonekana kusababisha athari kuu ya kuyumbisha uchumi wa kimataifa.
en-mt: As the Chinese mainland is a major economic and industrial hub, the outbreak of this virus has been seen to have a major destabilizing effect on the global economy.

sourceString: Agathe Demarais of the Economist Intelligence Unit has forecast that markets will remain volatile until a clearer image emerges on potential outcomes.
targetString: Agathe Demarais kutoka Kitengo cha Economist Intelligence ametabiri kwamba soko zitasalia kutokuwa thabiti hadi picha wazi zaidi iibuke kuhusu matokeo yanayowezekana.
en-mt: Agathe Demarais from the Economist Intelligence Unit has predicted that the markets will remain unstable until a clearer picture emerges of a possible outcome.

sourceString: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout of the epidemic on global growth could surpass that of the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.
targetString: Mnamo Januari 2020, baadhi ya wachanganuzi walikadiria kuwa mporomoko wa kiuchumi kutokana na janga hili kubwa kwenye ukuaji wa kimataifa unaweza kupita ule uliosababishwa na mkurupuko wa 2002–2004 SARS.
en-mt: In January 2020, some analysts estimated that the economic fallout from this major pandemic in global growth could surpass that caused by the 2002–2004 SARS outbreak.

sourceString: One estimate from an expert at Washington University in St. Louis gave a $300+ billion impact on the world's supply chain that could last up to two years.
targetString: Makadirio fulani kutoka kwa mtaalamu kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Washington kule St. Louis yalitoa athari ya zaidi ya dola bilioni $300+ kwenye usambazaji wa bidhaa ulimwenguni ambao ungedumu hadi miaka miwili.
en-mt: Some estimates from an expert from Washington University in St. Louis gave an impact of more than $300+ billion on global supply of goods that would last up to two years.

sourceString: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) reportedly "scrambled" after a steep decline in oil prices due to lower demand from China.
targetString: Shirika la Mataifa Yanayouza Mafuta (OPEC) imaripotiwa kuwa "ilitapatapa" baada ya kushuka sana kwa bei za mafuta kutokana na hitaji la chini kutoka China.
en-mt: The Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC) has reportedly "recovered" after a sharp drop in oil prices due to lower demand from China.

sourceString: Global stock markets fell on 24 February due to a significant rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.
targetString: Masoko duniani zilipungua biashara tarehe 24 Februari kwa sababu ya kuongezeka sana kwa nambari ya visa vya COVID-19 nje ya Uchina bara.
en-mt: Global markets slowed trading on February 24 due to a sharp rise in the number of COVID-19 cases outside mainland China.

sourceString: On 27 February, due to mounting worries about the coronavirus outbreak, various U.S. stock indexes including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500 Index, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted their sharpest falls since 2008, with the Dow falling 1,191 points, the largest one-day drop since the financial crisis of 2007–08.
targetString: Tarehe 27 Februari, kwa sababu ya kuongezeka kwa wasiwasi kuhusu mkurupuko wa virusi vya korona, vipimo vingi vya soko la hisa la Marekani ikiwemo NASDAQ-100, kipimo chaS&P 500, na Wastani wa Viwanda ya Dow Jones zilirekodi upungufu kubwa zaidi kutokea 2008, Dow ikipungua kwa pointi 1,191, upungufu mkubwa zaidi kwa siku tangu hali mgumu wa uchumi wa 2007-08.
en-mt: On February 27th, because of growing concerns about the coronavirus outbreak, many U.S. stock market metrics including the NASDAQ-100, the S&P 500, and the Dow Jones Industrial Average recorded the largest decline since 2008, the Dow declining by 1,191 points, the largest daily decline since the tough 2007-08 recession.

sourceString: All three indexes ended the week down more than 10%.
targetString: Faharasa zote tatu zilifunga wiki zikiwa chini kwa zaidi ya 10%.
en-mt: All three indexes closed the week down by more than 10%.

sourceString: On 28 February, Scope Ratings GmbH affirmed China's sovereign credit rating, but maintained a Negative Outlook.
targetString: Tarehe 28 Februari, Scope Ratings GmbH ilisisitiza kiwango cha nchi kulipa deni ya Uchina, lakini ikadumisha Mwonekano Duni.
en-mt: On February 28, Scope Ratings GmbH reiterated the country's rate of repayment of Chinese debt, but maintained a Poor Visibility.

sourceString: Stocks plunged again based on coronavirus fears, the largest fall being on 16 March.
targetString: Mauzo ya bidhaa yalididimia tena kutokana na hofu za virusi vya korona, tarehe 16 Machi ikishuhudiwa kushukwa pakubwa zaidi.
en-mt: Sales of goods fell again due to fears of the coronavirus, on March 16 seeing the biggest decline.

sourceString: Many consider an economic recession to be likely.
targetString: Wengi wanakadiria kuwepo na uwezekano wa kwa kushuka kwa uchumi.
en-mt: Many estimate the existence and potential for an economic downturn.

sourceString: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised central banks' and states' timely emergency measures.
targetString: Mwanauchumi Mohamed El-Erian amesifu hatua za dhurura zilizochukuliwa kwa wakati ufaao na benki kuu na serikali.
en-mt: Economist Mohamed El-Erian praised the timely measures taken by the central bank and the government.

sourceString: Central banks are reacting more quickly than they did to the 2008 financial crash.
targetString: Benki kuu zinashughulika kwa haraka zaidi kuliko zilivyoshughulika wakati wa kudidimia kifedha wa 2008.
en-mt: Central banks are dealing more quickly than they were dealing during the 2008 financial downturn.

sourceString: Tourism is one of the worst affected sectors due to travel bans, closing of public places including travel attractions, and advice of governments against any travel all over the world.
targetString: Utalii ni mojawapo wa sekta zilizoathiriwa vibaya na vikwazo vya usafiri, kufungwa kwa sehemu za umma zikiwemo kivutio za usafiri, na mashauri ya serikali dhidi ya usafiri kote duniani.
en-mt: Tourism is one of the sectors hardest hit by travel restrictions, the closure of public places, including travel attractions, and government anti-travel advisories around the world.

sourceString: As a consequence, numerous airlines have cancelled flights due to lower demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines, and Qantas, while British regional airline Flybe collapsed.
targetString: Kutokana na hivyo, mashirika mengi ya ndege yamekatisha safari za ndege kutokana na hitaji la chini, ikiwa ni pamoja na British Airways, China Eastern Airlines na Qantas, huku shirika la kikanda la Uingereza la Flybe likianguka.
en-mt: As a result, many airlines have cancelled flights due to low demand, including British Airways, China Eastern Airlines and Qantas, with British regional carrier Flybe falling.

sourceString: The impact on the cruise line industry was at a level never seen before.
targetString: Athari katika sekta ya meli za kifahari ilikuwa katika kiwango ambayo haijaonekana hapo awali.
en-mt: The impact on the luxury shipping industry was at a level not seen before.

sourceString: Several train stations and ferry ports have also been closed.
targetString: Stesheni ya gari la moshi nyingi na bandari ya kivuko zimefungwa pia.
en-mt: The train station and the ferry port are also closed.

sourceString: The epidemic coincided with the Chunyun, a major travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.
targetString: Janga hili lilisadifiana na Chunyun, msimu muhimu wa kusafiri unaohusishwa na likizo ya Mwaka Mpya ya Kichina.
en-mt: The pandemic coincided with Chunyun, an important travel season associated with the Chinese New Year holiday.

sourceString: A number of events involving large crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including annual New Year festivals, with private companies also independently closing their shops and tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.
targetString: Matukio mengi yanayohusisha watu wengi zilifutwa na serikali za taifa na za kanda, ikiwemo tamasha ya kila mwaka wa Mwaka Mpya, na kampuni ya kibinafsi pia zikifunga maduka yao pekee yao na kivutio cha watalii kama vile Hong Kong Disneyland na Shanghai Disneyland.
en-mt: Many events involving crowds were cancelled by national and regional governments, including the annual New Year's Eve concert, with private companies also closing their stores exclusively with tourist attractions such as Hong Kong Disneyland and Shanghai Disneyland.

sourceString: Many Lunar New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including the Forbidden City in Beijing and traditional temple fairs.
targetString: Matukio mengi ya Mwaka Mpya wa Kichina na kivutio cha watalii zimefungwa kuzuia mkusanyiko ya watu wengi, ikiwemo Forbidden City Beijing na maonyesho ya asili hekaluni.
en-mt: Many Chinese New Year events and tourist attractions have been closed to prevent mass gatherings, including Forbidden City Beijing and a nature exhibition at the temple.

sourceString: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, municipalities and regions, authorities extended the New Year's holiday to 10 February, instructing most workplaces not to re-open until that date.
targetString: Katika mikoa 24 ya 31 ya Uchina, munispaa na maeneo, mamlaka ziliongeza likizo ya Mwaka Mpya hadi 10 Februari, na kuagiza sehemu za kazi nyingi wasifungue hadi siku hiyo.
en-mt: In 24 of China's 31 provinces, munispaa and regions, authorities extended the New Year holiday to 10 February, ordering most workplaces not to open until that day.

sourceString: These regions represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.
targetString: Maeneo haya yaliwakilisha 80% ya GDP ya nchi na 90% ya mauzo ya nje.
en-mt: These areas represented 80% of the country's GDP and 90% of exports.

sourceString: Hong Kong raised its infectious disease response level to the highest and declared an emergency, closing schools until March and cancelling its New Year celebrations.The retail sector has been impacted globally, with reductions in store hours or temporary closures.
targetString: Hong Kong iliongeza hali ya mwitikio wa magonjwa ya kuambukizwa hadi hali ya juu zaidi na kutangaza hali ya dharura, na kufunga shule hadi Machi na kufuta sherehe za Mwaka Mpya.Sekta ya biashara ya rejareja imeathirika kimataifa, na kupungzwa kwa masaa ya kazi au kufungwa kwa muda.
en-mt: Hong Kong raised the epidemic response to the highest profile and declared a state of emergency, closing schools until March and canceling New Year's celebrations.The retail business sector has been hit internationally, with reduced working hours or temporary closures.

sourceString: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.
targetString: Ziara kwa wauzaji Ulaya na Marekani ya Kilatini zilipungua kwa 40%.
en-mt: Visits to retailers in Europe and Latin America declined by 40%.

sourceString: North America and Middle East retailers saw a 50–60% drop.
targetString: Wauzaji wa Marekani Kaskazini na Mashariki ya Kati waliona upungufu wa 50-60%.
en-mt: North American and Middle Eastern retailers saw a 50-60% decrease.

sourceString: This also resulted in a 33–43% drop in foot traffic to shopping centres in March compared to February.
targetString: Hii pia ilisababisha upungufu wa 33-43% katika safari kwa miguu hadi maduka kubwa mnamo Machi ikilinganishwa na Februari.
en-mt: This also led to a 33-43% reduction in trips on foot to supermarkets in March compared to February.

sourceString: Shopping mall operators around the world imposed additional measures, such increased sanitation, installation of thermal scanners to check the temperature of shoppers, and cancellation of events.According to a United Nations Economic Commission for Latin America estimate, the pandemic-induced recession could leave between 14 and 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in that situation without the pandemic.
targetString: Waendeshaji maduka makubwa kote duniani waliweka hatua zaidi, kama vile kuongeza hali ya usafi, kuweka vidude vya kutathmini hali ya joto kupima hali ya joto ya wanunuzi, na kufuta matukio.Kulingana na Tume ya Kiuchumi ya Umoja wa Mataifa kwa kadirio ya Marekani ya Kilatini, kushuka kwa uchumi kufuatia janga huenda ikawacha watu kati ya milioni 14 hadi 22 zaidi katika umaskini uliokithiri Marekani ya Kilatini kuliko vile ingekuwa katika hali hiyo bila janga.
en-mt: Mall operators around the world put in place more measures, such as increasing sanitary conditions, installing temperature assessment gadgets to measure shoppers' temperatures, and canceling events. According to the U.N. Economic Commission for Latin American Estimates, the economic downturn following the pandemic is likely to leave 14 to 22 million more people in extreme poverty in Latin America than would have been in the situation without the pandemic.

sourceString: In January and February 2020, during the height of the epidemic in Wuhan, about 5 million people in China lost their jobs.
targetString: Mnamo Januari na Februari 2020, wakati janga lilikithiri zaidi Wuhan, takriban watu milioni 5 walipoteza kazi zao.
en-mt: In January and February 2020, when the pandemic worsened Wuhan, approximately 5 million people lost their jobs.

sourceString: Many of China's nearly 300 million rural migrant workers have been stranded at home in inland provinces or trapped in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government aid.
targetString: Wengi kati ya wafanyakazi milioni 300 waliohama kutoka mashambani wamekwama nyumbani katika mikoa nchini au kuzuiwa mkoa wa Hubei.Mnamo Machi 2020, zaidi ya Wamerekani milioni 10 walipoteza kazi zao na kuomba msaada wa serikali.
en-mt: Many of the 300 million workers who have migrated from the countryside are stuck at home in provinces or blocked in Hubei province.In March 2020, more than 10 million Americans lost their jobs and applied for government assistance.

sourceString: The coronavirus outbreak could cost 47 million jobs in the United States and unemployment rate may hit 32%, according to estimates by the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.The lockdown in India has left tens of millions of Indian migrant workers (who are paid through daily wages) unemployed.The survey from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households have experienced some type of unemployment.Nearly 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it went into lockdown in mid-March 2020.
targetString: Mkurupuko wa virusi vya korona huenda ikasababisha kuachishwa kazi watu milioni 47 Marekani na kiwango cha ukosefu wa ajira huenda ikafika 32%, kulingana na makadirio na Benki ya Muungano wa Hifadhi ya St. Lois. Kufungwa kwa shughuli za kawaida kwa muda Uhindi imesababisha milioni ya wafanyakazi waliohama Uhindi (wanaolipwa kupitia mapato ya kila siku) bila kazi.Utafiti kutoka Taasisi ya Angus Reid ilipata kuwa 44% ya manyumba ya Kanada ziliathirika na aina tofauti ya kukosa kazi.Takriban wafanyakazi 900,000 walipoteza kazi zao huko Uhispania tangu ilianza kufungwa kwa shughuli za kawaida kwa muda katikati mwa Machi 2020.
en-mt: The coronavirus outbreak could lead to the layoffs of 47 million people in the U.S. and the unemployment rate could reach 32%, according to estimates by Union Reserve Bank of St. Lois. The closure of normal operations in India has left millions of displaced workers in India (paid through daily income) without work. Research from the Angus Reid Institute found that 44% of Canadian households suffered from a different type of joblessness. About 900,000 workers lost their jobs in Spain since it began a temporary shutdown of normal operations in mid-March 2020.

sourceString: During the second half of March, 4 million French workers applied for temporary unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme.Almost half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers on a government-subsidized short-time working schemes known as Kurzarbeit.
targetString: Katika awamu ya pili ya mwezi Machi, Wafanyakazi milioni 4 Wafaransa walituma maombi ya manufaa ya kutoajiriwa na wafanyakazi milioni 1 Waingereza walituma maombi ya mpango wa mkopo wa kwa wote.Takriban kampuni nusu milioni nchini Ujerumani zimewatuma wafanyakazi wao katika mpango unaofadhiliwa na serikali wa kazi ya muda mfupi unaofahamika kuwa Kurzarbeit.
en-mt: In the second phase of March, 4 million French workers applied for unemployment benefits and 1 million British workers applied for a universal credit scheme. About half a million companies in Germany have sent their workers to a government-funded short-term work program known as Kurzarbeit.

sourceString: The German short-time work compensation scheme has been adopted by France and Britain.
targetString: Mpango wa kazi wa muda mfupi wa Ujerumani umetumika pia na  Ufaransa na Uingereza.
en-mt: Germany's short-term work programme has also been used by France and the UK.

sourceString: The performing arts and cultural heritage sectors have been profoundly affected by the pandemic, impacting organizations' operations as well as individuals—both employed and independent—globally.
targetString: Sekta za usanii wa utendaji na turathi za kitamaduni zimeathrika sana na janga hili kubwa, ikiwa imeathiri utendakazi wa mashirika pamoja na watu binafsi—walioajiriwa na walioajiriwa—kimataifa.
en-mt: The sectors of performance and cultural heritage have been deeply affected by this devastating pandemic, having affected the performance of organizations as well as individuals—employed and employed—internationally.

sourceString: Arts and culture sector organizations attempted to uphold their (often publicly funded) mission to provide access to cultural heritage to the community, maintain the safety of their employees and the public, and support artists where possible.
targetString: Mashirika katika sekta za sanaa na utamaduni zilijaribu kuidhinisha lengo lao (ambalo kikawaida hufadhiliwa na umma) kutoa uwezo wa kufikia turathi za kitamaduni kwa jumuiya, kudumisha usalama wa waajiriwa wao na umma na kusaidia wasanii panapowezekana.
en-mt: Organizations in the arts and culture sectors attempted to endorse their goal (which is usually publicly funded) to provide access to cultural heritage for the community, to maintain the safety of their employees and the public and to support artists where possible.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: Kufikia Machi 2020, kote duniani na katika viwango tofauti, majumba ya kumbukumbu, maktaba, ukumbi wa uigizaji, na taasisi zingine ya kitamaduni zilikuwa zimefungwa kwa muda usiojulikana na maonyesho yao, matukio na uigizaji kufutwa au kuhairishwa.
en-mt: By March 2020, across the globe and at different levels, museums, libraries, theatres, and other cultural institutions were indefinitely closed and their performances, events and acting cancelled or postponed.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: Kwa mwitikio kulikuwa na juhudi nyingi sana kutoa huduma mbadala kupitia jukwaa za mtandaoni.Tukio nyingine ya hivi karibuni inayoongezeka kwa kasi kwa sababu ya ugonjwa huu ni kufutwa ka ibada ya kidini, matukio kuu katika michezo, na matukio mengine ya kijamii, kama vile tamasha ya muziki na maonyesho, kongamano ya teknolojia, na maonyesho ya mitindo.
en-mt: In response there were too many efforts to provide alternative services through online platforms. Another recent fast-growing phenomenon due to the disease is the cancellation of religious services, main events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and performances, technology conferences, and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: Sekta ya filamu pia imepata mvurugo. Vatican ilitangaza kuwa maadhimisho ya Wiki Kuu Roma, ambayo huwa katika wiki ya mwisho wa msimu ya Wakristo kutubu wa Kwaresima, zimefutwa.
en-mt: The film industry has also suffered a slump. The Vatican announced that the celebrations of the Holy Week in Rome, which falls in the last week of the season of Christians repenting of Lent, have been cancelled.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: Dayosisi kadhaa zimependekeza Wakristo wazee kukaa nyumbani bali wasishiriki katika Misa Jumapili; kanisa zingine zimefanya ibada ya kanisa kupatikana kupitia redio, utiririshaji wa moja kwa moja mtandaoni au televisheni ilhali wengine wana ibada ya washiriki kuja garini.
en-mt: Several dioceses have recommended older Christians stay home but not participate in Mass on Sundays; Some churches have made church worship available via radio, live streaming online or television while others have a worship service for members to come to the car.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: Kufuatia Dayosisi ya Katoliki ya Roma kufunga makanisa yao na makanisa madogo na Basilika la Mt. Petro kutokuwa na mapilgrimu Wakristo, mashirika mengine za kidini pia zilifuta ibada yao na kudhibiti mkusanyiko katika makanisa, misikiti, sinagogi, hekalu na gurdwaras.
en-mt: Following the Roman Catholic Diocese closing their churches and small churches and St. Peter's Basilica having no Christian pilgrims, other religious organizations also canceled their worship and controlled gathering in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: Wizara ya Afya ya Irani ilitangaza kufutwa kwa sala za Ijumaa katika maeneo yaliyoathiriwa na mkurupuko na vihekalu zilifungwa baadaye, ilhali Saudi Arabia ilipiga marufuku kuingia kwa mapilgrimu wageni pamoja na raia kuelekea maeneo takatifu Mecca na Medina.
en-mt: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and temples were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims and citizens to the holy sites Mecca and Medina.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: Janga hili limesababisha mavurugo makubwa zaidi katika kalenda ya ulimwengu wa michezo kutokea Vita Kuu ya Pili ya Dunia.
en-mt: The pandemic has caused the biggest disruption in the world sporting calendar since World War II.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: Matukio mengi ya michezo zimefutwa au kuhairishwa, zikiwemo Ligi ya Mabingwa ya UEFA ya 2019–20, Ligi Kuu ya 2019–20, UEFA ya Ulaya ya 2020, msimu wa NBA ya 2019–20, na msimu wa NHL ya 2019–20.
en-mt: Many sporting events have been cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, the 2019–20 Premier League, the 2020 UEFA European Championship, the 2019–20 NBA season, and the 2019–20 NHL season.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: Mkurupuko huu ulivuruga mipango ya Olimpiki ya majira ya joto ya 2020, ambayo yalikuwa yamepangwa kuanza mwisho wa Julai; Kamati ya Kimataifa ya Olimpiki ilitangaza tarehe 24 Machi kuwa michezo hiyo "itaairishwa hadi tarehe nyingine baada ya 2020 lakini si zaidi ya msimu wa kiangazi wa 2021".Kasino na vituo vingine vya michezo ulimwenguni zimefungwa na mashindano ya moja kwa moja ya karata aidha zimeairishwa au kufutwa.
en-mt: This outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were scheduled to begin in late July; The International Olympic Committee announced on March 24 that the Games "will be postponed to another date after 2020 but not beyond the summer of 2021". Casinos and other sports facilities around the world have been closed and live card tournaments have either been rescheduled or cancelled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: Hii imesababisha wacheza kamari wengi kuelekea mtandaoni, na tovuti nyingi za kucheza kamari mtandaoni zikiripoti kuongezeka kwingi katika viwango vya wanaojiandikisha.Sekta ya burudani imeathiriwa pia, na vikundi vingi za muziki kusimamisha au kufuta safari za maonyesho.
en-mt: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting a significant increase in the rates of sign-ups. The entertainment industry has been affected as well, with many music groups suspending or canceling theatrical trips.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: Ukumbi wa michezo nyingi kama yale yaliyoko Broadway pia zilisimamisha michezo za kuigiza.
en-mt: Many theaters like the one on Broadway also stopped dramas.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: Wasanii wengine wamejaribu njia za kuendelea kuunda na kusambaza kazi kupitia mtandao kama njia mbadala ya maonyesho ya moja kwa moja, kama vile maonyesho ya moja kwa moja mtandaoni au kuunda "tamasha" mtandaoni ya wasanii kutumbuiza watu, kusambaza, na kuendeleza kazi zao.
en-mt: Some artists have tried ways to continue to create and distribute works through the Internet as an alternative to live performances, such as online live performances or creating online "festivals" of artists performing folks, distributing, and promoting their work.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: Picha nyingi za utani zenye maudhui ya virusi vya korona zimeenea mtandani huku watu wengi wakigeukia ucheshi na uzubaishaji hata kukiwepo hali ya hatihati.
en-mt: Many of the joke images with coronavirus content have gone viral, with many people turning to humor and slurs even in the face of the script.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: Tangu mkurupuko wa COVID-19, kuongezeka kwa chuki isiyo na sababu, ubaguzi wa watu kutoka nchi zingine, ubaguzi wa rangi zimeonekana kwa watu kutoka Uchina au Asia ya Kati, na dhidi ya watu kutoka sehemu zilizoathirika zaidi Ulaya, Marekani na nchi zingine.
en-mt: Since the COVID-19 outbreak, the rise of irrational hatred, discrimination against people from other countries, racism have been seen in people from China or Central Asia, and against people from the hardest-hit parts of Europe, the United States and other countries.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: Matukio ya woga, shuku, na uadui zimeonekana katika nchi nyingi, hasa Ulaya, Asia ya Kati, Marekani Kaskazini, na eneo la Asia Pasifiki.
en-mt: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, especially in Europe, Central Asia, North America, and the Asia Pacific region.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: Ripoti kutoka Februari (ambapo visa vingi vilikuwa bado Uchina tu) zimeshuhudia hisia za ubaguzi wa rangi zikielekezwa katika vikundi tofauti ulimwenguni ya Wachina kustahili virusi au kupokea kinachodaiwa kuwa adhabu inayofaa.
en-mt: Reports from February (where most cases were still only in China) have seen racist sentiment directed at different groups around the world of Chinese to qualify for the virus or receive what is deemed appropriate punishment.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: Nchi zingine Afrika zimeona hisia dhidi ya Wachina.
en-mt: Other countries in Africa have seen anti-Chinese sentiment.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: Wakazi wengi wa Wuhan na Hubei wameripoti ubaguzi kulingana na eneo wanaotoka.
en-mt: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on the location they are from.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: Kumekuwa na kuunga mikono Wachina, mtandaoni na nje, na kwa wale walio katika maeneo yaliyoathiriwa na virusi.
en-mt: There has been support for Chinese hands, online and out, and for those in areas affected by the virus.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: Kufuatia kuendelea kwa mkurupuko huu katika nchi nyingine, watu kutoka Italia, nchi ya kwanza barani Ulaya kupitia mkurupuko mbaya wa COVID-19, pia wangepitia hali ya kushuku na woga dhidi ya wageni.Wananchi katika nchi za Malaysia, Nyuzilandi, Singapore na Korea Kusini awali walitia sahihi hoja ya kutaka kuzuia watu wa China kuingia nchini mwao katika jitihada za kuzuia ugonjwa huu.
en-mt: Following the continuation of this outbreak in other countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a severe COVID-19 outbreak, would also experience a sense of suspicion and fear towards foreigners. Citizens in Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore and South Korea have previously signed a motion seeking to prevent Chinese people from entering their country in a bid to prevent the disease.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: Nchini Japani, alama ya reli #ChineseDontComeToJapan ilivuma katika mtandao wa Twitter.
en-mt: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: Watu wa asili ya China pamoja na Waasia wengine walio nchini Uingereza na Marekani wameripoti viwango vya juu vya dhuluma za kirangi, pamoja na mashambulizi.
en-mt: People of Chinese descent as well as other Asians based in the UK and US have reported high rates of racial injustice, including attacks.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: Rais wa Marekani Donald Trump amesutwa kwa kurejelea virusi vya korona kuwa "Virusi vya China", kauli inayozingatiwa na wahakiki kuwa ni la ubaguzi wa rangi na inayobagua Uchina.
en-mt: US President Donald Trump has been slammed for referring to the coronavirus as the "China virus", a statement considered by reviewers to be racist and discriminatory towards China.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: Waandamanaji nchini Ukraine walishambulia mabasi yaliyobeba wana Ukraine na wageni waliookolewa kutoka Wuhan hadi Novi Sanzhary.
en-mt: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainians and foreigners rescued from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: Wanafunzi kutoka Kaskazini Mashariki ya India, inayotumia mpaka mmoja na China na kusoma katika miji mikuu ya India waeripotiwa kupitia hali ya unyanyasaji unaohusiana na mkurupuko wa virusi vya korona.
en-mt: Students from northeast India, which straddles a single border with China and study in Indian capitals, have been reported to have experienced bullying related to the coronavirus outbreak.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: Dilip Ghosh, rais wa kitengo cha Chama cha Serikali cha Bharatiya Janata kule Bengal Magharibi alitaja kuwamba Wachina walikuwa wameharibu mali asili na "hiyo ndiyo sababu Mungu aliamua kulipiza kisasi dhidi yao."
en-mt: Dilip Ghosh, president of the Bharatiya Janata Party unit in West Bengal mentioned that the Chinese had destroyed natural resources and "that's why God decided to take revenge against them."

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: Maoni hayo yalishutumiwa baadaye na ubalozi wa Uchina Kolkata, wakiitaja kuwa "makosa".Huko Uchina, ubaguzi wa watu kutoka nchi zingine na ubaguzi wa rangi dhidi ya wakazi ambao si Wachina imeongezeka kufuatia janga hili, na wageni kuitwa "takataka geni" na kulengwa kwa "kutupwa".
en-mt: The comments were later condemned by the Chinese embassy in Kolkata, calling it "wrong". In China, discrimination from other countries and racism against non-Chinese residents has increased following the pandemic, with foreigners being called "strange garbage" and targeted for being "dumped".

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: Magazeti mengi yaliyo na usajili yameyaondoa kwa baadhi ya au kwa taarifa yote kuhusu virusi vya korona.
en-mt: Many newspapers with subscriptions have removed it with some or all of the information about the coronavirus.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: Wachapishaji wengi wa kisayansi waliandika karatasi za kisayansi zinazohusiana na mkurupuko kupatikana na uwezo huru wa ufikiaji.
en-mt: Many scientific publishers wrote scientific papers related to the outbreak being accessible with independent access capabilities.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: Wanasayansi wengine waliamua kusambaza matokeo yao haraka katika seva otomatiki kama vile bioRxiv.
en-mt: Some scientists decided to quickly distribute their results in automated servers such as bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: Ugonjwa unaoibuka wa kuambukizana – Ugonjwa wa kuambukizana wa virusi vinayoibuka, mara nyingi nyingi ni mpya katika safu ya mkurupuko wako au njia ya usambazaji wake
en-mt: Emerging infectious disease – An infectious disease of an emerging virus, often new in the series of your outbreak or its transmission route.

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: Umataifishaji na ugonjwa – Muhtasari wa umataifishaji na usambazaji wa ugonjwa
en-mt: Classification and disease – Summary of the diffusion and distribution of disease

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: Orodha ya majanga na majanga makubwa – Orodha ya watu waliofariki kutokana na ugonjwa wa kuambukizana
en-mt: - List of disasters and major disasters – List of people who died from infectious disease

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: Mauzo ya wanyama wa pori na magonjwa yanayoweza kuenezwa kutoka kwa wanyama hadi kwa binadamu – Hatari za afya zinazohusishwa na biashara ya wanyama wageni wa porini
en-mt: Wildlife sales and diseases that can be spread from animals to humans – Health risks associated with the trade in wild animals

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: Vipimo vya mahabari vya ugonjwa wa pumu wa virusi vya korona 2019 (COVID-19) na virusi vinavyohusiana na SARS-CoV-2 ikiwa ni pamoja na mbinu zinazogundua kuwepo kwa virusi na vile vinavyogundua antibodi zinazozalishwa kupambana na maambukizi.
en-mt: Informative tests of the 2019 coronavirus disease (COVID-19) and related SARS-CoV-2 viruses including methods that detect the presence of the virus and those that detect antibodies produced to fight infection.

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: Kuwepo kwa virusi kwenye sampuli ya virusi kunathibitishwa na RT-PCR, inayogundua protini ya RNA ya virusi vya korona.
en-mt: The presence of the virus in the viral sample is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the RNA protein of the coronavirus.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Kipimo hiki ni mahususi na kimeundwa ili kugundua protini ya RNA ya virusi vya SARS-CoV-2 pekee.
en-mt: This test is specific and designed to detect the RNA protein of the SARS-CoV-2 virus alone.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: Kinatumika kuthibitisha maambukizi ya hivi majuzi au yanayoendelea.
en-mt: It is used to confirm recent or ongoing infections.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: Ugunduaji wa antibodi (serolojia) unaweza kutumika katika uchunguzi pamoja na ufuatiliaji wa watu.
en-mt: Antibody detection (serology) can be used in diagnostics as well as surveillance of people.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: Vipimo vya antibodi vinaonyesha idadi ya watu waliopata ugonjwa ikiwa ni pamoja na wale ambao dalili zao zilikuwa za chini sana kuripotiwa au wale ambao hawakuonyesha dalili zozote.
en-mt: Antibody tests show a number of people who contracted the disease including those whose symptoms were too low to be reported or those who showed no symptoms.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: Kiwango sahihi cha vifo vinavyosababishwa na ugonjwa huu na kiwango cha kinga kigumu cha mwili miongoni mwa watu kinaweza kubainishwa kutokana na kipimo hiki.
en-mt: The precise death rate caused by this disease and the level of stiff immune system among the population can be determined by this measurement.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: Kutokana na viwango vya chini ya upimaji, kufikia Machi 2020 hakuna nchi zilizokuwa na data ya kutegemeka kuhusu kusambaa kwa virusi miongoni mwa watu wake.
en-mt: Due to low testing rates, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the spread of the virus among their populations.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: Kufikia tarehe 23 Machi, hakuna nchi iliyokuwa imepima zaidi ya 3% ya watu wake, na kuna tofauti kubwa katika idadi ya vipimo vilivyofanywa katika nchi mbalimbali.
en-mt: As of March 23, no country had tested more than 3% of its population, and there is a significant difference in the number of tests conducted in different countries.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: Hali hii ya utofauti pia ina uwezekano wa kuathiri pakubwa visa vya kiwango vya vifo, ambavyo kuna uwezekano mkubwa wa kukadiriwa kupita kiasi katika baadhi ya nchi.
en-mt: This variant is also likely to significantly affect mortality rate cases, which are likely to be over-estimated in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: Kwa kutumia kipimo cha muda halisi cha (rRT-PCR) kipimo kinaweza kufanywa kwenye sampuli ya pumu iliyopatikana kwa njia mbalimbali, ikiwa ni pamoja na sampuli ya bidhaa za puani au sampuli ya kohozi.
en-mt: Using real-time rRT-PCR measurement, the dose can be performed on an asthma sample obtained by a variety of methods, including a sample of nasal products or a sample of cough.

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: Matokeo kwa ujumla hupatikana ndani ya saa chache hadi siku 2.
en-mt: Results are generally achieved within a few hours to 2 days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: Kipimo cha RT-PCR kinachofanywa kwa kutumia sampuli za kooni kinategemewa tu katika wiki ya kwanza ya ugonjwa.
en-mt: An RT-PCR test performed using throat samples is only expected in the first week of illness.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: Baadaye, virusi vinaweza kupotea kooni huku vikiendelea kuzaana kwenye mapafu.
en-mt: Later, the virus can disappear in the throat as it continues to reproduce in the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: Kwa watu walioambukizwa waliopimwa katika wiki ya pili, vifaa mbadala vya sampuli vinaweza kuchukuliwa kutoka kwenye kina cha njia za kupumua kupitia kifaa cha kunyonya majimaji ya mwili au kikohozi (kikohozi) kinaweza kutumika.
en-mt: For infected individuals tested in the second week, alternative sampling equipment can be taken from the depths of the respiratory tracts via a body fluid absorber device or a cough (cough) may be used.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: Mojawapo ya vipimo vya awali vya PCR kiliundwa katika Charité kule Berlin mnamo Januari 2020 kwa kutumia kipimo cha muda halisi cha (rRT-PCR), na kikawa msingi wa vifurushi 250,000 vilivyosambazwa na Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni (WHO).
en-mt: One of the earliest PCR tests was created at the Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time rRT-PCR measurement, and became the basis for 250,000 packages distributed by the World Health Organization (WHO).

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: Nchi ya Uingereza pia ilikuwa imeunda kipimo kufikia tarehe 23 Januari 2020.Kampuni ya Korea Kusini ya Kogenebiotech ,iliunda kifurushi cha kugundua SARS-CoV-2 kinachotegemea PCR cha hadhi ya kimatibabu (PowerChek Coronavirus) mnamo tarehe 28 Januari 2020.
en-mt: The UK had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.South Korean company Kogenebiotech , developed a PCR-based PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection package for medical status (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: Inatafuta jini aina ya "E" inayofanana katika virusi vyote vya korona vya beta, na jini ya RdRp ambayo hususan hupatikana katika SARS-CoV-2.Nchini China, BGI Group ilikuwa moja wapo ya kampuni za kwanza kupokea idhini ya matumizi ya dharura kutoka kwa Usimamizi wa Kitaifa wa Bidhaa za Kimatibabu nchini China kwa ajili ya kifurushi cha ugunduaji wa SARS-CoV-2 kutegemea PCR.Nchini Marekani, Kituo cha Kudhibiti na kuzuia Ugonjwa (CDC) kinasambaza Paneli yake ya Uchunguzi ya Muda Halisi ya PCR ya Virusi Vipya vya Korona 2019 (2019-nCoV) kwa mahabara ya afya ya umma kupitia kwa Rasilimali ya Kimataifa ya Vyombo vya Kupimia Ugonjwa.
en-mt: It is looking for a similar "E" strain in all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene that is specifically found in SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use authorization from the National Medical Products Administration in China for a SARS-CoV-2 detection package based on PCR. In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its Real-Time PCR Diagnostic Panel for New Coronavirus 2019 (2019-nCoV) to public health authorities through the International Pandemic Testing Resource Toolkit.

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: Mojawapo ya vipimo vitatu vya kijenetiki katika matoleo ya awali ya vifurushi vya upimaji kilisababisha mtokeo yasiyo makilifu kutokana vyombo viovu vya kupimia, na uchangamano wa upimaji katika kituo cha CDC kule Atlanta; hii ilisababisha idadi ya wastani ya chini ya sampuli 100 kupimwa kwa ufanisi katika kipindi kizima cha mwezi Februari 2020.
en-mt: One of the three genetic tests in earlier versions of the testing packages resulted in an unexplained reaction from the negative testing instruments, and the combination of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average number of less than 100 samples being successfully tested throughout the entire month of February 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: Vipimo kwa kutumia viambajengo havikubainishwa kuwa vinategemeka hadi tarehe 28 Februari 2020, ilikuwa hadi wakati huu ndipo mahabara ya kitaifa na ya mtaani yaliruhusiwa kuendesha vipimo.
en-mt: Tests using the attachments were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, it was until this time that national and local authorities were allowed to run tests.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: Kipimo kiliidhinishwa na Usimamizi wa Chakula na Dawa chini ya Uidhinishaji wa Matumizi katika Dharura.Mahabara ya kibiashara ya Markani yalianza kufanya vipimo mnamo Machi 2020.
en-mt: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under the Authorization for Use in Emergencies. Markani's commercial pharmacy began testing in March 2020.
