sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: Kufikia tarehe 5 Machi 2020 LabCorp ilitangaza kuwepo kwa kipimo cha COVID-19 katika taifa inayotumia RT-PCR.
en-mt: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced the presence of a COVID-19 test in the nation using RT-PCR.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Quest Diagnostics vilevile ilifanya vipimo vya COVID-19 kupatikana kufikia tarehe 9 Machi 2020.
en-mt: Quest Diagnostics also made COVID-19 tests available as of March 9, 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: Hakuna vikomo vya viwango vilivyotangazwa; ukusanyaji na uchakataji wa sampuli lazima ufanywe kulingana na mahitaji ya CDC.
en-mt: No limits on standards were announced; Sample collection and processing must be done in accordance with CDC requirements.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: Nchini Urusi, kipimo cha COVID-19 kiliundwa na kuzalishwa na Kituo cha Kitaifa cha Utafiti cha Vairolojia na Bayoteknolojia VECTOR.
en-mt: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was designed and produced by the National Research Center for Toxicology and Biotechnology VECTOR.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: Tarehe 11 Februari 2020 kipimo kilisajiliwa na Huduma ya Ufuatilia wa Matibabu ya Shirikisho.Tarehe 12 Machi 2020, Kliniki ya Mayo iliripotiwa kuunda kipimo cha kugundua maambukizi ya COVID-19 .Tarehe 13 Machi 2020, Roche Diagnostics ilipokea idhinisho kutoka FDA kwa kipimo ambacho kingefanywa ndani ya saa 3.5 kwa juzuu ya juu, hivyo kuruhusu mashine moja kufanya takriban vipimo 4,128 kwa muda wa saa 24.
en-mt: On February 11, 2020 the test was registered with the Federal Medical Surveillance Service.On March 12, 2020, Mayo Clinic reportedly created a test to detect COVID-19 infection. On March 13, 2020, Roche Diagnostics received approval from the FDA for a test that would be performed within 3.5 hours in a maximum volume, allowing one machine to perform approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: Tarehe 19 Machi 2020, FDA ilitoa uidhinishaji wa matumizi wa dharura  (EUA) kwa Abbott Laboratories kwa kipimo cha mfumo wa Abbott wa m2000; the FDA awali ilikuwa imetoa idhini sawa na hiyo kwa Hologic, LabCorp na Thermo Fisher Scientific.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA granted emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for the dose of Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously granted similar approvals to Hologic, LabCorp and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: Tarehe 21 Machi 2020, Cepheid pia ilipokea idhini sawa ya EUA kutoka kwa FDA kwa kipimo kinachochukua takriban dakika 45.
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Cepheid also received the same EUA approval from the FDA for a dose lasting approximately 45 minutes.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA imeidhinisha kipimo kinachotumia teknolojia ya uzalishaji ya asidi ya kinyuklia inayotegemea kipimo thabiti cha nyuzi joto badala ya PCR.
en-mt: The FDA has approved a test that uses nuclear acid production technology based on a stable thermometer rather than PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: Kwa sababu kipimo hiki hakihitaji misururu ya nyuzi joto inayobadilika, mbinu hii inaweza kutoa matokeo chanya katika dakika muda mfupi wa dakika tano na matoeko hasi katika muda wa dakika 13.
en-mt: Because this measurement does not require a series of fluctuating temperatures, this method can produce positive results in a short five minute interval and a negative output in 13 minutes.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: Kwa sasa kuna takriban mashine 18,000 nchini Marekani na Abbott inatarajia kuzidisha utengenezaji ili kutoa vipimo 50,000 kwa siku.Kipimo kinachotumia antibodi zinazofanana za protini ya nucleocapsid (protini aina ya N) ya virusi vipya vya korona vinaundwa nchini Taiwan, kukiwa na imani kuwa vitatoa matokeo baada ya dakika kati ya 15 hadi 20 kama tu vipimo vya homa ya mafua.
en-mt: There are currently about 18,000 machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests a day. A test using identical antibodies of the nucleocapsid protein (N-type protein) of the new coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the belief that it will yield results after 15 to 20 minutes just like flu tests.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: Ukakiki wa makala wa mwezi Machi 2020 ulihitimisha kwamba "vipimo vya kifua ni vya thamani ya chini ya kiuchunguzi katika awamu ya awali, huku matokeo ya CT [picha ya viungo vya mwili zinazoonyeshwa na kompyuta] yakiweza kuwepo hata kabla ya kuonekana kwa dalili."
en-mt: A March 2020 article concluded that "chest scans are of low diagnostic value in the initial phase, while CT [computer-generated body image images] results may be present even before the appearance of symptoms."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: Vipengele vya kawaida kwenye CT ni pamoja na glasi zenye mistari miwili za mwambaa anuai zinazozuia mwangaza zilizo na msambao wa pembeni, zisizo sambamba na za nyuma.
en-mt: Common features on CT include two-dimensional multi-bar glasses that block the brightness with sideways, non-parallel and backward curves.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: Kuwepo kwa Subpleural kwa wingi, njia mbovu na uimarishaji hukua ugonjwa ukiendelea kua.
en-mt: Subpleural presence in abundance, poor ways and consolidation grow the disease as it grows.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: Uchunguzi unaolinganisha PCR na CT kule Wuhan wakati wa kuibuka kwa janga kubwa la sasa umependekeza kuwa CT ni bora kwa kiasi kikubwa kuliko PCR, ingawa si mahususi na vipengele vyake vingi vya picha kuingiliana na mchochota wa pafu mengine na taratibu za ugonjwa.
en-mt: Studies comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan during the emergence of the current major pandemic have suggested that CT is significantly better than PCR, though not specific with its many imaging features interacting with other diffraction and disease mechanisms.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: Kufikia Machi 2020, Chuo cha Rediolojia cha Marekani kinapendekeza kwamba "CT haipaswi kutumika kufanya uchunguzi au awamu ya kwanza ya vipimo vya kuchunguza COVID-19".Kufikia mwezi Machi 2020, kituo cha CDC kinapendekeza PCR itumike katika uchunguzi wa awali.
en-mt: As of March 2020, the American College of Rediology recommends that "CT should not be used to conduct screening or phase one tests to detect COVID-19". As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR be used in pre-screening.

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: Sehemu ya kinga ya mwili kukabiliana na maambukizi ni uzalishaji wa antibodi ikiwa ni pamoja na  IgM na IgG.
en-mt: Part of the body's immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: Hizi zinaweza kutumika kugundua maambukizi ndani ya watu kuanzia siku 7 baada ya kuanza kwa dalili, kubaini kinga ya mwili, na ufuatiliaji wa watu.Majaribio yanaweza kufanywa kwenye mahabara ya kati ya (CLT) au kwa upimaji katika maeneo ya utunzaji (PoCT).
en-mt: These can be used to detect infection within people starting 7 days after the onset of symptoms, identify antibodies, and monitor people. Tests can be performed on central periphery (CLT) or for testing at points of care (PoCT).

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: Mifumo ya uchunguzi wa mwili ya kiotomatiki katika mahabari nyingi za kliniki zitaweza kutekeleza majaribio haya lakini upatikanaji wao utategemea kiwango cha uzalishaji cha kila mfumo.
en-mt: Automated physical examination systems in most clinical informatics will be able to carry out these trials but their availability will depend on the production level of each system.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: Kwa CLT sampuli moja ya damu ya pembeni inatumika, ingawa sampuli zsugu zinaweza kutumika fuatilia makabiliano ya kinga ya mwili.
en-mt: For CLT a single peripheral blood sample is used, although resistant samples can be used to monitor antibody confrontation.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: Kwa PoCT, sampuli moja ya damu hupatikana kwa kawaida kutokana na kubonyea kwa ngozi.
en-mt: With PoCT, one blood sample is typically obtained from skin pressing.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: Tofauti na mbinu za PCR hatua za uchukuaji haihitajiki kabla ya jaribio.Tarehe 26 Machi, 2020, FDA ilitoa majina ya mashirika 29 zilizotoa taarifa kwa shirika hilo inavyohitajika na kwa hivyo kwa sasa yana uwezo wa kusambaza vipimo vyao vya antibodi.
en-mt: Unlike PCR methods the annexation steps are not required before the test. On March 26, 2020, the FDA released the names of 29 agencies that notified the agency as needed and therefore are currently able to distribute their antibody tests.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: Kufikia tarehe 7 Aprili, 2020, jaribio moja  pekee limeidhinishwa na FDA chini ya uidhinishaji wa matumizi ya dharura.Mwishoni mwa Machi 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics na Epitope Diagnostics zilipokea uidhinisho wa Ulaya wa vifurushi vyao vipimo, vinavyoweza kgundua antibodi za IgG na IgA dhidi ya virusi kwenye sampuli ya damu..
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, only one test has been approved by the FDA under emergency use authorization. In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approval of their packages tests, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against viruses in a blood sample.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: Uwezo wa upimaji ni mamia ya sampuli ndani ya saa na hivyo ni wa kasi zaidi kuliko jaribio la kawaida la PCR la RNA ya virusi.
en-mt: The testing capacity is hundreds of samples within an hour and is thus much faster than a standard PCR test for viral RNA.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: Antibodi kikawaida zinaweza kugunduliwa siku 14 baada ya kuanza kwa maambukizi.Mapema Aprili, Uingereza ilipata kuwa hakuna kifurushi cha kipimo cha antibodi ilichonunua kuwa bora kutumika.
en-mt: Antibodies can usually be detected 14 days after the onset of infection. In early April, the UK found that none of the antiboard measurement packages it had purchased to be best used.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: Hong Kong imeweka mpango ambapo watu wanaoshukiwa kuwa wagonwa wanaweza kukaa nyumbani, "idara ya dharura itampa mgonjwa chupa cha sampuli", atatema mate ndani yake, kuirejesha na kupata matokeo ya vipimo baada ya muda.NHS ya Uingereza imetangaza kwamba inafanya majaribio ya kupima watu wanaoshukiwa kuwa wagonjwa wakiwa nyumbani, jambo linaloondoa hatari ya mgonjwa kuambukiza wengine wakija hospitalini aukulazimika kuuwa viini kwenye ambulensi ikiwa ilitumika na mgonjwa.Katika vipimo vya COVID-19 kwa visa vinavyoshukiwa, mtaalamu wa afya huchukua sampuli kwa kutumia tahadhari zinazofaa.
en-mt: Hong Kong has put in place a plan whereby people suspected of being spooked can stay at home, "the emergency department will give the patient a sample bottle", spit in it, return it and get test results over time. The UK NHS has announced it is conducting tests to test suspected patients at home, which eliminates the risk of a patient infecting others coming to hospital or being forced to kill germs in an ambulance if used by a patient. In COVID-19 tests for suspected cases, the health professional takes samples using appropriate precautions.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: Vituo vya kupitia kwa gari vimesaidia Korea Kusini kutekeleza baadhi ya vipimo ya haraka na yenye kadiri kubwa kuliko nchi yoyote.Huko Ujerumani, Shirika la Taifa ya Madaktari wa Sheria ya Bima ya Afya walisema tarehe 2 Machi, kuwa ilikuwa na kiwango cha takriban vipimo 12,000 kila siku katika mpangilio wa ambulansi na 10.700 walikuwa wamepimwa wiki iliyopita.
en-mt: Drive-through stations have helped South Korea implement some of the fastest and most high-speed tests of any country. In Germany, the National Association of Physicians for Health Insurance Law said on March 2, that it had a rate of approximately 12,000 tests daily in the ambulance setting and 10.700 had been tested last week.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: Gharama inadhaminiwa na bima ya afya wakati kipimo inaagizwa na daktari.
en-mt: The cost is guaranteed by the health insurer when the dosage is prescribed by the doctor.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: Kulingana na rais wa Taasisi ya Robert Koch, Ujerumani ina uwezo wa jumla ya vipimo 160,000 kila wiki.
en-mt: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has a total capacity of 160,000 tests each week.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: Kufikia 19 Machi vipimo vya kupitia kwa gari zilifanywa katika miji kadhaa kubwa.
en-mt: By 19 March throughput tests were conducted in several major cities.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: Kufikia 26 Machi 2020 nambari ya jumla ya vipimo vilivyotekelezwa Ujerumani haikujulikana, kwa sababu matokeo ya walioathiriwa pekee ndiyo iliripotiwa.
en-mt: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests implemented in Germany was unknown, because only the results of the affected were reported.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: Utafiti wa maabara ya kwanza ilionyesha kuwa kufikia wiki ya kalenda 12/2020 jumla ya angalau sampuli 483,295 zilipimwa hadi na ikiwemo wiki ya 12/2020 na sampuli 33,491 (6.9%) zilipatikana kuwa na SARS-CoV-2.Huko Israeli, watafiti katika Hospitali ya Technion na Rambam walibuni na kujaribu mbinu ya kupima sampuli kutoka wagonjwa 64 kwa wakati moja, kwa kuweka pamoja sampuli na kupima zaidi ikiwa mchanganyiko wa sampuli inapatikana kuwa imeathirika.Huko Wuhan maabara ya ugunduzi wa dharura ulioundwa wa muda ya mita ya mraba 2000 iitwayo "Huo-Yan" (Kichina: 火眼, au "Fire Eye" katika Kiingereza) ilifunguliwa tarehe 5 Februari 2020 na BGI, na inaweza kuchinguza sampuli 10,000 kwa siku.
en-mt: The first laboratory study showed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples had been tested up to and including the week of 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) were found to contain SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested the technique of testing samples from 64 patients at the same time, by putting together samples and further testing if the sample mixture is found to have been compromised. In Wuhan a temporary emergency detection laboratory called "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, and can process 10,000 samples per day.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: Na ujenzi ukisimamiwa na mwanzilishi wa BGI Wang Jian na kukamilika katika siku 5, makadirio yameonyesha visa Hubei zingekuwa 47% zaidi na gharama inayoambatana ya kukabili karantini ingeongezeka maradufu ikiwa kiwango hiki cha kupima haingeanzishwa.
en-mt: With construction overseen by BGI founder Wang Jian and completed in 5 days, estimates have shown Hubei cases would have been 47% higher and the accompanying cost of facing quarantine would double if this testing rate had not been established.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: Maabara ya Wuhan imefuatwa haraka na maabara ya Huo-Yan huko Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, na Shanghai, katika jumla ya miji 12 kote Uchina.
en-mt: The Wuhan lab has been quickly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: Kufikia 4 Machi 2020 jumla ya uwezekano wa kila siku zilikuwa vipimo 50,000 kila siku.Miundo tofauti yanayopatikana bila malipo yaliyotolewa na Origami Assays zimetolewa na zina uwezo wa kupima kiasi cha sampuli ya wagonjwa 1122 ya COVID19 kwa kutumia vigezo vya vipimo 93 pekee .  Miundo hii yaliyosawazishwa huweza kutumiwa katika maabara ndogo bila kuhitaji matumizi ya roboti kushughulikia maji.
en-mt: As of 4 March 2020 the daily positivity totals were 50,000 daily tests. Different designs available free of charge provided by Origami Assays have been provided and are capable of measuring the volume of a sample of 1122 COVID19 patients using only 93 test parameters.  These synchronized structures can be used in small labs without requiring the use of robots to handle water.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: Kufikia Machi, upungufu na viwango duni ya zana za vipimo imekuwa changamoto kwa kupimwa kwa umma EU na Uingereza na Marekani.
en-mt: As of March, the inadequacies and poor standards of measurement tools have been challenged by public testing the EU and the UK and US.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: Hii imesababisha wachapishaji kuchunguza taratibu za utayarishaji wa sampuli unaohusisha sampuli za joto katika nyuzi joto 98 °C (208 °F) kwa dakika 5 kuachilia jenomu ya RNA kwa ajili ya vipimo zaidi.Tarehe 31 Machi ilitangazwa kwamba Muungano wa Milki za Kiarabu sasa ulikuwa unapima zaidi watu wengi kwa Virusi vya korona kuliko nchi nyingine yoyote, na ilikuwa mbioni kuzidisha viwango vya upimaji kuifikia idadi ya juu ya watu.
en-mt: This has led publishers to investigate sample preparation procedures involving heat samples at 98 °C (208 °F) temperatures for 5 minutes to release the RNA genome for further tests. On 31 March it was announced that the United Arab Emirates was now testing more people for the virus than any other country, and was on the verge of increasing testing rates to reach the highest number of people.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: Hii ilikuwa ni kupitia ujumuishaji wa uwezo wa kuhudumia watu walipo na ununuzi wa mahabara ya kupima idadi kubwa ya watu kutoka Group 42 na BGI (kulingana na mahabara yao ya ugunduzi wa dharura ya  "Huo-Yan" nchini China).
en-mt: This was through the integration of the capacity to cater for the people where they are and the purchase of a large population testing site from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection site in China).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: Yakiwa yamejengwa ndani ya siku 14, mahabara haya yana uwezo wa kufanya maelfu ya vipimo vya RT-PCR kila siku na ndiyo ya kwanza kote ulimwenguni yenye uwezo kama huu kutumika nje ya China.
en-mt: Built in 14 days, the tunnel is capable of performing thousands of RT-PCR tests each day and is the first in the world with such capabilities outside China.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: Vigezo mbalimbali vya kupimia vilivyolenga sehemu mbalimbali za utaratibu wa kijenetiki wa virusi vya korona viliundwa nchini China, Ufaransa, Ujerumani, Hong Kong, Japan na Marekani.
en-mt: Various testing criteria targeting different parts of the genetic mechanism of the coronavirus were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: Shirika la Afya Ulimenguni lilianza kutumia resipe ya Ujerumani ya kutengeneza vifurushi vinavyotumwa katika mataifa ya mapato ya chini yasiyo na uwezo wa kuunda vyao yenyewe.
en-mt: The Ulimenguni Health Organization began using German resipe to manufacture packages sent to low-income nations unable to create their own.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: Mwitikio wa Ujerumani ilichapishwa tarehe 17 Januari 2020; itifaki iliyotengenezwa na Kituo cha Udhibiti na Uzuiaji wa Magonjwa ya Marekani haikuwa inapatikana hadi 28 Januari, na kuchelewesha vipimo zilizopo huko Marekani.Uchina na Marekani zilikuwa na matatizo na ufanisi wa vifyaa vya kupima mwanzo wa mkurupuko, na nchi hizi na Australia hazingeweza kutoa vifaa vya kutosha kulingana na mahitaji na mapendekezo ya kupimwa na wataalam wa afya.
en-mt: German reaction was published on 17 January 2020; The protocol developed by the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention was not available until 28 January, delaying existing tests in the United States.China and the U.S. had problems with the effectiveness of the initial outbreak test launchers, and these countries and Australia could not provide adequate supplies based on the needs and recommendations to be tested by health experts.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Kwa ulinganisho, wataalamu wanasema kwamba upatikanaji wa upimaji katika maeneo mengi ya Korea Kusini kulisaidia kupunguza kuenea kwa virusi vipya vya korona.
en-mt: By contrast, experts say that the availability of testing in many parts of South Korea helped slow the spread of the new coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: Uwezo wa kupima, pakubwa katika mahabara ya sekta ya kibinafsi, ulijengwa kwa kipindi cha muda wa mrefu na serikali ya Korea ya Kusini.
en-mt: The testing capacity, largely in the private sector, was built over a long period of time by the South Korean government.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: Tarehe 16 Machi, Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni lilitoa mwito wa kupigwa jeki kwa mipango ya vipimo kama njia ya kupunguza kuendelea kuenea kwa janga kubwa la COVID-19.Hitaji la juu la vifurushi vya kufanyia vipimo kutokana na kuenea kwa virusi kwingi kulisababisha mrundiko wa mamia ya maelfu ya vipimo katika mahabara ya kibinafsi nchini Marekani, na kukawa na upungufu katika usambazaji wa kemikali za kufanyia vipimo.
en-mt: On March 16, the World Health Organization called for the expansion of testing plans as a way to reduce the continued spread of the COVID-19 pandemic. The high demand for test packages due to the widespread spread of the virus led to the piling up of hundreds of thousands of tests in private U.S. hospitals, and there was a shortage in the supply of chemical tests.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: Mwezi Machi 2020 China iliripoti matatizo katika usahihi wa vifurushi vya vya upimaji.
en-mt: In March 2020, China reported problems with the accuracy of testing packages.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: Nchini Marekani, vifurushi vya upimaji vilivyoundwa na CDC vilikuwa na "upungufu;" serikali kisha ikaondoa vizuizi ambavyo vilivzuia upimaji wa kibinafsi .Nchi ya Uhispania ilinunua vifurushi vya upimaji kutoka katika kampuni ya Uchina ya Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, lakini waligundua kwamba matokeo ya vipimo hayakuwa sahihi.
en-mt: In the US, the testing packages created by the CDC were "limited;" the government then lifted restrictions that prevented in-person testing. Spain bought testing packages from China's Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that the test results were incorrect.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: Shirika hilo lilifafanua kwamba matokeo hayo yasiyo sahihi yanaweza kutokana na kukosa kukusanya sampuli au kutotumia vifurushi ipasavyo.
en-mt: The agency explained that the incorrect results could result from failing to collect samples or not using packages properly.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: Wizara ya Uhispania ilisema kwamba itaondoa vifurushi vilivyorejesha matokeo yasiyo sahihi, na ingetumia vifurushi vinavyotolewa na Shenzhen Bioeasy badala yake.80% ya vifurushi vya upimaji ambavyo Jamhuri ya Cheki ilinunua kutoka China vilitoa matokeo yasiyo sahihi.Slovakia ilinunua vifurushi milioni 1.2 kutoka China ambavyo vilivyopatikana kutotoa matokeo sahihi.
en-mt: The Spanish ministry said it would remove packages that returned incorrect results, and would use packages supplied by Shenzhen Bioeasy instead.80% of the testing packages that the Czech Republic bought from China yielded incorrect results. Slovakia bought 1.2 million packages from China that were found to not produce accurate results.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: Waziri Mkuu Matovič alipendekeza kwamba vitupwe kwenye mto Danube.Ateş Kara kutoka Wizara ya Afya ya Uturuki alisema kuwa vifurushi vya upimajia ambavyo nchi ya Uturuki ilinunua kutoka China vilikuwa na "kiwango cha juu cha kosa" na "haikuvitumia."Nchi ya Uingereza ilinunua vifurushi milioni 3.5 kutoka China lakini mapema Aprili 2020 ikatangaza kuwa hazikuwa zinaweza kutumika.
en-mt: Prime Minister Matovič suggested that they be dumped on the Danube river.Ateş Kara from the Turkish Ministry of Health said that the testing packages that the Turkish state purchased from China had a "high error rate" and "did not use them." The UK bought 3.5 million packages from China but in early April 2020 announced they were unusable.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: Upimaji, ukifatwa na karantini ya wale waliopimwa na kupatikana na ugonjwa na kufuatiliwa kwa wale waliotangamana na walio na SARS-CoV-2, ilitokea katika matokeo ya kuambukizwa.
en-mt: Testing, followed by the quarantine of those who tested positive for the disease and traceable to those who were exposed to SARS-CoV-2, occurred in the results of infection.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: Watafiti wanaofanya kazi katika mji wa Italia wa Vò, eneo la kisa cha kwanza cha kifo kutokana na COVID-19 nchini Italia, waliendesha awamu mbili za vipimo kwa idadi nzima ya watu 3,400, takriban kwa utofauti wa siku kumi.
en-mt: Researchers working in the Italian city of Vò, the site of the first case of death from COVID-19 in Italy, ran two phases of tests on the entire population of 3,400, roughly for a ten-day difference.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: Takriban nusu ya watu waliopatikana na ugonjwa hawakuwa na dalili na visa vyote vilivyogunduliwa viliwekwa kwenye karantini.
en-mt: About half of the people diagnosed with the disease had no symptoms and all the cases diagnosed were quarantined.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: Huku usafiri ukiwa umedhibitiwa, hii iliondoa kabisa maambukizi mapya.
en-mt: With travel under control, this completely eliminated new infections.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: Kukiwa na mpango kabambe wa kufuatilia watu waliogusana, vizuizi vya usafiri wa ndani wa ndani ya nchi, upimaji na karantini, janga la virusi vya korona 2020 nchini Singapore vimeenea pole pole kuliko mataifa mengine yaliyoendelea, lakini bila vizuizi vya hali mbaya zaidi kama vile kulazimisha kufunga mikahawa na maduka ya rejareja.
en-mt: With an ambitious plan for contact tracing, restrictions on domestic travel, testing and quarantine, Singapore's coronavirus pandemic 2020 has spread more slowly than in other developed nations, but without more severe restrictions such as forcing the closure of restaurants and retail outlets.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: Matukio mengi yamekatishwa na Singapore ilianza kuwashauri wakaazi kukaa nyumbani tarehe 28 Machi, lakini shule zilifunguliwa tena kwa muda ufaao baada ya muda wa likizo tarehe 23 Machi.
en-mt: Many events have been cancelled and Singapore began advising residents to stay home on March 28, but schools reopened at the appropriate time after the holiday period on March 23.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: Nchi nyingine nyingi pia zimedhibiti janga hili kubwa kwa mpango kabambe wa kufuatilia watu waliogusana, vizuizi vya usafiri ndani ya nchi, upimaji na karantini, lakini kwa kiwango cha chini cha kufungia shughuli za kawaida, kama vile Aislandi na Korea Kusini.
en-mt: Many other countries have also managed the massive pandemic with an ambitious programme of contact tracing, restrictions on travel locally, testing and quarantine, but with a minimum of freezing normal activities, such as in Australia and South Korea.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: Utafiti wa kitakwimu umeonyesha kwamba mataifa ambayo yamepima zaidi, ikilinganishwa na idadi ya vifo, yana viwango vya chini vya hali mbaya ya visa, pengine kwa sababu ya mataifa haya kuwa na uwezo mzuri wa kugundua wale walio na dalili za wastani au bila dalili.
en-mt: Statistical research has shown that nations that have tested the most, compared to the number of deaths, have lower rates of worsening case status, perhaps because of these nations being better able to detect those with moderate or no symptoms.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: WHO inapendekeza kwamba mataifa yasiyo na uwezo kupima na mahabara ya kitaifa yenye uzoefu wa chini kuhusu COVID-19 yatume visa vitano vya kwanza vya kupatikana kwa ugonjwa na sampuli kumi za kwanza zisizo na COVID-19 katika mojawapo ya mahabara husika 16 ya WHO kwa ajili ya upimaji wa uthibitisho.
en-mt: WHO recommends that countries with low COVID-19 experience send the first five cases of the disease and the first ten COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 relevant WHO subcontinents for confirmation testing.

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: Kati ya mahabara husika 16, 7 yapo bara Asia, 5 yapo Ulaya, 2 Afrika, 1 Amerika ya Kaskazini na 1 Australia.
en-mt: Of the 16 countries, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: Kwenye chati ifuatayo, safu wima ya “Kisa cha ugonjwa kama % ya vipimo” inachochewa na sera ya upimaji ya upimaji.
en-mt: On the following chart, the "Disease rate as % of tests" column is prompted by the testing policy.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: Nchi inayopima watu waliolazwa hospitalini pekee itakuwa na idadi ya juu ya visa vya ugonjwa kama % ya vipimo kuliko nchi inayopima wananchi wote, iwe wanaonyesha dalili au la, mambo mengine yakiwa sawa.
en-mt: A country measuring hospitalized people alone will have a higher number of cases as a % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether they show symptoms or not, other things being equal.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: Kuosha mikono (au kunawa mikono), ambako pia kunajulikana kama usafi wa mikono, ni kitendo cha kusafisha mikono kwa madhumuni ya kuondoa mchanga, uchafu, viini au vitu vingine visivyotakana.
en-mt: Hand washing (or hand washing), also known as hand hygiene, is the practice of cleaning hands for the purpose of removing soil, dirt, germs or other undesirable substances.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: Kuosha mikono kwa sabuni kila mara katika "nyakati fulani muhimu" wakati wa mchana huzuia kuenea kwa magonjwa mengi, kwa mfano kuendesha na kipindupindu, ambayo husambazwa kupitia njia ya kinyesi kufika kwa mdomo.
en-mt: Washing hands with soap regularly at "certain critical times" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example driving with cholera, which is spread through feces to reach the mouth.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: Watu pia wanaweza kuambukizwa magonjwa ya kupumua kama vile homa ya mafua au homa ya kawaida, kwa mfano, iwapo hawataosha mikono yao kabla ya kugusa macho yao, pua au mdomo (yaani membreni zilizo na majimaji).
en-mt: People can also contract respiratory illnesses such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose or mouth (i.e. membranes containing fluid).

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Nyakati tano muhimu wakati wa mchana ambapo kuosha mkono kwa sabuni ni muhimu ni pamoja na: kabla na baada ya kuenda msalani, baada ya kusafisha choo ya mtoto au kumbadilisha nepi, kabla ya kumpa mtoto chakula, kabla ya kula na kabla na baada ya kuandaa chakula au kugusa nyama mbichi, samaki au kuku.
en-mt: The five most important times during the day where hand washing with soap is necessary include: before and after going to the salon, after cleaning the child's toilet or changing diapers, before giving the child food, before eating and before and after preparing food or touching raw meat, fish or poultry.

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: Ikiwa maji na sabuni hazipatikani, mikono inawezaoshwa kwa jivu.Shirika la Afya Duniani hupendekeza kuosha mikono:
en-mt: If water and soap are not available, hands can be washed with ash. The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: Kabla ya, wakati wa, na baada ya kutayarisha chakula.
en-mt: Before, during, and after preparing food.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: Kabla ya na baada ya kumhudumia mgonjwa.
en-mt: Before and after taking care of the patient.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: Baada ya kubadilisha nepi au kumsafisha mtoto ambaye ameenda chooni.
en-mt: After changing diapers or cleaning up a child who has gone to the toilet.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: Baada ya kupenga makamasi, kukohoa au kupiga chafya.
en-mt: After sneezing, coughing or sneezing.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: Baada ya kushika mnyama, chakula cha mnyama, au kinyesi cha mnyama.
en-mt: After holding the animal, the animal's food, or the animal's feces.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: Usafi wa mikono wa kimatibabu unarejelea shughuli za usafi zinayohusiana na taratibu za kimatibabu.
en-mt: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene activities related to medical procedures.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: Kuosha mikono kabla ya kupeana dawa au matibabu kunaweza kuzuia au kupunguza kuenea kwa ugonjwa.
en-mt: Washing your hands before handing out medication or treatment can prevent or slow the spread of disease.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: lengo kuu la kimatibabu la kuosha mikono ni kusafisha mikono kutokana na virusi (bakteria, virusi, au viini vingine vianavyoweza kusababisha magonjwa) na kemikali zinazoweza kusababisha madhara au magonjwa.
en-mt: The main medical goal of hand washing is to clean hands from viruses (bacteria, viruses, or other germs that can cause disease) and chemicals that can cause harm or disease.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: Hii ni muhimu hasa kwa watu wanaoshughulikia vyakula au wanaofanya kazi katika uwanja wa kimatibabu, lakini pia ni kitendo muhimu kwa umma kijumla.
en-mt: This is especially important for people who deal with food or work in the medical field, but it is also an important act for the general public.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: Kuosha mikono kuna manufaa mengi ya kiafya, ikiwa ni pamoja na kupunguza kuenea kwa homa ya mafua, virusi vya korona na magonjwa mengine ya kuambukiza; kuzuia sababu za kuambukiza kwa kuendesha; kupunguza magonjwa ya kuambukiza;
en-mt: Handwashing has many health benefits, including reducing the spread of influenza, coronavirus and other infectious diseases; prevent infectious factors by driving; reducing infectious diseases;

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: na kupunguza vifo vya watoto wachanga wakati wa kujifungua nyumbani.
en-mt: and reduce infant mortality during home deliveries.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: Utafiti uliofanywa 2013 ulionyesha kuwa kuboresha matendo ya kuosha mikono kunaweza kusababisha kuboreka kwa viwango vidogo katika kimo cha watoto chini ya umri wa miaka mitano.
en-mt: A 2013 study showed that improving handwashing practices could lead to a small improvement in the stature of children under the age of five.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: Katika mataifa yanayoendelea, viwango vya vifo vya watoto vinavyohusiana na magonjwa ya kupumua na kuendesha vinaweza kuzuiwa kwa kuanzisha mabadiliko ya mienendo rahisi, kama vile kuosha mikono kwa sabuni.
en-mt: In developing nations, child mortality rates related to respiratory and driving diseases can be prevented by introducing changes to simple dynamics, such as washing hands with soap.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: Kitendo hiki rahisi kinaweza kupunguza kiwango cha vifo kutokana na magonjwa haya kwa karibu 50%.
en-mt: This simple act can reduce the mortality rate from these diseases by about 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: Mikakati inayohimiza watu kuosha mikono inaweza kupunguza vipindi vya kuendesha kwa takribani theluthi moja, na hii inaweza kulinganishwa na kutoa maji safi katika maeneo ya mapato ya chini.
en-mt: Strategies that encourage people to wash their hands can reduce driving periods by about one-third, and this can be compared to providing clean water in low-income areas.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: 48% ya kupungua kwa vipindi vya kuendesha inaweza kuhusishwa na kuosha mikono kwa sabuni.Kuosha mikono kwa sabuni ni njia moja inayofaa zaidi isiyo na gharama ya juu ya kuzuia kuendesha na maambukizi ya ugonjwa wa kupumua (ARI), kama mwenendo wa wa kawaidaunaofuatwa nyumbani, shuleni na katika jamii kote ulimwenguni.
en-mt: 48% of the decrease in driving periods can be attributed to hand washing with soap. Hand washing with soap is the single most effective non-cost high-cost method of preventing driving and acute respiratory syndrome (ARI) infections, as a common trend followed at home, in schools and in communities around the world.

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: Nimonia, aina ya ARI kuu, ni kisababishi nambari moja cha vifo vya watoto walio chini ya miaka mitano, na kuuwa takriban watoto milioni 1.8 kila mwaka.
en-mt: Pneumonia, a form of ARI major, is the number one cause of death in children under five, killing about 1.8 million children each year.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
targetString: Kuendesha na nimonia kwa pamoja huchangia karibu vifo vya watoto milioni 3.5 kila mwaka.
en-mt: Driving and pneumonia together account for nearly 3.5 million child deaths each year.

sourceString: According to UNICEF, turning hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet into an ingrained habit can save more lives than any single vaccine or medical intervention, cutting deaths from diarrhea by almost half and deaths from acute respiratory infections by one-quarter.
targetString: Kulingana na UNICEF, kufanya uoshaji mikono kwa sabuni kabla ya kula na baada ya kutumia choo kuwa mazoea kunaweza kuokoa maisha zaidi kuliko chanjo yoyote au mkakati wa kimatibabu, kupunguza vifo kutokana na kuendesha kwa karibu nusu na vifo kutokana na maambukizi ya pumu kwa robo.
en-mt: According to UNICEF, making hand washing with soap before eating and after using the toilet a practice can save more lives than any vaccine or medical strategy, reducing deaths from running by nearly half and deaths from asthma infections by a quarter.

sourceString: Hand washing is usually integrated together with other sanitation interventions as part of water, sanitation and hygiene (WASH) programmes.
targetString: Kuosha mikono kwa kawaida hujumuishwa kwa mikakati mingine ya usafishaji kama sehemu ya maji, mipango ya usafi na unadhifu (OSHA).
en-mt: Handwashing is typically incorporated into other cleaning strategies as part of the Water, Hygiene and Hygiene Programs (OSHA).

sourceString: Hand washing also protects against impetigo which is transmitted through direct physical contact.
targetString: Kuosha mikono pia huzuia ugonjwa wa ngozi wa upele ambao husambazwa kupitia mgusano wa moja kwa moja wa mwili.
en-mt: Handwashing also prevents rash skin disease that is transmitted through direct physical contact.

sourceString: A small detrimental effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can lead to skin damage due to drying of the skin.
targetString: Athari kidogo mbaya ya kuosha mikono ni kwamba kuosha mikono kila mara kunaweza kusababisha kuharibika kwa ngozi kutokana na kukauka kwa ugonjwa.
en-mt: A slight negative side effect of hand washing is that frequent hand washing can cause skin damage due to disease dryness.

sourceString: A 2012 Danish study found that excessive hand washing can lead to an itchy, flaky skin condition known as hand eczema or hand dermatitis, which is especially common among health-care workers.
targetString: Utafiti wa nchini Denmaki wa 2012 ulionyesha kwamba kuosha mikono kupita kiasi kunaweza kusababisha hali ya mwasho wa ngozi unaofahamika kuwakizema ya mikono au ugonjwa wa ngozi ya mikojno hali zilizo za kawaida hususan miongoni mwa wafanyakazi wa matibabu.
en-mt: A 2012 study in Denmaki showed that excessive hand washing can lead to a condition of skin irritation known to be hand sanitizer or skin disease which is common, especially among medical workers.

sourceString: Too frequent hand washing is also seen as one of the symptoms of obsessive-compulsive disorder (OCD).
targetString: Kuosha mikono kila mara pia kunaonekana kuwa mojawapo ya dalili za ugonjwa wa kuwaza au kurudia jambo kupita kiasi (OCD).
en-mt: Frequent handwashing also appears to be one of the symptoms of over-thinking or relapse (OCD).

sourceString: There are five critical times during the day where washing hands with soap is important to reduce fecal-oral transmission of disease: after using the bathroom (urination, defecation), after cleaning a child's bottom (changing nappies), before feeding a child, before eating and before/after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: Kuna nyakati tano muhimu kwa siku ambapo kuosha mikono kwa sabuni ni muhimu ili kupunguza usambazaji wa magonjwa ya yanatoka kwa kinyesi hadi mdomoni: baada ya kutumia choo (kuenda haja ndogo, kuenda haja kubwa), baada ya kumsafisha moto haja yake (kubadilisha nepi zake), kabla ya kumpa chakula, kabla ya kula na kabla/baada ya kuandaa chakula au kugusa nyama mbichi, samaki au ndege wa kufuga.
en-mt: There are five important times in the day when hand washing with soap is necessary to reduce the spread of diseases from feces to mouth: after using the toilet (to go small, to go anus), after cleaning her need (changing her diapers), before giving her food, before eating and before/after preparing food or touching raw meat,  Fish or fowl.

sourceString: Other occasions when correct handwashing technique should be practiced in order to prevent the transmission of disease include before and after treating a cut or wound; after sneezing, coughing, or blowing your nose; after touching animal waste or handling animals; and after touching garbage.
targetString: Matukio mengine ambapo mbinu sahihi ya kusha mikono inapaswa kufanywa ili kuzuia usambazaji wa ugonjwa ni pamoja na kabla na baada ya kutibu jeraha; baada ya kupiga chafya, kukohoa au kutoa makamasi; baada ya kugusa uchafu wa wanyama au kuwashugulikia; baada ya kugusa taka.
en-mt: Other instances where proper handwashing technique should be performed to prevent the spread of disease include before and after treating the wound; after sneezing, coughing or giving a cough; after touching animal debris or dealing with them; after touching the waste.

sourceString: In many countries, there is a low rate of hand washing with soap.
targetString: Katika nchi nyingi, kuna kiwango cha chini cha kuosha mikono kwa sabuni.
en-mt: In many countries, there is a minimum amount of hand washing with soap.

sourceString: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households practiced hand washing with soap.A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the United States near the middle with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 percent.Several behaviour change methodologies now exist to increase uptake of the behaviour of hand washing with soap at the critical times.Group hand washing for school children at set times of the day is one option in developing countries to engrain hand washing in children's behaviors.
targetString: Utafiti wa kuosha mikono katika nchi 54 mnamo 2015 ulitambua kuwa kwa wastani, 38.7% ya nyumba walikuwa wanaosha mikono yao kwa sabuni. Utafiti wa 2014 ulionyesha kuwa Saudi Arabia ilikuwa na kiwango cha juu zaidi cha asilimia 97; Marekani karibu katikati na asilimia 77; na Uchina na kiwango cha chini zaidi cha asilimia 23.Mbinu kadhaa za kubadilisha tabia zipo kwa sasa ili kuongeza tabia ya kuosha mikono kwa sabuni katika nyakati hizi za hatari.Kuosha kwa mikono kwa vikundi kwa watoto wa shule katika masaa ya siku yaliyoratibiwa ni mojawapo ya mbinu katika nchi zinazoendelea ili kuwafunza na kuwakumbusha watoto kuwa na tabia ya kuosha mikono yao.
en-mt: A study of hand washing in 54 countries in 2015 found that on average, 38.7% of households were washing their hands with soap. A 2014 study showed that Saudi Arabia had the highest rate of 97 percent; the U.S. nearly center with 77 percent; and China with the lowest rate of 23 per cent.Several behavioural modification techniques are in place at present to increase the practice of hand washing with soap in these dangerous times. Group hand-washing for schoolchildren at scheduled hours of the day is one of the techniques in developing countries to train and remind children to behave in their hands.

sourceString: The "Essential Health Care Program" implemented by the Department of Education in the Philippines is an example of at scale action to promote children's health and education.
targetString: Programu ya Kimsingi ya Huduma ya Afya iliyotekelezwa na Wizara ya Elimu huko Ufilipino ni mfano wa hatua ya hali ya juu kukuza afya na elimu ya watoto.
en-mt: The Basic Healthcare Program implemented by the Ministry of Education in the Philippines is an example of advanced action to promote the health and education of children.

sourceString: Deworming twice a year, supplemented with washing hands daily with soap, brushing teeth daily with fluoride, is at the core of this national program.
targetString: Kuua minyoo mara mbili kwa mwaka, ikiongezwa na kuosha mikono kila siku kwa sabuni, kupiga mswaki kila siku kwa florini, ni msingi wa mradi huu wa kitaifa.
en-mt: Killing worms twice a year, supplemented by daily hand washing with soap, daily brushing for florini, is the foundation of this national project.

sourceString: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.
targetString: Pia imefaulu kutekelezwa nchini Indonesia.
en-mt: It has also been successfully implemented in Indonesia.

sourceString: Removal of microorganisms from skin is enhanced by the addition of soaps or detergents to water.
targetString: Kuondolewa kwa viini kutoka kwa ngozi kumewezeshwa kwa kuongeza sabuni au dawa kali ya kusafisha majini.
en-mt: The removal of germs from the skin is facilitated by adding soap or a strong water purification spray.

sourceString: The main action of soaps and detergents is to reduce barriers to solution, and increase solubility.
targetString: Kitendo muhimu cha sabuni na dawa kali ni kupunguza vizuizi vya mchanganyiko, na kuongeza umumunyifu.
en-mt: The key act of soap and strong spray is to reduce the inhibitions of the mixture, and increase solubility.

sourceString: Water alone is an inefficient skin cleanser because fats and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not readily dissolved in water.
targetString: Maji pekee hayana uwezo wa kusafisha ngozi kwa sababu mafuta na protini, ambazo ni vijenzi vya udongo wa kikaboni, haziyeyushwi kwa urahisi katika maji.
en-mt: Water alone is not capable of cleaning skin because oils and proteins, which are components of organic soil, are not easily dissolved in water.

sourceString: Cleansing is, however, aided by a reasonable flow of water..
targetString: Kusafisha, hata hivyo, husaidiwa na kuwepo kwa mtiririko mzuri wa maji..
en-mt: Cleanup, however, is aided by the presence of good water flow..

sourceString: Solid soap, because of its reusable nature, may hold bacteria acquired from previous uses.
targetString: Sabuni mango, kwa sabau ya hali yake ya kutumika tena, inaweza kuweka bakteria zilizopatikana kutoka kwa utumiaji wa hapo awali.
en-mt: Soap, because of its reusable condition, can keep bacteria from previous use.

sourceString: A small number of studies which have looked at the bacterial transfer from contaminated solid soap have concluded transfer is unlikely as the bacteria are rinsed off with the foam.
targetString: Idadi chache ya utafiti ambao umeshughulikia usambazaji wa bakteria kutoka kwa sabuni mango iliyochafuliwa umehitimisha kuwa usambazaji si rahisi kutokea kwa sababu bakteria huoshwa na kuondolewa kupitia fomu.
en-mt: A limited number of studies that have dealt with the distribution of bacteria from contaminated solid soap have concluded that distribution is unlikely to occur because bacteria are washed and removed through forms.

sourceString: The CDC still states "liquid soap with hands-free controls for dispensing is preferable".
targetString: Kituo cha CDC bado kinataja kwamba "sabuni ya maji isiyodhibitiwa kwa mikono katika umwagaji wake hupendekezwa".
en-mt: The CDC still mentions that "uncontrolled water soap by hand in its bath is recommended".

sourceString: Antibacterial soaps have been heavily promoted to a health-conscious public.
targetString: Sabuni zinazouwa bakteria zimetangazwa sana kwa umma unaojali afya.
en-mt: Soaps that kill bacteria have been widely publicized to the health-conscious public.

sourceString: To date, there is no evidence that using recommended antiseptics or disinfectants selects for antibiotic-resistant organisms in nature.
targetString: Kufikia leo, hakuna ushahidi kwamba kutumia antiseptiki inayopendekezwa au viuaji vimelea huteua viumbe visivyouawa kwa dawa katika asili.
en-mt: To date, there is no evidence that using a recommended antiseptic or disinfectant designates non-dead organisms for drugs in nature.

sourceString: However, antibacterial soaps contain common antibacterial agents such as triclosan, which has an extensive list of resistant strains of organisms.
targetString: Hata hivyo, sabuni zinazouwa bakteria zina bidhaa za kawaida zinazopambana na bakteria kama vile triclosan, ambayo ina orodha ndefu ya aina za viini visivyokufa.
en-mt: However, detergents that kill bacteria contain naturally anti-bacterial products such as triclosan, which has a long list of immortal germ types.

sourceString: So, even if antibiotic resistant strains aren't selected for by antibacterial soaps, they might not be as effective as they are marketed to be.
targetString: Kwa hivyo, hata kama aina zisizo kufa hazijatolewa kwa sabuni dhidi ya bakteria, huenda zisifanye kazi kwa ufanisi kama zinavyotangazwa.
en-mt: Therefore, even if the immortal species are not deteriorated against bacteria, they may not work as effectively as advertised.

sourceString: Besides the surfactant and skin-protecting agent, the sophisticated formulations may contain acids (acetic acid, ascorbic acid, lactic acid) as pH regulator, antimicrobially active benzoic acid and further skin conditioners (aloe vera, vitamins, menthol, plant extracts).A comprehensive analysis from the University of Oregon School of Public Health indicated that plain soaps are as effective as consumer-grade anti-bacterial soaps containing triclosan in preventing illness and removing bacteria from the hands.
targetString: Kando na dawa ya kulinda ngozi, mchanganyiko changamano unaweza kuwa na asidi (asidi asetiki, asidi askobiki, asidi ya maziwa yaliyochachuka) kama kidhibiti cha pH, asidi inayopambana na viini ya benzoic na vilainishi vingine vya ngozi (aloe vera, vitamini, mentha, dawa kutoka kwenye miti).Uchanganuzi tondoti wa Chuo Kikuu cha Oregon Shule ya Afya ya Umma ulionyesha kuwa sabuni za kawaida hufaa tu kama zilizvyo zile za hadhi ya watumiaji za kupambana na bakteria zilizo na madini ya triclosan katika kuzuia magonjwa na kuondoa bakteria kwenye mikono.
en-mt: Apart from a skin-protecting drug, a complex mixture can contain acid (acid asetiki, ascorbic acid, fermented milk acid) as a pH regulator, an anti-benzoic acid and other skin lubricant (aloe vera, vitamins, mentha, spray from trees). An analysis by the University of Oregon School of Public Health showed that regular soaps are just as effective as consumer status for fighting triclosan-rich bacteria in preventing disease and removing bacteria from the hands.

sourceString: Hot water that is comfortable for washing hands is not hot enough to kill bacteria.
targetString: Maji moto ambayo ni sawa kuosha mikono sio moto kutosha kuuwa bakteria.
en-mt: Hot water that's fine to wash hands isn't hot enough to kill bacteria.

sourceString: Bacteria grow much faster at body temperature (37 °C).
targetString: Bakteria hukua haraka zaidi katika halijoto ya mwili ya (37 °C).
en-mt: Bacteria grow more rapidly at a body temperature of 37°C.

sourceString: However, warm, soapy water is more effective than cold, soapy water at removing natural oils which hold soils and bacteria.
targetString: Hata hivyo, maji moto, yenye sabuni hufaa zaidi kuliko maji baridi yenye sabunu katika kuondoa mafuta asilia ambayo hushikilia mchanga na bakteria.
en-mt: However, hot, soapy water is more effective than cold water with sabunu in removing natural oils that hold sand and bacteria.

sourceString: Contrary to popular belief however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the microbial load on hands.
targetString: Kinyume na imani maarufu hata hivyo, tafiti za kisayansi zimeonyesha kwamba kutumia maji vuguvugu hakuna athari katika kupunguza uchafu wa viiini kwenye mikono.
en-mt: Contrary to popular belief, however, scientific studies have shown that using warm water has no effect on reducing the contaminants in the hands.

sourceString: A hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water-based hand hygiene agent.
targetString: Kieuzi au antiseptiki ya mkono ni dawa isiyo ya maji ya kusafisha mikono.
en-mt: Hand sanitizer or hand antiseptic is a non-water spray for cleaning hands.

sourceString: In the late 1990s and early part of the 21st century, alcohol rub non-water-based hand hygiene agents (also known as alcohol-based hand rubs, antiseptic hand rubs, or hand sanitizers) began to gain popularity.
targetString: Mwishoni mwa miaka ya 1990 na mapema mwongo wa 21, kiowevu cha kuosha mikono chenye alkoholi kisichotumia maji (ambacho pia kinafahamika kuwa vieuzi vyenye alkoholi, vieuzi vya antiseptiki au vieuzi vya mikono.) vilianza kuwa maarufu.
en-mt: In the late 1990s and early 21st decade, water-based handwashing fluids (which are also known to be alcoholics, antiseptic or hand washers.) became popular.

sourceString: Most are based on isopropyl alcohol or ethanol formulated together with a thickening agent such as Carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) into a gel, or a humectant such as glycerin into a liquid, or foam for ease of use and to decrease the drying effect of the alcohol.
targetString: Nyingi zina alkoholi ya isopropyl au ethanoli ilichanganywa na viungo vya kuzipa uzito kama vile Carbomer (polymer ya asidi ya acrylic) na kuunda mafuta, au kiongezaji unyevu kama vile kuifanya gliserini kuwa oevu, au povu ili itumike haraka na kupunguza athari za ukavu za alkoholi.
en-mt: Most contain isopropyl or ethanol alcohol mixed with ingredients to give them weight such as carbomer (polymer of acrylic acid) to create fat, or a moisture additive such as to make gliserini wet, or foam so that it can be used quickly and reduce the dryness effects of the alcohol.

sourceString: Adding diluted hydrogen-peroxide increases further  the antimicrobial activity.Hand sanitizers containing a minimum of 60 to 95% alcohol are efficient germ killers.
targetString: Kuongeza Haidrojeni peroksaidi iliyoyeyushwa huzidisha shughuli ya kupambana na uchafu.Vieuzi vya mikono vilivyo na angalau 60 hadi 95% ya alkoholi hufaa katika kuuwa viini.
en-mt: Adding hydrogen peroxide dissolved increases the anti-fouling activity. Hand held with at least 60 to 95% alcohol is effective in disinfection.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers kill bacteria, multi-drug resistant bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, herpes, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza, and hepatitis) and fungi.
targetString: Vieuzi vilivyo na alkoholi huuwa bakteria, bakteria zisizouawa kwa dawa (MRSA na VRE), kifua kikuu, na baadhi ya virusi (pamoja na HIV, hepesi, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, homa ya mafua na hepatitisi) na kuvu.
en-mt: Alcohol-containing bacteria kill bacteria, non-drug killed bacteria (MRSA and VRE), tuberculosis, and some viruses (including HIV, hepatitis, RSV, rhinovirus, vaccinia, influenza and hepatitis) and fungus.

sourceString: Alcohol rub sanitizers containing 70% alcohol kill 99.97% (3.5 log reduction, similar to 35 decibel reduction) of the bacteria on hands 30 seconds after application and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 log reduction) of the bacteria on hands 1 minute after application.Hand sanitizers are most effective against bacteria and less effective against some viruses.
targetString: Vieuzi vilivyo na alkoholi kwa asilimia 70% huuwa 99.97% (mapunguzo ya logi ya 3.5, sawa na mapunguzo ya desibeli 35) ya bakteria sekunde 30 baada ya kuvitumia na 99.99% hadi 99.999% (mapunguzo ya logi 4 hadi 5) ya bakteria kweneye mikono dakika 1 baada ya kuvitumia.Vieuzi vya mikono vinafaa zaidi dhidi ya bakteria na havifai sana dhidi ya virusi fulani.
en-mt: 70% alcoholic beverages kill 99.97% (3.5 log cuts, 35 decibels) of bacteria 30 seconds after using them and 99.99% to 99.999% (4 to 5 logs) of bacteria in the hands 1 minute after using them. Hand-held vials are more effective against bacteria and less effective against certain viruses.

sourceString: Alcohol-based hand sanitizers are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk) type viruses, the most common cause of contagious gastroenteritis.Enough hand antiseptic or alcohol rub must be used to thoroughly wet or cover both hands.
targetString: Vieuzi vya mikono vilivyo na alkoholi karibu havifai kabisa dhidi ya virusi aina ya norovirus (au Norwalk), ambavyo ni visababishi vya kawaida zaidi vya ugonjwa wa kuambukizana wa gastroenteritisi.Dawa ya kutosha au kieuzi chenye alkoholi lazima kitumike ipasavyo ili kutia mikono majimaji au kufunika mikono yote.
en-mt: Alcohol-based hand-held scents are almost entirely ineffective against norovirus (or Norwalk), which is the most common cause of gastroenteritisi. Adequate medication or alcoholic spray must be used appropriately to coat the fluid or cover both hands.

sourceString: The front and back of both hands and between and the ends of all fingers are rubbed for approximately 30 seconds until the liquid, foam or gel is dry.
targetString: Sehemu ya mbele na nyuma ya mikono yote na katikati na ncha za vidole vyote husuguliwa kwa angalau sekunde 30 hadi kioevu, povu au mauta kukauka.
en-mt: The front and back of both hands and the middle and ends of all fingers are rubbed for at least 30 seconds until liquid, foam or mauta dry.

sourceString: Finger tips must be washed well too, rubbing them in both palms.The US Center for Disease Control and Prevention recommends hand washing over hand sanitizer rubs, particularly when hands are visibly dirty.
targetString: Ncha za vidole lazima zioshwe vizuri pia, kwa kuzisugua kwenye viganja vyote.Kituo cha Kudhibiti na Kuzuia Magonjwa cha Marekani hupendekeza kuosha mikono kuliko kutumia vieuzi, hususan wakati ni wazi kuwa mikono ni chafu.
en-mt: The tip of the fingers must be washed thoroughly too, by rubbing them on both palms. The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention recommends washing hands rather than using fiberglasses, especially when it's clear that hands are dirty.

sourceString: The increasing use of these agents is based on their ease of use and rapid killing activity against micro-organisms; however, they should not serve as a replacement for proper hand washing unless soap and water are unavailable.
targetString: kuongezeka kwa matumizi ya viowevu hivi yanatokana na urahisi wa kutumika kwake na shughuli ya kuuwa viini haraka, hata hivyo, havpaswi kutumika kama njia mbadaya ya kuosha mikono isipokuwa iwapo sabuni na maji hazipatikani.
en-mt: The increase in the use of these fluids is due to the ease of its use and the rapid disinfection activity, however, it should not be used as a handwashing method unless soap and water are not available.

sourceString: Frequent use of alcohol-based hand sanitizers can cause dry skin unless emollients and/or skin moisturizers are added to the formula.
targetString: Matumizi ya mara kwa mara ya vieuzi vilivyo na alkoholi yanaweza kusababisha kukauka kwa ngozi isipokuwa viungo vya emolienti na/au viungo vya kulainisha ngozi viwe vimeongezwa kwenye fomula hiyo.
en-mt: Frequent use of alcol-containing solvents can cause skin dryness unless emolienti ingredients and/or skin softening ingredients are added to the formula.

sourceString: The drying effect of alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding glycerin and/or other emollients to the formula.
targetString: Athari ya alkoholi ya kukausha ngozi inaweza kupunguzwa au kuondolewa kwa kuongeza gliserini na/au viungo vingine vya emolineti kwenye fomula hiyo.
en-mt: The effect of skin drying alcohol can be reduced or eliminated by adding gliserini and/or other emolinet ingredients to the formula.

sourceString: In clinical trials, alcohol-based hand sanitizers containing emollients caused substantially less skin irritation and dryness than soaps or antimicrobial detergents.
targetString: Katika majaribio ya kikliniki, vieuzi vilivyo na alkoholi vilivyo na viungo vya emolienti vilisababisha kiwango cha chini cha mwasho na kukauka kwa ngozi ikilinganishwa na sabuni nyingine za kuuwa viini.
en-mt: In clinical trials, alcohol-based solvents with emolienti ingredients resulted in lower amounts of itching and dryness compared to other disinfectant detergents.

sourceString: Allergic contact dermatitis, contact urticaria syndrome or hypersensitivity to alcohol or additives present in alcohol hand rubs rarely occur.
targetString: Matatizo ya mzio unaotakana na mguso wa ngozi, ugonjwa wa kuchubuka kwa ngozi au matatizo yanayotokana na alkoholi au viungo vilivyo kwenye vieuzi vilivyo na alkoholi hayakutokea sana.
en-mt: Problems with skin contact, skin bruises or problems with alcohol or ingredients in alcohol-based ingredients did not occur much.

sourceString: The lower tendency to induce irritant contact dermatitis became an attraction as compared to soap and water hand washing.
targetString: Uwezo wa chini wa kusababisha kuchomeka kwa ngozi uligeuka kuwa kivutio ikilinganishwa na kuosha mikono kwa sabuni na maji.
en-mt: The low ability to cause skin burns turned out to be an attraction compared to washing hands with soap and water.

sourceString: Despite their effectiveness, non-water agents do not cleanse the hands of organic material, but simply disinfect them.
targetString: Licha ya kufaa kwake, bidhaa zisizo za maji hazisafishi mikono kutokana na vifaa vya kioganiki, lakini huuwa viini kwavyo.
en-mt: Despite its suitability, non-water products do not wash hands from organic materials, but they kill germs with them.

sourceString: It is for this reason that hand sanitizers are not as effective as soap and water at preventing the spread of many pathogens, since the pathogens still remain on the hands.
targetString: Ni kutokana na sababu hii ndipo vieuzi vya mikono havifai zaidi kama sabuni na maji katika kuzuia kuenea kwa viini kwa sababu viini vile bado husalia kwenye mikono.
en-mt: It is for this reason that hand repellents are less effective as soap and water in preventing the spread of germs because the germs still remain in the hands.

sourceString: Alcohol-free hand sanitizer efficacy is heavily dependent on the ingredients and formulation, and historically has significantly under-performed alcohol and alcohol rubs.
targetString: Ufanisi wa kieuzi kisicho na alkoholi hutegemea sana viungo na chembe chembe zake, na kihistoria havijafanya vyema ikilinganishwa na vile vilivyo na alkoholi.
en-mt: The effectiveness of alcohol-free food depends heavily on its ingredients and particles, and historically they have not performed well compared to those with alcohol.

sourceString: More recently, formulations that use benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have persistent and cumulative antimicrobial activity after application, unlike alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in efficacy after repeated use, probably due to progressive adverse skin reactions.
targetString: Hivi majuzi zaidi, michanganyiko inayotumia kloraidi ya benzalkonium imeonyeshwa kuwa na shughuli thabiti na ya kijumla dhidi ya viini baada ya kutumika, ikilinganishwa na alkoholi, ambayo imeonyeshwa kupungua katika ufanisi wake baada ya kutumika kwa muda, pengine kutokana na kuendelea kusababisha matatizo mabaya ya ngozi.
en-mt: More recently, mixtures using benzalkonium chloride have been shown to have a consistent and overall positive activity against germs after being used, compared to alcohol, which has been shown to decrease in its effectiveness after being used for some time, possibly due to continuing to cause serious skin problems.

sourceString: Many people in low-income communities cannot afford soap and use ash or soil instead.
targetString: Watu wengi kutoka katika jamii za mapato ya chini hawawezi kumudu bei za sabuni na hutumia jivu au mchanga badala yake.
en-mt: Many people from low-income communities cannot afford soap prices and use ash or sand instead.

sourceString: Ash or soil may be more effective than water alone, but may be less effective than soap.
targetString: Jivu au mchanga unaweza kufaa zaidi kuliko maji pekee lakini hauwezi kuwa na ufanisi kuliko sabuni.
en-mt: Ash or sand may be more suitable than water alone but may not be more effective than soap.

sourceString: One concern is that if the soil or ash is contaminated with microorganisms it may increase the spread of disease rather than decrease it.
targetString: Wasiwasi moja ni kwamba ikiwa mchanga au jivu lina viini, inaweza kuzidi kueneza ugongwa badala ya kupunguza kuenea kwake.
en-mt: One concern is that if sand or ash contains germs, it may further spread the sting rather than reduce its spread.
