Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms containing patients known or suspected to have COVID-19, including when aerosol-producing procedures are implemented.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: Upitishaji maalum wa hewa chanya ya msukumo inaweza kufaa katika baadhi ya mipangilio ya huduma ya afya na vyumba vya kuhifadhia maiti.
en-mt: Special passage of positive impulse air may be suitable in some healthcare settings and mortuaries.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: Sampuli zinapaswa kushughulikiwa kwa tahadhari ya Usalama-bio wa Kiwango cha 3.
en-mt: Samples should be handled with Level 3 Safety-Bio Alert.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO) linapendekeza kwamba wagonjwa wanaoingia watengwe katika maeneo ya kipekee ya kusubiri kulingana na kama wanashukiwa kuwa na COVID-19. Kwa kuongezea kwa PPE nyingine, OSHA inapendekeza mashine za kusaidia kupumua kwa wale wanaofanya kazi karibu futi 6 ya wagonjwa wanaojulika kuwa, au kushukiwa kuwa wameambukizwa SARS-CoV-2, na wale wanaotekeleza taratibu za kuzalisha aerosoli.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be placed in unique waiting areas based on whether they are suspected of having COVID-19. In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends breathing aid machines for those operating within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected to have been infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those who perform aerosol-producing procedures.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: Nchini Marekani, mashine za kusaidia kupumua za uso za N95 zilizoidhinishwa na NIOSH au bora zaidi zinapaswa kutumiwa katika muktadha wa mpango kamili ulioandikwa wa mfumo wa upumaji ambao unajumuisha, kupima kutoshea, mafunzo, na uchunguzi wa kimatibabu.
en-mt: In the United States, N95 surface breathing machines approved by NIOSH or better should be used in the context of a comprehensive written plan of a testing system that includes, testing for fit, training, and medical examination.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: Aina nyingine za mashine za kusaidia kupumua zinaweza kutoa kinga kubwa zaidi na kuboresha starehe ya mfanyakazi. WHO inapendekeza ovaroli, kwa kuwa COVID-19 ni ugonjwa wa mfumo wa kupumua na huambukizwi kupitia vioevu vya mwili.
en-mt: Other types of breathing aids can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort. The WHO recommends ovaroli, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease and is transmitted through bodily fluids.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: WHO inapendekeza barakoa za upasuaji pekee kwa mhudumu wa uchunguzi katika eneo la kuingia.
en-mt: The WHO recommends surgical masks only for the forensic attendant at the entry point.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: Kwa wale ambao wanakusanya sampuli za mfumo wa kupumua kuanzia kuwatunza, au kuwasafirisha wagonjwa wa COVID-19 bila taratibu za kuzalisha aerosili, WHO inapendekeza barakoa ya upasuaji, miwani, ngao ya uso, gauni, na glovu.
en-mt: For those who are collecting respiratory system samples starting to care for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without aerosis producing procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, glasses, face shield, gown, and gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: Ikiwa utaratibu wa kuzalisha aerosoli utatekelezwa, barakoa ya upasuaji hubadilishwa na mashine ya kusaidia kupumua ya N95 au FFP2.
en-mt: If the aerosol-producing procedure is implemented, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 breathing aid.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: Kwa kuwa upatikaji wa kimataifa wa PPE hautoshi, WHO inapendekeza kupunguza mahitaji ya PPE kupitia uhamishaji pepe wa maelezo ya kimatibabu, vikwazo vya kimwili kama vile madirisha angavu,  ili kuruhusu wale wanaohusika tu katika huduma ya moja kwa moja kuingia chumba cha mgonjwa wa COVID-19, kwa kutumia pekee PPE muhimu kwa kazi hiyo mahsusi, kuendelea kutumia mashine hiyo ya kusaidia kupumua  bila kuiondoa huku ukiwahudumia wagonjwa kadhaa walio na utambuzi huo mmoja, kufuatilia na kuratibu safu ya ugavi ya PPE, na kutohimiza matumizi ya barakoa kwa watu walio na dalili.
en-mt: Since international availability of PPE is not sufficient, WHO recommends reducing PPE requirements through the virtual transfer of medical information, physical barriers such as bright windows, to allow only those involved in direct care to enter the room of a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for that specific task, to continue using that breathing aid machine without removing it while caring for several patients with the same diagnosis,  tracking and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and not encouraging mask use for people with symptoms.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: KUTOKA: Katherine Maher, Afisa Mkuu Mtendaji CEO wa Wakfu wa Wikimedia
en-mt: FROM: Katherine Maher, Chief Executive Officer of the Wikimedia Foundation

targetString: KWA: Wafanyakazi Wote wa Wakfu wa Wikimedia
en-mt: BY: All Wikimedia Foundation staff

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: MSTARI WA MADA: [Covid-19] Kupumzisha mzigo na kuandaa mustakabali
en-mt: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Relaxing the burden and preparing for the future

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: TAREHE/SAA YA KUTUMA: 14 Machi, 2020, 00:24 UTC
en-mt: DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: LESENI: CC0: Hakuna haki zilizohifadhiwa
en-mt: LICENSE: CC0: No rights reserved

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: Tunajipata katika hali za kipekee mwezi huu.
en-mt: We're in unique situations this month.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: Janga la COVID-19 ni jambo ambalo linafanya iwe wazi uhusiano wetu wa karibu wa binadamu duniani na uwajibikaji tunao wenyewe kwa wenyewe.
en-mt: The COVID-19 pandemic is something that makes it clear our close human connection to the world and the responsibility we have for one another.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: Hatuna nafasi ya kwanza kwa changamoto zake, lakini hatujui kwamba majibu yetu bora yanategemea aina ya hisia-mwenzi duniani, ushirikiano, na uundaji wa jamii ambao ndiyo moyo wa shirika hili.
en-mt: We don't have a first chance at its challenges, but we don't know that our best answers depend on the kind of emotion—the global partner, the collaboration, and the community formation that is the heart of this organization.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: Imani na urafiki na kujaliana ambao tunao kati ya wenzi wetu wote kupitia barua pepe, simu, na soga ni uhalalishaji wa kipekee wa wanadamu wazuri ambao tumebahatika kufanya kazi nao.
en-mt: The trust and intimacy and mutual care that we have between all of our partners through email, phone, and chat is a unique validation of the wonderful human beings we have been fortunate enough to work with.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: Ninashukuru na kujivunia sana kuwategemea nyinyi nyote kama wenzangu.
en-mt: I am so grateful and proud to count on you all as colleagues.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: Wiki iliyopita, kuna mtu aliyeshiriki na mimi shukrani yake kwa kazi yetu.
en-mt: Last week, someone shared with me his appreciation for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: Alinikumbusha umuhimu wa ulimwengu kuweza kutumia Wikipedia sasa hivi, na alama kuu ni kwa rasilimali hii muhimu kusalia mtandaoni na kupatikana kwa watu wote.
en-mt: He reminded me of the importance of the world being able to use Wikipedia right now, and the main point is for this valuable resource to remain online and accessible to all people.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: Kazi yako hufanya hii iwezekane, iwe ni kufanya vituo viendelee kufanya kazi au wenzetu kulipwa au jamii yetu kuwa salama.
en-mt: Your work makes this possible, whether it's to keep the stations operational or our colleagues paid or our community safer.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: Ulimwengu unahitaji maelezo ambayo Wikipedia inayatoa, wakati huu kuliko wakati mwingine wowote.
en-mt: The world needs the information Wikipedia provides, this time more than ever.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: Huu ni wakati ambao si tu tunachokifanya, bali jinsi tunavyokifanya, italeta matokeo ya maana ulimwenguni.
en-mt: This is a time when not only what we do, but how we do it, will have a meaningful impact on the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: Kwa sababu ya umuhimu wa misheni hii na kazi yako kwake, tutakuwa tukifanya baadhi ya marekebisho muhimu kuhusu jinsi tunavyofanya kazi pamoja, kuanzia wiki hii ijayo.
en-mt: Because of the importance of this mission and your work to it, we'll be making some important adjustments about how we work together, starting this coming week.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: Marekebisho kwa kazi na ratiba yetu
en-mt: Adjustments to our work and schedule

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: Kama Robyn alivyotaja awali, timu c ilikutana usiku uliopita ili kujadili njia na ratiba yetu ya siku na miezi ijayo.
en-mt: As Robyn mentioned earlier, team c met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: Katika mazungumzo hayo, tulizingatia tulichodhania kitakuwa jibu sahihi kwa kile tunachokipitia na njia bora ya kuendeleza shirika wakati huu.
en-mt: In that conversation, we focused on what we thought would be the right response to what we are experiencing and the best way to develop the organization at this time.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: Kwa kushangaza sisi wote tulitaka kuondoa dhiki na kuunga mkono misheni yetu ya muda mrefu.
en-mt: Ironically we all wanted to eliminate stress and support our long-term mission.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: Ikiwa unataka kutupigia simu, hiyo ni sawa.
en-mt: If you want to call us, that's fine.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: Kwa wafanyakazi, makontrakta, na wafanyakazi wote wa mkataba:
en-mt: For employees, contractors, and all contract workers:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: matarajio yetu ya kufanya kazi ya kila siku yatakuwa karibu saa 4 kwa siku, au saa 20 kwa wiki hadi muda usiojulikana.
en-mt: Our expectation to do daily work will be around 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until indefinitely.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: Hatutangazi likizo - ikiwa unaweza kufanya kazi kwa saa zaidi za kawaida, misheni yetu inaweza kukutumia.
en-mt: We don't advertise holidays – if you can work more regular hours, our mission could send you off.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: Hata hivyo, ulimwengu huu hauwezi kubashiriwa kwa sasa, na iwe unahitaji kuwatunza wapendwa wako, kupata mboga, au kwenda kwa daktari, maslahi yako ndio kipaumbele chetu.
en-mt: However, this world is unpredictable at the moment, and whether you need to take care of your loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your interests are our priority.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: Hatufuatilii muda wako.
en-mt: We don't keep track of your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: Ikiwa wewe ni mgonjwa, usifanye kazi.
en-mt: If you're sick, don't work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: Hii inapaswa kuwa wazi, lakini tunaisema.
en-mt: This should be obvious, but we are saying it.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: Hakuna siku za ugonjwa au PTO inayohitajika - mwambie tu meneja wako na usaidie timu yako kupitia kalenda na ratiba ili uhakikishe maeneo makuu ya kazi yameshughulikiwa.
en-mt: There are no sick days or PTO required – just tell your manager and help your team navigate through calendars and schedules to make sure the main areas of work have been addressed.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (Ikiwa utapatikana kuwa na COVID-19, tafadhali mwambie Bryana katika T&C Ops ajue ili T&C iweze kukusaidia na msaada na kuhakikisha hali yako inaweza kuzingatiwa vizuri na usimamizi).
en-mt: (If you are found to have COVID-19, please let Bryana at T&C Ops know so T&C can assist you with support and ensure your condition can be properly considered by management).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: Wafanyakazi wanaofanya kazi kwa saa watalipwa pesa zote.
en-mt: Employees who work around the clock will be paid all the money.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: Tayari tumesema, na tunajitolea tena kuheshimu ahadi zetu kwa makontrakta wetu na wafanyakazi wetu wanaofanya kazi kwa saa.
en-mt: We have already spoken, and we are again committed to honoring our commitments to our congregants and our employees working round the clock.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: Kila mtu atalipwa kwa misingi ya saa zake za kawaida walizofanya kazi wakati wa hali za kawaida.
en-mt: Each person will be paid on the basis of their regular hours worked during normal circumstances.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: Hii inajumuisha ikiwa wewe ni mgonjwa na huwezi kufanya kazi.
en-mt: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: Ikiwa unataka kufanya kazi, tunakuunga mkono.
en-mt: If you want to work, we support you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: Watu wengi wanatumia kazi kama njia ya kushughulikia dhiki yao na ulimwengu wetu.
en-mt: Many people use work as a way to address their stress and our world.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: Tunachokifanya kinaweza kuridhisha sana, hasa wakati kama huu.
en-mt: What we do can be very satisfying, especially at a time like this.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: Tena, hii inahusu kujitunza mwenyewe.
en-mt: Again, this is about taking care of yourself.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: Tunachoomba ni kwamba uwasiliane na meneja wetu, ili tujue tunachopaswa kutarajia na tuweze kurekebisha vilivyo.
en-mt: What we ask is that you contact our manager, so that we know what we should expect and we can adjust accordingly.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: Kazi nyingine zinachukuliwa kuwa muhimu.
en-mt: Other works are considered important.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: Kuna baadhi ya mambo ambayo ni lazima tuendelee kuyafanya.
en-mt: There are some things we need to continue to do.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: Timu za SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising (kati ya timu nyingine) zinafanya kazi muhimu ambazo zinaweza kuhitaji msaada wa ziada.
en-mt: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among other teams) perform critical tasks that may require additional support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: Tutaanza mchakato na idara zote ili tutathmini malengo ya sasa na tuweze kulenga kuunga mkono kile ambacho ni muhimu kwa misheni yetu.
en-mt: We will begin the process with all departments so that we can evaluate current goals and can focus on supporting what is important to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: Kuna mambo mengi ya kufanya kwetu sisi sote, sisi sote tutalenga miradi muhimu zaidi.
en-mt: There are so many things to do for all of us, we will all focus on the most important projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: Kupunguza kasi sasa hakutadhuru baadaye.
en-mt: Slowing down now won't hurt later.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: Hatupangi kwenda kwa "muda zaidi ili kufidia" punde janga hili likipita.
en-mt: We're not planning on going for "more time to compensate" once this pandemic passes.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: Hutatarajiwa kufanya kazi kwa saa za ziada ili kufikia makataa ambayo kwa sasa hayawezekani.
en-mt: You will not be expected to work overtime hours to meet the denials that are currently impossible.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: Tunakubali kwamba hali zimebadilika, na tutafanya kazi ili kuweka malengo na muda mpya ikiwezekana.
en-mt: We accept that circumstances have changed, and we will work to set new goals and deadlines if possible.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: Ni nini hufanyika na APP (Upangaji wa Kila Mwaka)?
en-mt: What happens with APP (Annual Planning)?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: Ili kuzoea ukweli wetu mpya na matarajio ya saa za kufanya kazi kila siku, tunalenga kurekebisha muda wa uwasilishaji wa Mpango wetu wa Kila Mwaka wa 2020-2021.
en-mt: To adapt to our new reality and expectations of daily working hours, we aim to adjust the timing of the presentation of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: Lengo letu ni kupendekeza kuongezwa muda wa mpango wetu wa 2019-2020 ambao unaruhusu muda zaidi wa kupanga bajeti ili kuwaruhusu wafanyakazi wetu kuipa kipaumbele kazi muhimu, kujitunza binafsi, na kuwashughulikiwa wapendwa wao huku wakiwakimu wale wanaohitaji au kutaka kufanya kazi kwa muda uliopunguzwa kwa wiki chache zifuatazo.
en-mt: Our goal is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow our employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while providing for those who need or want to work on reduced time for the next few weeks.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: Kuongezwa kwa muda huu hupunguza pakubwa kazi za sasa za upangaji na shinikizo katika shirika nzima.
en-mt: This extension significantly reduces current planning tasks and pressures throughout the organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: Tutawasilisha pendekezo letu kwa Halmashauri wiki ijayo na tutawafahamisha wajumbe na timu kuhusu hatua zifuatazo haraka iwezekanavyo kwa kuwa tuna uthibitisho.
en-mt: We will present our proposal to Council next week and will inform the members and team of the next steps as soon as possible as we have confirmation.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: Asante kwa timu ya APP kwa uongozi wenu katika suala hili.
en-mt: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this regard.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: Hali ya ofisi, maambukizi, na usafishaji
en-mt: Office status, transmission, and cleaning

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: Wiki iliyopita, tulifahamu kwamba mmoja wa wenzetu walio SF huenda aliambukizwa virusi vya COVID-19.
en-mt: Last week, we learned that one of our colleagues in SF may have contracted COVID-19.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: Hata hivyo, kwa tahadhiri kubwa, tuliajiri wafanyakazi wa usafishaji wa kuua vizuri ili kutakasa maeneo yote katika ofisi ya San Francisco.
en-mt: However, with great fanfare, we hired a well-executed cleaning crew to sanitize all the locations in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: Walitumia myeyusho wa kuua virusi unaotumiwa hospitalini ili kutakasa kila mahali, hata pia ukumbini na ngazi zinazofikia sakafu yetu.
en-mt: They used the disinfectant smelt used in hospitals to sanitize everywhere, even in the hallways and stairs that reach our floor.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: Jengo hili linatumia itafiki yake ya jukumu la utunzaji linalotumia bidhaa ambazo zinaunga mkono usalama wa wapangaji wao.
en-mt: This building uses its own sense of care responsibility that uses products that support the safety of their tenants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: Tunahisi vizuri kwamba ofisi itakuwa imeandaliwa vizuri kwa wakati ambao tutaamua kurudi.
en-mt: We feel comfortable that the office will be well prepared by the time we decide to return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: Ofisi yetu ya DC iko katika WeWork, ambayo imeshiriki itifaki yake ya COVID-19 na sisi na wafanyakazi wote walio DC.
en-mt: Our DC office is located at WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all employees in DC.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: Hadi wiki iliyopita, ofisi yetu ya DC ilihamisha kazi zake ili kuweza kufanyiwa mbali kulingana na maagizo yaliyoshirikiwa na San Francisco.
en-mt: Until last week, our D.C. office moved its functions to be able to be processed remotely in accordance with the instructions shared by San Francisco.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: Kulingana na ufahamu wa baadhi ya wenzetu walio NYC, tumekuwa pia tukijadiliana kuhusu kupangisha eneo lililo Brooklyn.
en-mt: Based on some of our colleagues in NYC, we've also been discussing leasing a location in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: Majadiliano haya yanaendelea lakini huenda yakacheleweshwa.
en-mt: These discussions are ongoing, but may be delayed.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: Baadhi ya wenzetu wanafanya kazi kwa mbali kwa mara ya kwanza.
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: Wenzetu waliofanya kazi kwa mbali kwa muda mrefu wanajua kwamba inaweza kuwa hali ngumu kuzoea, na walitaka kutoa ushauri kiasi:
en-mt: Our colleagues who have worked remotely for a long time know that it can be a difficult situation to adapt to, and they wanted to offer some advice:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: Punguza urefu wa mikutano kwa ongezeko la saa moja au mbili.
en-mt: Limit the length of meetings to an increase of one or two hours.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: Ikiwa vikao virefu vinahitajika, zingatia jinsi vinaweza kutenganishwa kwa kipindi cha siku kadhaa.
en-mt: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be separated over a period of several days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: Fafanua mkutano kwa wazi, kuwa na ajenda, na utume mapema nyenzo za kusoma.
en-mt: Define the meeting clearly, have an agenda, and send early reading material.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: Fanya video iwe chaguo-msingi, na zana kama vile Google Docs na Zoom ili kuwezesha ushirikiano na muunganisho wa moja kwa moja.
en-mt: Make video the default, with tools such as Google Docs and Zoom to enable collaboration and direct connectivity.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: Kuwa na kiongozi wa kuwezesha kila mkutano, mtu wa kufuatilia soga kwa maswali na kufuatilia orodha ya wanenaji, na mtu wa kusaidia kuandika manukuu (au kushirikiana katika kuandika manukuu).
en-mt: Have a leader to facilitate each meeting, someone to monitor chats for questions and keep track of the list of speakers, and someone to help write subtitles (or collaborate in writing subtitles).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: Tuma barua pepe kwa msaada wa kiufundi ikiwa unahitaji kifaa kizuri cha kichwa.
en-mt: Send an email for technical support if you need a good headset.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: Tumia fidia yako ya ustawi ili kununua vitafunio.
en-mt: Use your wellness compensation to purchase snacks.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: Jiunge na kituo cha #remoties katika Slack ili kuongea na wenzako kuhusu kazi iliyosambazwa
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk to colleagues about distributed work

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: Timu ya Shughuli za HR inazingatia mwongozo  wa mazingira ya mtandao ili kusaidia katika ongezeko la kazi zilizosambazwa katika Wakfu.
en-mt: The HR Activities team is focused on network environment guidance to assist in the increase in distributed functions in the Foundation.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: Wiki hii iliyopita tuliwaomba wapokeaji wote wa ruzuku za jamii kughairisha matukio yote ya umma yanayofadhiliwa na Wikimedia, kama vile editathons, hadi wakati WHO itatangaza janga hili limeisha.
en-mt: This past week we asked all recipients of community grants to cancel all Wikimedia-sponsored public events, such as editathons, until the time WHO declares the pandemic is over.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: Tuliwafahamisha kwamba tunaelewa kwamba ombi letu la kughairisha na vikwazo vingine vinaweza kuifanya iwe vigumu kukamilisha shughuli zao zilizokubaliwa za ruzuku na kwamba hakuna yeyote ataadhibiwa kwa kuchelewesha au kurekebisha malengo hayo.
en-mt: We informed them that we understand that our request for cancellations and other sanctions may make it difficult to complete their agreed grant activities and that no one will be penalized for delaying or amending those goals.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: Wiki hii ijayo tutafuatilia maelekezo ya ziada kwenye Wikimania na makongamano mengine ya kimkoa na jamii ya mada.
en-mt: This coming week we will follow up on additional directions at Wikimania and other regional conferences and thematic community.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: Maoni ya jumla kutoka jamii za duniani yanaonekana kuonyesha huzuni kwa usumbufu lakini faraja kwa uwazi na uwezo wa kulenga jamii zao wenyewe, Wikimedia na vinginevyo.
en-mt: The general comments from global communities seem to show sadness at the disruption but comfort at the openness and ability to target their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: Kuendelea mbele, CRT inashughulika kuweka ukurasa kuhusu Meta-Wiki ili kutoa nafasi kwa jamii kufuatilia matokeo na kufuatilia mawasiliano yetu nao.
en-mt: Going forward, CRT is busy putting up a page about Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the results and monitor our contact with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: Kuendelea kuwasiliana kuhusu masuala yanayohusiana na COVID-19
en-mt: Staying in touch with COVID-19 related issues

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: Tutakuwa tukituma mwaliko kwa kalenda yako kwa Alhamisi ijayo, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT kwa mkutano maalum wa wafanyakazi.
en-mt: We will be sending an invitation to your calendar for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: Tutachukua muda huu kushiriki mipasho ya ziada, kujibu maswali yako na kuchukua muda wa kuunganika wenyewe kwa wenyewe.
en-mt: We will take this time to share additional feeds, answer your questions and take the time to connect with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: Tuko pamoja na tuko hapa kusaidia kwa njia yoyote tuwezayo.
en-mt: We're all there and we're here to help in any way we can.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: Kwa sasa, unaweza kuendelea kutafuta maelezo kutoka kwa barua pepe hii, na maelezo mengine yote muhimu yanayohusiana na COVID-19, kwenye Office Wiki.
en-mt: For now, you can continue to search for information from this email, and all other relevant COVID-19-related information, on Office Wiki.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT itasasisha kurasa hizi na maelezo yote katika mahali pamoja.
en-mt: CRT will update these pages with all the details in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: Tunashughulika pia kudumisha mawasiliano ya mara kwa mara na wafanyakazi wanaoishi nchi ambazo zimeathiriwa pakubwa kwa sasa.
en-mt: We are also working to maintain regular contact with workers living in countries that are currently severely affected.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: Ikiwa una maswali yoyote kuhusu usafiri, matukio, kazi kubwa, au changamoto ya ufikiaji, au kitu kingine chochote ambacho unaweza kuhitaji msaada, tafadhali usisite kuarifu na kufanya kazi na CRT.
en-mt: If you have any questions about travel, events, major assignments, or an accessibility challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don't hesitate to notify and work with CRT.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: Tuko hapa kusaidia kutoa msaada na ushirikiano unaohitajika.
en-mt: We are here to help provide the support and cooperation needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: Ikiwa una suala la faragha au nyeti, tafadhali tuma barua pepe kwa Bryanm Judan - Mkurugenzi wa Shughuli Kuu za Kimataifa za HR.
en-mt: If you have a privacy or sensitive issue, please email Bryanm Judan – Director of Global HR Major Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: Hakuna yoyote kati ya mabadiliko haya yanapaswa kuonekana kama kuachwa kwa kazi na majukumu yako.
en-mt: None of these changes should be seen as abandonment of your job and responsibilities.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: Badala yake, ni utambuaji kwamba kwa wakati huu, kazi na majukumu yetu yana uwezekano wa kubadilika kwa njia ambayo hatujaiona zamani.
en-mt: Rather, it's a recognition that at this point, our jobs and responsibilities are likely to change in a way we haven't seen in the past.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: Hizi ni hatua tunazoamini ni muhimu katika kuungana mkono ili tuweze kuendelea kufanya kazi, kuipa harakati yetu msaada unaohitajika, na ulimwengu huduma wanayoweza kutegemea.
en-mt: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support each other so that we can continue to work, give our movement the support it needs, and the world the care they can count on.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: Kazi yetu iliyopangwa itakuwa hapo ikitusubiri wakati muda utawadia.
en-mt: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: Kwa sasa, ni wakati wa kusaidiana na kuunda nafasi ya kazi muhimu ambayo itakuwa ikija katika wiki na miezi ijayo.
en-mt: For now, it's time to help each other and create a space for the important jobs that will be coming up in the weeks and months ahead.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: Tunahitaji nyinyi nyote muwezeshe hiyo, na kwa hivyo tunawahitaji nyinyi nyote mjilinde pamoja na familia zetu ili muweze kuwa katika hali nzuri wakati hitaji litaibuka.
en-mt: We need all of you to facilitate that, and so we need all of you to protect yourself and our families so that you can be in good shape when the need arises.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: Kwa sasa, tafadhali -- nawa mikono yako na usiguse uso wako!
en-mt: For now, please -- wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), na Timu iliyosalia ya Uongozi (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, na Toby N).
en-mt: Katherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the remainder of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: Kimeng'enya 2 cha kugeuza b'Angiotensin (ACE2) ni kimeng'enya kilichoambatishwa kwa sehemu ya nje (utandao wa seli) ya seli katika mapafu, mishipa, moyo, figo na utumbo.
en-mt: The digestive 2 turning b'Angiotensin (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer part (cell membrane) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidneys and gut.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 hukabiliana na shughuli zinazohusiana na kimeng'enya kinachogeuza angiotensin (ACE) kwa kupunguza kiwango cha angiotensi-II na kuongeza Ang(1-7) kwa kuifanya iwe dawa nzuri ya kutibu magonjwa ya moyo. ACE2 hutumika pia kama sehemu ya kuingia kwenye seli ya baadhi ya virusi vya korona.
en-mt: ACE2 counteracts the activity associated with angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by lowering angiotensi-II levels and increasing Ang(1-7) by making it an effective drug for treating cardiovascular diseases. ACE2 is also used as an entry point into the cell of some coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: Toleo la mwanadamu la kimeng'enya hurejelewa mara kwa mara kama hACE2.
en-mt: The human version of the enzyme is frequently referred to as hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: Kimeng'enya 2 cha kugeuza angiotensin ni zinki yenye kimeng'enya cha atomu za metali zilizo kwenye eneo la neva za seli za mwisho na seli nyingine.
en-mt: The enzyme 2 converting angiotensin is zinc containing the enzyme of metallic atoms located in the nerve region of the end-cells and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: Protini ya ACE2 ina kikoa cha M2 cha peptidi ya temino N na kikoa cha kusafirisha asidi ya amino ya figo ya kolektini temino C
en-mt: The ACE2 protein contains the M2 domain of the temino peptide N and the renal amino amino acid transporting domain of the colechin temino C

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 ni protini ya utando wa aina I ya njia moja, kikoa chake kinachotumika cha kumeng'enya kikiwa kwenye sehemu ya juu ya seli katika mapafu na tishu nyingine.
en-mt: ACE2 is a single-channel type I membrane protein, its active digestive domain being located at the top of cells in the lungs and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: Kikoa cha giligili iliyo nje  cha ACE2 kimeshikilia kikoa cha utando kwa kimeng'enya kingine kinachojulikana kama sheddase, na protini inayotokea inayoyeyuka hutolewa kwenye mfumo wa damu na mwishowe kutolewa kupitia mkojo.
en-mt: The extracellular ACE2 domain holds the membrane domain to another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting protein that dissolves is released into the bloodstream and eventually released through urine.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 inapatikana katika viungo vingi: ACE2 imeambatishwa kwenye utando wa seli za alveola aina II za mapafu, enterosaiti ya utumbo mdogo, mishipa na seli za mwisho za vena na seli za mishipa laini ya misuli katika viungo vingi.
en-mt: ACE2 is found in many organs: ACE2 is attached to the membrane of alveola cells type II of the lungs, the enterolate of the small intestine, the artery and endogenous cells and the cells of the smooth muscle arteries in most organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: Onyesho la ACE2 mRNA linapatikana pia katika utando wa bongo, striatum, hypothalamus, na mfumo wa ubongo.
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the brain membrane, striatum, hypothalamus, and brain system.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: Kazi kuu ya ACE2 ni kufanya kazi kama kisawazishi cha ACE.
en-mt: The main function of ACE2 is to act as an ACE equalizer.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE hukuamilia homoni I ya angiotensin kwenye angiotensin II ya shinikizo la damu.
en-mt: ACE activates angiotensin hormone I into angiotensin II of hypertension.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: Upande wake ACE2 hukwamilia carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine kutoka kwa angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) na kuivunja kuwa angiotensin ya vasodilator  (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
en-mt: Its side ACE2 strains the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and breaks it down into vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 inaweza pia kukwamilia viunganishi kadhaa ikiwa ni pamoja na [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, na ghrelin.
en-mt: ACE2 can also stumble several connectors including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 hudhibiti pia usafirishaji wa utando wa kisafirishi SLC6A19 cha amino asili na imetajwa kwa ugonjwa wa Hartnup.
en-mt: ACE2 also controls transport of the transporter membrane SLC6A19 of the natural amino and has been cited for Hartnup syndrome.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: Kama protini ya kupitisha utando, ACE2 inatumika kama sehemu kuu ya kuingia kwenye seli za baadhi ya virusi vya korona, ikiwa ni pamoja na HCoV-NL63; SARS CoV (virusi ambavyo vinasababisha SARS); na SARS-CoV-2 (virusi ambavyo vinasababisha COVID-19).
en-mt: As a membrane-transmitting protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point to the cells of some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: Kihususa, ushikamano wa protini ya SI ya SARS-CoV na SARS-CoV2 kwa kikoa cha mmeng'enyo cha ACE2 kwenye sehemu ya juu ya seli husababisha endocytosis na uhamishaji wa virusi na kimeng'enya kwa endosomu zilizo ndani ya seli.
en-mt: Specifically, the coherence of the SI protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the ACE2 digestive domain at the top of the cell leads to endocytosis and the transfer of virus and enzyme to endosomes located within the cell.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: Mchakato huu wa kuingia unahitaji pia utayarishaji wa protini S na vizuia protini vya serine kuu ya TMPRSS2, uzuiaji ambao unachunguzwa kwa sasa kama matibabu yanayowezekana. Hii imesababisha wengine kudhania kwamba kupunguza viwango vya ACE2, katika seli, kunaweza kusaidia kukabiliana na maambukizi.
en-mt: This entry process also requires preparation of protein S and serine protein blockers main TMPRSS2, an inhibition that is currently being investigated as a possible treatment. This has led some to speculate that lowering ACE2 levels, in cells, may help to curb infection.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: Hata hivyo, mashirika mengi ya kitaalamu na ya usimamizi yamependekeza kuendelea na kizuzi cha kawaida cha ACE na matibabu ya ARB.
en-mt: However, many professional and supervisory organizations have recommended continuing the standard ACE and ARB treatment.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: Upitiaji wa kimfumo na uchanganuzi wa meta uliochapishwa tarehe 11 Julai, 2013, ulipata kwamba "matumizi ya vizuizi vya ACE yalihusishwa na upungufu mkubwa wa asilimia 34 katika hatari ya nimonia ikilinganishwa na vidhibiti."
en-mt: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2013, found that "the use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a 34 percent greater reduction in the risk of pneumonia compared to controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: Zaidi ya hayo, "hatari ya nimonia pia ilipunguzwa kwa wagonjwa waliotibiwa na vizuizi vya ACE ambao walikuwa na hatari kubwa ya kupata nimonia, hasa wale wenye kiharusi au moyo kushindwa kufanya kazi.
en-mt: Additionally, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who had an increased risk of developing pneumonia, particularly those with stroke or heart failure.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: Matumizi ya vizuizi vya ACE pia yalijumuishwa na kupungua kwa vifo vinavyohusiana na nimonia, ingawa matokeo yalikuwa dhaifu kuliko hatari ya jumla ya nimonia."
en-mt: Use of ACE inhibitors was also included with a decrease in pneumonia-related mortality, although the results were weaker than the overall risk of pneumonia."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ACE2 iliyounganishwa ya binadamu (rhACE2) imechukuliwa kuwa matibabu mapya ya majeraha makali ya mapafu, na ilionekana kuboresha mzunguko wa damu mwilini na ukolevu wa oksijeni katika nguruwe wadogo walio na ugonjwa uliosababishwa wa shida kali ya mfumo wa kupumua wa lipopolysaccharide.
en-mt: Combined human ACE2 (rhACE2) has been considered a new treatment for severe lung injuries, and was found to improve blood circulation in the body and oxygen concentration in young pigs with the resulting disease of severe acute respiratory system lipopolysaccharide.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: Maisha nusu ya rhACE2 kwa binadamu ni saa 10 na itaanza kufanya kazi baada ya dakika 30 pamoja na sababu ya matokeo (muda) saa 24.
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans is 10 hours and will begin to function after 30 minutes plus the result factor (duration) 24 hours.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: Matokeo kadhaa yanaonyesha kuwa rhACE2 inaweza kuwa dawa nzuri kwa wale hawawezi kuvumilia vizuizi vya mfumo vya renin-angiotensin (vizuizi vya RAS) au katika magonjwa ambapo angiotensin II inayozunguka imapenda. Mchanganyiko wa rhACE2 umekadiriwa katika majaribio ya kliniki kwa ajili ya matibabu ya matatizo sugu ya upumuaji.
en-mt: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a good drug for those unable to tolerate renin-angiotensin systemic blockages (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where the surrounding angiotensin II is inactivated. The rhACE2 combination has been estimated in clinical trials for the treatment of chronic respiratory problems.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: Programu za COVID-19 ni progamu-tumizi za simu ya mkononi zilizoundwa kusaidia kutafuta watu waliotangamana ili kushughulikia maradhi ya virusi vya korona 2019-20, yaani mchakato wa kutambua watu ("watu waliokutana nao") ambao wanaweza kuwa walitangamana na mtu aliyeambukizwa.
en-mt: COVID-19 apps are mobile apps designed to help find people who have been contacted to address the coronavirus disease 2019-20, i.e. the process of identifying people ("people they met") who may have been in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: Programu nyingi zilitengenezwa au kupendekezwa, na msaada rasmi wa serikali katika wilaya na maeneo kadhaa.
en-mt: Many programs were developed or proposed, with official government support in several districts and territories.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: Mifumo kadhaa ya kuunda proramu za kutafuta watu waliotangamana imetengenezwa.
en-mt: Several systems for creating prorams to search for interacting individuals have been developed.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: Maswala ya faragha yamedokezwa, haswa kuhusu mifumo ambayo inategemea kufuatilia eneo la kijiografia la watumiaji wa programu.
en-mt: Privacy issues have been implied, particularly regarding systems that rely on tracking the geographic location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Mibadala isiyojidukiza sana inajumuisha matumizi ya ishara za Bluetooth ili kuweka eneo la karibu la mtumiaji kwa simu zingine.
en-mt: The less well-disguised alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to set the user's immediate location for other phones.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: Tarehe 10 Aprili 2020, Google na Apple walitangaza kwa pamoja kuwa wataunganisha utendaji ili kukubali programu hizo zinazotegemea Bluetooth moja kwa moja kwenye mifumo yao ya uendeshaji ya Android na iOS.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to accept Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: Nchini Uchina, serikali ya Kichina, kwa kushirikiana na Alipay, imetoa programu ambayo huruhusu raia kuangalia ikiwa wametangamana na watu ambao wana COVID-19.
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government, in collaboration with Alipay, has released an app that allows citizens to check if they have had contact with people who have COVID-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: Inatumika wa zaidi ya miji 200 ya Uchina. Huko Singapore, proframu inayoitwa TraceTogether inatumika.
en-mt: It is used in more than 200 Chinese cities. In Singapore, a prophylaxis called TraceTogether is used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: Programu hiyo ilitengenezwa na jamii na IY ya eneo hilo, iliyotolewa kama chanzo wazi na itakabidhiwa kwa serikali. Makedonia ya Kaskazini ilizindua "StopKorona!", programu inayotegemea Bluetooth ya kutafuta watu walioambukizwa wanaoweza kueneza na kutoa majibu ya haraka kwa mamlaka ya huduma ya afya.
en-mt: The software was developed by the local community and IY, released as open source and will be handed over to the government. North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app for finding infected people who can spread and provide a quick response to health care authorities.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: Programu hiyo ilitengenezwa na Wizara ya Mawasiliano na Teknolojia na Wiraza ya Afya.
en-mt: The program was developed by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Health Ministry.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: Kutikia tarehe 14 Aprili 2020, programu ilikuwa inasubiri kuidhinishwa na Google Play Store na Appple App Store.
en-mt: Debuting on April 14, 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Appple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: Tarehe 12 Aprili, serikali ilisema kuwa programu ya kutafuta watu waliotangamana ilikuwa katika hatua za juu za maendeleo, na itatumika baada ya majuma machache. Programu sawia inapangwa nchini Ireland, na huko Ufaransa ("StopCovid").
en-mt: On April 12, the government said the contact tracing app was in the advanced stages of development, and would be used after a few weeks. Similar programming is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
targetString: Australia na New Zealand inazingatia programu kulingana na programu ya TraceTogether ya Singapoo na itifaki ya BlueTrace. Urusi inatarajia kuanzisha programu inayotegemea eneo ya wagonjwa wanaopatikana kuwa na COVID-19 wanaoishi Moscow, iliyoundwa kuhakikishwa kuwa hawatoki nyumbani.
en-mt: Australia and New Zealand are considering software based on Singapoo's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol. Russia hopes to introduce a location-based program for COVID-19 patients living in Moscow, designed to ensure they are not leaving home.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: Ross Anderson, profesa wa uhandisi wa usalama katika Chuo Kikuu cha Cambridge University, aliorodhesha matatizo kadhaa ya kiutendaji ya mifumo ya programu, ikiwemo maoni mazuri ya uongo na ukosefu unaowezekana wa ufanisi ikiwa matumizi ya programu imezuiwa kwa idadi ndogo ya watu.
en-mt: Ross Anderson, a professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of practical problems of software systems, including false positive feedback and possible inefficiencies if application usage is restricted to a small number of people.

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: Kushughulikia matatizo kuhusu usambazaji wa programu za "virusi vya korona" za kupotosha au mbaya, Apple huweka vizuizi vya ni aina gani ya mashirika ambayo inaweza kuweka programu zinazohusiana na virusi vya korona katika Duka lake la Programu, ikiwazuia kwa walio "rasmi" tu au mashirika mengine mashuhuri.
en-mt: To address problems about the distribution of misleading or malicious "coronavirus" apps, Apple places restrictions on what kind of organizations it can keep coronavirus-related apps in its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or other notable organizations.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: Google and Amazon zimetumia vizuizi hivyo pia.
en-mt: Google and Amazon have also used the same restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: Wafanya kampeni ya faragha walionyesha wasiwasi wa madhara ya uchunguzi wa idadi kubwa ya watu kwa kutumia progwamu ya virusi vya korona, haswa kuhusu ikiwa miundombinu ya uchunguzi iliyoundwa kushughulikia ugonjwa wa virusi vya korona  itasambaratishwa baada ya ugonjwa kudhibitiwa.
en-mt: Privacy campaigners expressed concern about the effects of large-scale surveillance using coronavirus prognosis, particularly about whether the screening infrastructure designed to handle coronavirus disease will be dismantled after the disease is under control.

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: Amnesty International na mashirika mengine zaidi ya 100 yametoa taarifa ikisema kuwa vizuizi viwekwe katika uchunguzi wa aina hii
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organisations have issued a statement saying that restrictions should be placed on such investigations.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: Mashirika hayo yalitangaza hali nne katika miradi ya serikali:
en-mt: The agencies announced four conditions on state projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: lazima uchunguzi uwe "halali, muhimu, na mwafaka";
en-mt: must be an investigation "legitimate, necessary, and appropriate";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: lazima viendelezi vya ufuatiliaji na uchunguzi viwe na sheria za muda;
en-mt: must the extensions of monitoring and investigation have provisional rules;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: matumizi ya data yalazimike kuwa na vizuizi kwa madhumuni ya COVID-19.
en-mt: the use of data should be restricted for COVID-19 purposes.

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: lazima usalama wa data na kutojulikana ulindwe na kuonyeshwa kuwa unalindwa kulingana na ushahidi;
en-mt: must data security and anonymity be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: lazima uchunguzi wa kidijitalii luepuke kuzidisha ubaguzi na kutengwa;
en-mt: should digital screening avoid exacerbating discrimination and exclusion;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: lazima kushiriki data yote na wahusika wengine ufafanuliwe kwa sheria;
en-mt: must share all data with third parties be defined by law;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: lazima kuwe na ulinzi dhidi ya unyanyasaji na haki ya raia kushugulikia unyanyasaji;
en-mt: there must be protection against harassment and the right of citizens to deal with abuse;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: ushiriki wenye maana wa "wadau wote muhimu" utahitajika, ikiwemo kwa wataalam wa afya ya umma na vikundi vilivyotengwa. Chaos Compute Club ya Ujerumani (CCC) na Waandishi Bila Vizuizi (Mwandishi wa Habari ohne Grenzen) (RSF) pia walitoa orodha ya ukaguzi.
en-mt: Meaningful participation of "all key stakeholders" will be required, including by public health experts and marginalized groups. Chaos Compute Club of Germany (CCC) and Writers Without Restraints (Journalist ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also provided checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: Mpango uliopendekezwa wa Google/Apple unakusudia kushughukia tatizo la uchunguzi wa kuendelea kwa kuondoa utaratibu wa ufutaji kutoka kwa mfumo wa uendeshaji wa kifaa chao baada kukosa kuhitajika tena.
en-mt: The proposed Google/Apple deal aims to address the problem of persistent scrutiny by removing the deletion mechanism from their device's operating system after it is no longer needed.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: Nchi zingine zilitumia ufuatiliaji wa eneo unaotegemea mtandao badala ya programu, ikiondoa hitaji ya kupakua programu na uwezo na kuepuka kutafuta.
en-mt: Some countries used internet-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating the need to download apps and capabilities and avoid searching.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: Huko Israeli, ufuatiliaji unaotegemea mtandao ulikubaliwa.
en-mt: In Israel, internet-based surveillance was accepted.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: Ufumbuzi unaotegemea mtandao ambao una ufikiaji wa data halisi ya eneo una matatizo muhimu yanayowezekana ya faragha.
en-mt: Internet-based solutions that have access to real-area data have important potential privacy problems.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: Hata hivyo, sio mifumo yote yenye seva kuu inayohitaji kuwa na ufikiaji wa data ya eneo la kibinafsi; mifumo kadhaa ya utunzaji wa faragha imeundwa ambayo hutumia  seva kuu tu kwa ajili ya mawasiliano (angalia sehemu hapa chini).
en-mt: However, not all systems with a central server need to have access to private location data; Several privacy-handling systems have been created that use only the central server for communication (see section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: Huko Korea Kusini, mfumo usio wa programu ulitumika kufanya utafutaji wa watu waliotangamana.
en-mt: In South Korea, a non-software system was used to conduct searches of people who were contacted.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: Badala ya kutumia programu moja, mfumo ulikusanya maelezo ya utafutaji kutoka kwa vyanzo anuwai ikiwemo data ya utafutaji wa kifaa cha mkononi na data ya manunuzi ya kadi, na kujumuisha hizi kutoa arifa kupitia ujumbe wa maandishi kwa watu wanaoweza kuwa wameambukizwa.
en-mt: Instead of using a single app, the system collected search information from a variety of sources including mobile device search data and card transaction data, and included these to provide notifications via text message to potentially infected individuals.

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: Zaidi ya kutumia maelezo haya kuarifu watu wanaowezekana, serikali pia imefanya maelezo ya eneo kupatikana kwa umma, kitu kinachoruhusiwa kwa sababu ya mabadiliko ya sheria ya faragha ya maelezo baada ya mlipuko wa MERS katika nchi hiyo.
en-mt: In addition to using this information to notify potential individuals, the government has also made location information available to the public, something allowed because of changes to the privacy law of the details after the MERS outbreak in that country.

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: Maelezo haya yanapatikana kwa umma kupitia programu na tovuti kadhaa. Nchi kadhaa ikijumuisha Ujerumani zilizingatia kutumia mifumo kuu na ya kuhifadhi faragha.
en-mt: This information is available to the public through several apps and websites. Several countries including Germany considered using centralized and privacy-preserving systems.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: Kufikia 6 Aprili 2020, maelezo hayajatolewa.
en-mt: As of 6 April 2020, details have not been released.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: Utafutaji wa watu waliotangamana ambao faragha yake imehifadhiwa ni dhana iliyooanzishwa vizuri, na kikundi kibwa kilichoanziwa zamani mwaka wa 2013. Hadi tarehe 7 Aprili 2020, vikundi vingi vya wataalamu kadhaa walikuwa wakishughulikia suluhisho za faragha ambazo ni rahisi kutumia, kama vile Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) ya kuweka eneo la karibu la mtumiaji kwa simu zingine.
en-mt: The search for interconnected people whose privacy is preserved is a well-established concept, with a group that was founded in 2013. Until 7 April 2020, multiple groups of several experts were working on privacy solutions that are easy to use, such as Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) for keeping the user's immediate location to other phones.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: Hata hivyo, PEPP-PT ni juhudi ya uratibu ambayo ina njia zote za mamlaka moja na mamlaka anuwai, na sio itifaki moja. Itifaki zenye mamlaka anuwai zinajumuisha  Utafutaji  wa Eneo la Karibu Ambao Faragha Yake Imehifadhiwa yenye Mamlaka Anuwai (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Nambari za Waasiliani wa Muda (TCN, fka Nambari za Waasiliani wa Tukio, CEN), Itifaki za Faragha Nyeti na Mbinu za Kufuatilia Mawasilino ya Simu (PACT) na zingine.
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a coordinated effort that has all the means of a single jurisdiction and multiple jurisdictions, and not a single protocol. Protocols with various jurisdictions include Location Search Whose Privacy is Protected with Multiple Authorities (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Codes (TCN, fka Incident Contact Numbers, CEN), Sensitive Privacy Protocols and Mobile Contact Tracking Methods (PACT) and others.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: Katik itifaki hizi, data ya kibinafsi inayoweza kutambulika huwa haitoki kwenye kifaa, na ulinganisho wote hufanyika kwenye kifaa.
en-mt: In these protocols, personally identifiable data tends not to come from the device, and all comparisons take place on the device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: Kikundi cha Faragha katatika MIT Media Lab kimekuwa kikitengeneza SafePaths, jukwa la kutumia mbinu za kuhifadhi faragha wakati wa kukusanya na kutumia eneo au data ili kufuatilia maambukizo ya COVID-19.
en-mt: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform to use privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or data to track COVID-19 infections.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: Inategemea utafiti kutoka kwa whitepaper "Programu Zimekuwa Lagai: Kudumisha Faragha ya Kibinafsi katika Mlipuko" uliotolewa mwezi wa Machi 2020. Juhudi lingine sawia ni jukwa la SafeTrace la Enigma MPC, kampuni inayokuza teknolojia za faragha ambayo pia ilianzishwa katika MIT Media Lab.
en-mt: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Have Become Lagai: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Outbreak" released in March 2020. Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform of Enigma MPC, a company promoting privacy technologies that was also founded at the MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: SafeTrace hutumia teknolojia salama za maunzi za kuruhusu watumiaji kushiriki eneo nyeti na data ya afya kwa watumiaji na maafisa wengine, bila kuathiri faragha ya data hiyo.
en-mt: SafeTrace uses secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with users and other officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: Tarehe 5 Aprili, Ushirikiano wa kimataifa wa TCN ulianzishwa na vikundi ambavyo vilikuwa vimehusishwa na mbinu sawia na itifaki zilizokuwa zinalingana, kwa lengo la kupunguza mgawanyiko, na kuwezesha ushirikiano wa kimataifa wa programu za kutafuta na  kuarifu, sehemu muhimu ya kufanikisha matumizi makubwa.
en-mt: On 5 April, the TCN Global Partnership was established by groups that had been associated with parallel approaches and protocols, with the aim of reducing fragmentation, and facilitating the international integration of search and notification programs, a key component of achieving greater utility.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: Tarehe 9 Aprili 2020, serikali ya Singapoo ilitangaza kuwa ilifungua itifaki ya BlueTrace inayotumika na programu yake rasmi ya serikali.
en-mt: On April 9, 2020, the government of Singapoo announced that it had opened the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government software.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: Tarehe 10 Aprili 2020, Google na Appe, kampuni zinazodhibiti majukwaa ya simu ya Android na iOs, zilitangaza mpango wa kutafuta watu waliotangamana, ambayo walidai kuwa walinda faragha, kulingana na mchanganyiko wa teknolojia ya Bluetooth Low Enerygy na ufichamishi wa uhifadhi wa faragha.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Appe, the companies that control the Android and iOs mobile platforms, announced a plan to search for connected people, which they claimed to be privacy watchdogs, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Enerygy technology and privacy-preserving encryption.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: Pia zilichapisha uainisho wa teknolojia msingi zinazotumiwa kwenye mfumo.
