en-mt: They also published a classification of the basic technologies used in the system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: Kulingana na Apple na Google, mfumo huo unakusudiwa kutolewa katika hatua tatu:
en-mt: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be delivered in three stages:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: kutoa zana za kuwezesha serikali kuunda programu rasmi za utafutaji wa watu wenye virusi vya korona ambayo inalinda faragha
en-mt: to provide tools to enable governments to create formal search apps for people with coronavirus that protect privacy

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: muunganisho wa utendakazi huu moja kwa moja katika iOS na AndroidGoogle na mpango wa Apple wa kushughulikia matatizo ya uchunguzi unaoendelea kwa kusambaza kwanza mfumo kupitia visasisho vya mfumo wa uendeshaji, na baadaye kuiondoa kwa njia sawia baada ya tishio kuisha.
en-mt: the connection of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple's plan to address persistent surveillance problems by first rolling out the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in a similar way after the threat is over.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: Ubadilishaji wa dawa (pia inajulikana kama kutumia dawa vingine, kuweka umbo mpya, kusababisha kufanya kazi mpya au kubadilisha dawa) ni kutumua dawa iliyoidhinishwa vingine kwa ajili ya matibabu ya ugonjwa tofauti au hali ya matibabu badala ya kuitumia kwa sababu iliyotengenezwa hapo awali.
en-mt: Medication replacement (also known as using another drug, setting a new shape, causing it to work out new or changing a drug) is the reversing of another approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition rather than using it for a previously developed reason.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: Hii ni njia moja ya utafiti wa kisayansi ambayo kwa sasa inafuatiliwa kukuza matatibabu salama na fanisi ya COVID-19.
en-mt: This is one method of scientific research that is currently being pursued to promote safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: Miongozo mingine ya utafiti inajumuisha ukuzaji wa chanjo ya COVID-19 na kuchukua kinga mwili za mtu aliyepona na kuzipeleka kwa mtu mgonjwa kupitia damu. SARS-CoV-2 ina protini za dawa karibu 66, ambazo kila moja ina maeneo mengi yenye molekuli.
en-mt: Other study guidelines include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and taking the antibodies of a recovered person and passing them to a sick person via blood. SARS-CoV-2 contains about 66 drug proteins, each of which has multiple molecular sites.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: Kuchambua maeneo hayo ya kuunganisha hutoa mradi mzuri wa kutengeneza dawa bora ya kuzuia virusi itakayotoa protini za COVID-19.
en-mt: Analyzing those convergence sites provides an ideal project to develop an effective antiviral drug that will deliver COVID-19 proteins.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: Protini zinazolengwa zaidi za SARS-CoV-2 ni protease kama papain, RNA inayotegemea RNA polymerase, helicase, protini S, na ADP ribophosphatase.
en-mt: The most targeted SARS-CoV-2 proteins are protease like papain, RNA based RNA polymerase, helicase, protein S, and ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: Hussein A A, alichuguza dawa kadhaa zilizoteuliwa, kisha akaboresha na kuchambua mfanano wao na mifupa na dawa za kiwango cha juu zilizoidhinishwa ili kuharakisha maendeleo ya dawa inayowezekana ya kuzuia SARS-CoV-2 na uchunguzi wake wa dawa kupendekezwa katika muundo wa uchunguzi wa kliniki.
en-mt: Hussein A A, sampled several of the selected drugs, then improved and analyzed their similarity to the approved high-dose skeleton and drugs to accelerate the development of a possible drug to prevent SARS-CoV-2 and its drug screening to be recommended in a clinical diagnostic design.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: Chloroquine ni dawa ya kuzuia malaria ambayo hutumika pia dhidi ya magonjwa fulani ya kingamwili kushambulia mwili kimakosa.
en-mt: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial drug that is also used against certain antibody diseases to attack the body wrongly.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: Tarehe 18 Machi, WHO ilitangaza kuwa chloroquine na hydroxychloroquine husika zitakuwa kati ya dawa nne zilizochunguzwa na kuwa sehemu ya jaribio la Kliniki la Umoja.
en-mt: On March 18, WHO announced that chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied and be part of the Unity Clinical trial.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: Gavana wa New York Andrew Cuomo, alitagaza kuwa majaribio huko New York ya chloroquine na hydroxychloroquine yanaweza kuanza tarehe 24 Machi. Tarehe 28 Machi, FDA iliidhinisha matumizi ya hydroxychloroquine sulfate na chloroquine phosphate chini ya Idhini ya Matumizi ya Dharura (EUA).
en-mt: New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo announced that testing in New York of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine could begin on March 24. On March 28, the FDA approved the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: Matibabu hayo hayajaidhinishwa na mchakato wa majaribio ya kliniki ya FDA na yameidhinishwa chini ya EUA pekee kama matibabu ya majaribio ya matumizi ya dharura kwa wagonjwa waliolazwa hospitalini lakini hawawezi kupokea matibabu katika jaribio la kliniki.
en-mt: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trial process and is approved under EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients hospitalized but unable to receive treatment in a clinical trial.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC imesema kuwa "matumizi, kipimo cha dawa, na muda wa hydrichloroquine kwa prophylaxis au matibabu ya maambukizo ya SARS-CoV-2" bado haijaanzishwa.
en-mt: The CDC has stated that the "use, dosage of medication, and duration of hydrichloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" has not yet been established.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: Madaktari wamesema kuwa wanatumia dawa hiyo wakati "hakuna chaguo lingine",
en-mt: Doctors have said they use the drug when "there is no other option",

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: Timu ya Uturuki ya utafiti huko Istabul inafanya utafiti mdogo wa matumizi ya chloroquine pamija na zinki, vitamini A, vitamini C, na vitamini D.
en-mt: The Turkey research team in Istabul is conducting a small study of the use of chloroquine pamija and zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C, and vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: Utafiti mkubwa unaendelea katika Chuo Kikuu cha Duke na Oxford.
en-mt: Extensive research is underway at Duke University and Oxford.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: Shule ya Masomo ya Matibabu ya NYU Langone  inafanya majaribio ya usalama na ufanisi wa matumizi ya hydroxychloroquine.
en-mt: NYU Langone School of Medical Studies is conducting trials for the safety and efficacy of hydroxychloroquine use.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: Majaribio ya kliniki huko Wuhan na Shenzhen yalionyesha kuaw favipiravir ilikuwa "fanisi"
en-mt: Clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen showed that favipiravir was "successful."

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: Wagonjwa 35 huko Shenzen walipimwa na matokeo yalikuwa hasi katika wastani wa siku 4, ambapo urefu wa ugonjwa ulikuwa siku 11 kwa wagonjwa 45 ambao hawakupokea dawa hiyo.
en-mt: Thirty-five patients in Shenzen tested positive and the results were negative at a median of 4 days, where the disease length was 11 days for 45 patients who did not receive the drug.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: Katika utafiti uliofanywa huko Wuhan kwa wagonjwa 240 patients wenye ugonjwa wa nimonia, nusu walipewa favipiravir na nusu wakapewa umifenovir.
en-mt: In a Wuhan study of 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half were given umifenovir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: Shirika la Dawa la Italia liliwakumbusha umma kuwa ushahidi uliopo unaounga mkono dawa hiyo ni adimu na ya awali.
en-mt: The Italian Medicines Agency reminded the public that the available evidence supporting the drug is rare and preliminary.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: Tarehe 2 Aprili, Ujerumani ilitangaza kuwa itanunua dawa hiyo kutoka Japani kwa akiba yake, na kutumia jeshi kupeleka dawa hiyo kwa hospitali za chuo kikuu, ambapo dawa hiyo itatumika kutibu wagonjwa wa COVID-19.
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced that it would buy the drug from Japan with its own reserves, and used the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug would be used to treat COVID-19 patients.

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: Kulingana na South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe amefanya mazungumzo ya awali na utawala wa Trump kuhusu kununua dawa hiyo. Dawa hiyo inaweza kuwa sio fanisi kwa ugonjwa kali ambapo virusi tayari vimeongezeka.
en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has held preliminary talks with the Trump administration about buying the drug. The drug may not be effective for severe illness where the virus has already spiked.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: Inaweza kuwa sio salama kutumiwa na wanawake wajawazito au wale wanaojaribu kupata mimba.
en-mt: It may not be safe to use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: Utafiti mmoja wa lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), mchanganyiko wa kinga virusi vya lopinavir na ritonavir, ulihitimisha kuwa "hakuna faida ulioonekana".
en-mt: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of immune viruses lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: Dawa hizo zilibuniwa kuzuia HIV kutoa nakala kwa kuinganisha na protease.
en-mt: The drugs were designed to prevent HIV from producing copies by interacting with protease.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: Timu ya watafiti katika Chuo Kikuu cha Colorado wanajaribu kubadilisha dawa hiyo ili kupata chembe ambacho kitaunganisha na protease ya SARS-CoV-2. Kuna ukosoaji katika jamii ya kisayansi kuhusu kuelekeza rasimali za kubadilisha dawa zilizoundwa muhususi kutibu HIV/AIDS.
en-mt: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to change the drug to find a particle that will bind to the SARS-CoV-2 protease. There is criticism in the scientific community about redirecting resources to replace drugs designed to treat HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: WHO ilijumuisha lopinavir/ritonavir katika jaribio la kimataifa la Umoja.
en-mt: WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the International Union trial.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: Remdesivir iliundwa na kukuzwa na Gilead Sciences kama matibabu ya ugonjwa wa virusi vya Ebola na maambukizo ya virusi vya Marburg . Gilead Sciences baadaye iligundua kuwa Remdesivir ilikuwa na shughuli ya kuzuia virusi katika vitro dhidi ya filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, na virusi vya korona.
en-mt: Remdesivir was developed and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infection. Gilead Sciences later found that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and coronaviruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: Suala moja na matibabu ya kuzia virusi ni maedeleo ya upinzani kupitia mabadiliko ambayo yanaweza kusababisha ugonjwa kali na maambukizo.
en-mt: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to severe illness and infection.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: Baadhi ya uchunguzi wa mapema wa remdesivir unaonyesha kuwa inaweza kuwa kizuizi kikubwa cha jenitiki. Kuna majaribio kadhaa ya kliniki yanayoendelea, ikiwemo mbili yanayofanywa na Hospitali za Chuo Kikuu cha Cleveland, moja kwa ajili ya watu wenye magonjwa ya wastani na nyingine kwa watu wenye ugonjwa mkali zaidi.
en-mt: Some early studies of remdesivir suggest that it may be a major genetic inhibitor. There are several clinical trials underway, including two being conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals, one for people with mild to moderate illnesses and the other for people with more severe disease.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: Kuna majaribio matatu ya kiliniki yanayoendelea ya vitamini C ya kupitisha mishipani kwa watu waliolazwa hospitalini na wanaugua sana ugonjwa wa COVID-19;  vipozauongo viwili vilivyodhibitiwa (Uchina, Kanada) na moja kisicho dhibitiwa (Italia).
en-mt: There are three ongoing clinical trials of vitamin C to bypass arteries to people hospitalized and are seriously ill with COVID-19;  two controlled coolers (China, Canada) and one unregulated (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: Jimbo la New York lilianza majaribio ya kiua vijasumu cha azithromycin tarehe 24 Machi 2020.
en-mt: New York State began trials of the azithromycin killer on March 24, 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: Kituo cha Kitaifa cha Afya na Tiba ya Jumuiya huko Japani (NCGM) inapanga jaribio la kliniki la Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), corticosteroid ya kuvuta puani kwa ajili ya pumu, kwa matibabu ya wagonjwa wenye pumu walioambukizwa na virusi vipya vya korona.
en-mt: The National Center for Health and Community Medicine in Japan (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial of Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), a nasal inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of patients with asthma infected with the new coronavirus.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: Dawa ya angiotensin-inayobadilisha kimeng'enya 2, jaribio la awamu ya II na wagonjwa 200 kuandikishwa wenye magonjwa mahututi na waliolazwa hospitalini kutoka Denmark, Ujerumani, na Austria ili kubaini ufanisi wa matibabu hayo.
en-mt: angiotensin-replacement enzyme 2, a phase II trial with 200 critically ill and hospitalized patients from Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: Watafiti kutoka Taasisi ya Moyo huko Montreal kwa sasa wanachunguza jukumu la colchicine katika kupunguza uvimbe na matatizo ya mapafu kwa wagonjwa wenye dalili kazi za COVID-19.
en-mt: Researchers from the Heart Institute in Montreal are currently investigating the role of colchicine in reducing tumours and lung problems in patients with active COVID-19 symptoms.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: Utafiti unaojulikana kama COLCORONA, unaandikisha watu wazima 6000 wenye unmri wa miaka 40 na zaidi ambao wamegunduliwa kuwa na ugonjwa wa COVID-19 na wanaonyesha dalili zisizo kali na hawahitaji kulazwa hospitalini.
en-mt: The study, known as COLCORONA, enrolls 6,000 adults aged 40 years and older who have been diagnosed with COVID-19 and show less severe symptoms and do not need hospitalization.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: Wanawke ambao ni wajawazito au wananyonyesha au ambao hawana njia bora ya upangaji uzazi hawastahiki.
en-mt: Pregnant women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have effective contraception are not eligible.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: Dawa za kuzuia kuganda zinapimwa nchini Italia.
en-mt: Anti-clotting drugs are being tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: Heparin yenye uzito wa chini wa molekuli inatumika sana kutibu wagonjwa, ikisababisha Shirika la Dawa huko Italia kuchapisha miongozo ya matumizi yake.
en-mt: Low-molecular weight heparin is widely used to treat patients, prompting the Medicines Agency in Italy to publish guidelines for its use.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: Utafiti wa vituo anuwai kwa wagonjwa 3000, unaochunguza matumizi ya enoxaparin sodium katika prophylaxis na dawa za matibbau ulitangazwa nchini Italia terehe 14 Aprili.
en-mt: A multi-center study of 3,000 patients investigating the use of enoxaparin sodium in prophylaxis and matibbau drugs was announced in Italy on 14 April.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: Kwa kuwa SARS-CoV-2 ni virusi, uzingatifu mkubwa wa kisayansi umejikita kurudisha dawa za kuzuia virusi ambazo zilikuwa zimetengenezwa kwa ajili ya milipuko ya awali kama vile virusi vya MERS, SARS, na West Nile.
en-mt: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, much scientific attention has been devoted to repurposing antiviral drugs that had been developed for previous outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile viruses.

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Ribavirin: ribavirin ilipendekezwa kwa matibabu ya COVID-19 kulingana na miongozo ya toleo la 7 la Uchina
en-mt: Ribavirin: ribavirin recommended for the treatment of COVID-19 according to the guidelines of the 7th edition of China

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: Umifenovir: umifenovir ilipendekezwa kwa matibabu ya COVID-19 kulingana na miongozo ya toleo la 7 la Uchina
en-mt: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for the treatment of COVID-19 according to the guidelines of the 7th edition of China

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: Dawa zingine za antibiotiki vimegundulikwa kuwa zinaweza kutumika kwa matibabu ya COVID-19:
en-mt: Some antibiotics have been discovered that they can be used for the treatment of COVID-19:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: Tocilizumab (Kipokezi cha anti-IL-6): Imeidhinishwa nchini Uchina.
en-mt: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved in China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: Pia vipimo huko Italia na Uchina. na angaliaTocilizumab#COVID-19.
en-mt: It is also in Italy and China. and seeTocilizumab#COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: Chanjo ya b'A COVID-19 ni chanjo ya kubuni ya kuzuia ugonjwa wa virusi vya korona 2019 (COVID-19).
en-mt: The b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a design vaccine for the prevention of coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: Ingawa hakuna chajo iliyokamilisha majaribio ya kliniki, kuna majaribio kadhaa yanayoendelea ya kuunda chanjo hiyo.
en-mt: Although no batch has completed clinical trials, there are several ongoing attempts to create the vaccine.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: Mwisho wa Februari 2020, Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO) lilisema kuwa halikutarajia chanjo ya kuzuia SARS-CoV-2, virusi vinavyosababisha ugonjwa huo, kupatikana katika kipindi kisichozidi miezi 18.
en-mt: At the end of February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine to prevent SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the disease, to be available in less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: Chanjo tano zilizoteuliwa zilikuwa katika utafiti wa usalami wa Awamu ya I mwezi wa Aprili.
en-mt: Five of the selected vaccines were in a Phase I sequencing study in April.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: COVID-19 ilitambuliwa mwezi wa Desemba 2019.
en-mt: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Mlipuko mkubwa ulioenea duniani kote mwaka wa 2020, na kusababisha uwekezaji mkubwa na shughuli za utafiti wa kutengeneza chanjo.
en-mt: A major outbreak spread worldwide in 2020, resulting in significant investment and research activities to develop vaccines.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: Mashirika mengi yanatumia jenomu zilizochapishwa kutengeneza chanjo zinazowezekana za kuzuia SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Many organizations are using printed genomes to develop possible vaccines to prevent SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: Ilivyotajwa mwezi wa Aprili, mahitaji ya mpango wa CEPI kwa maendeleo ya chanjo ni kasi, uwezo wa utengenezaji, matumizi ya kiwango, na ufikiaji duniani.
en-mt: Stated in April, CEPI's program requirements for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, scale utilization, and global reach.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Mnamo Aprili, wanasayansi wa CEPI waliripoti kuwa majukwaa 10 tofauti ya teknolojia yalikuwa yanafanyiwa utafiti na maendeleo mwanzoni mwa mwaka wa 2020 ili kuunda chanjo inayofaa ya kuzuia COVID-19.
en-mt: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were being researched and developed in early 2020 to develop an effective vaccine to prevent COVID-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: Malengo makuu ya jukwa yaliyoendelea katika utafiti wa usalama wa Awamu ya I yanajumuisha:
en-mt: The main platform objectives advanced in the Phase I safety study include:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: asidi za kiini cha chembe (DNA na RNA) (Mkuzaji wa awamu ya I na chanjo kilichoteuliwa: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
en-mt: particle cell acids (DNA and RNA) (Selected phase I promoter: Moderna, mRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: zana za kuchunguza virusi (Mwendelezaji wa awamu ya I na chajo kilichoteuliwa: CanSino Biologics, virusi vya adeno vya vekta ya aina ya 5).
en-mt: tools for detecting viruses (Phase I developer with designated sequencing: CanSino Biologics, an adeno vector virus of type 5).

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: Kama ilivyoripotiwa na wanasayansi wa CEPI mnamo Aprili, jumla ya chanjo 115 zilizoteuliwa zinafanyiwa maendeleo ya hatua za mwanzo, huku 78 zikithibitishwa kama miradi inayoendelea (79, kulingana na Taasisi ya Milken), na zingine 37 zimetangazwa, lakini kwa maelezo chache yanayopatikana kwa umma (zinadhaniwa kuwa zinapangwa au zinaundwa).
en-mt: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, a total of 115 nominated vaccines are undergoing early-stage development, with 78 confirmed as ongoing projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and another 37 announced, but with few publicly available details (they are thought to be planned or designed).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: Jaribio la Awamu ya I-II inaendesha jaribio ya awali ya usalama na imunogenisiti, kikawaida halifuati utaratibu maalum, hudhibitiwa kupitia placebo na katika maeneo anuwai, huku likibaini dozi sahihi zaidi na faafu.
en-mt: The Phase I-II trial runs an initial safety trial with imunogenisiti, typically not following a specific procedure, is controlled via placebo and at various sites, while determining the most accurate and appropriate doses.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: Kwa kawaida majaribio ya awamu ya III yanahusisha washiriki zaidi, ikiwemo kikundi cha kudhbiti, na kupima ufanisi wa chanjo ya kuzuia ugonjwa huo, wakati ikifuatilia athari mbaya kwa kipimo bora kabisa.
en-mt: Typically phase III trials involve more participants, including the sequencing group, and measure the effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while tracking adverse reactions to the best possible dose.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: Kati ya chanjo 79 zilizoteuliwa zinazofanyiwa maendeleo (zilizothibitishwa mwanzo wa mwezi wa Aprili), chanjo 79 hazikuwa zimetathmniwa kwa mwanadamu (bado katika utafiti "kabla ya upimaji wa kliniki").
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccines selected for development (confirmed at the beginning of April), 79 vaccines were not tested in humans (still in the study "before clinical testing").

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: Mnamo 24 Januari 2020 nchini Australia, Chuo Kikuu cha Queensland kilitangaza kwamba kinafanya uchunguzi wa uwezekano wa chanjo ya kunata molekuli inayoweza kubadilisha kijenetiki protini za virusi ili kuchochea kinga ya mwili.
en-mt: On 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it was conducting a feasibility study of a sticky vaccine that could genetically alter viral proteins to stimulate the body's immune system.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: Tarehe 24 Januari 2020 nchini Kanada, Kituo cha Kimataifa cha Chanjo (VIDO-InterVac) katika Chuo Kikuu cha Saskatchewan kilitanganza kuanza kushughulikia chanjo, kikilenga kuanza upimaji kwa mwadamu mnamo 2021.
en-mt: On January 24, 2020 in Canada, the International Centre for Immunisation (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan began to begin the vaccination process, aiming to begin testing in humans in 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: Miradi ya maendeleo ya chanjo ilitangazwa katika Kituo cha Uchina cha Kudhibiti na Kuzuia Ugonjwa tarehe 26 Januari 2929, na Chuo Kikuu cha Hong Kong tarehe 28 Januari.
en-mt: Vaccine development projects were announced at the China Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2929, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: Tarehe 29, Januari 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, wakiongozwa na Hanneke Schuitemaker, walitangaza kuwa walianza kushughulikia kutengeneza chanjo.
en-mt: On January 29, 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that they had begun working on developing vaccines.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: Janssen inakuza chanjo kwa kushirikiana na washirika wake wa bioteknolojia, Vaxart.
en-mt: Janssen is developing the vaccine in collaboration with its biotechnology partners, Vaxart.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: Tarehe 18 Machi 2020, Emergent BioSolutions ilitangaza ushirikiano wa utengenezaji na Vaxart ili kukuza chanjo hiyo.
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: Tarehe 8 Februari 2020, maabara ya OncoGen kuko Romania ilichapisha karatasi ya muundo wa chanjo na teknolojia sawa na ile iliyotumika kwa tiba ya chanjo cha neoantigen.
en-mt: On 8 February 2020, OncoGen's laboratory in Romania published a paper on vaccine design and technology similar to that used for neoantigen vaccine therapy.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: Tarehe 25 Machi, mkuu wa taasisi ya utafiti alitangaza kuwa wamekamilisha mchanyanyiko wa chanjo na walikuwa wanaanza vipimo.
en-mt: On March 25th, the head of the research institute announced that they had completed a vaccine test and were starting tests.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: Tarehe 27 Februari 2020, kampuni tanzu ya Generex, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, ilitangaza kuwa walikuwa wanaanza mradi wa chanjo wa kuunda chanjo ya Ii-Key peptide ya kuzuia COVID-19.
en-mt: On February 27, 2020, Generex's subsidiary, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced that they were beginning a vaccine project to develop a Ii-Key peptide vaccine to prevent COVID-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: Walitaka kutoa chanjo itakayoteuliwa ambayo ingeweza kupimwa kwa wanadamu "katika kipindi cha siku 90."
en-mt: They wanted to provide a designated vaccine that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Tarehe 5 Machi 2020, Chuo Kikuu cha St. Louis huko Washington kilitangaza miradi yake ya kukuza chanjo.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, St. Louis University in Washington announced its vaccine development projects.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: Tarehe 5 Machi 2020, Jeshi la Marekani la Utafiti wa Matibabu na Jeshi la Materiel huko Fort Detrick na Taasisi ya Utafiti ya Jeshi la  Walter Reed huko in Silver Spring, yote magharibi mwa Maryland, walitangaza kuwa wanashughulikia chanjo.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the U.S. Army Medical Research and Army Materiel at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Research Institute in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on vaccines.

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: Tarehe 10 Machi 2020, Emergent Biosolutions ilitangaza kuwa wameshirikiana na Novavax Inc.
en-mt: On March 10, 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that they have partnered with Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: kukuza na kutengeneza chanjo.
en-mt: Develop and develop vaccines.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: Washirika hao walitangaza zaidi mipango ya vipimo vya kiliniki kwa wanyama na Awamu ya 1 ya kipimo cha kipimo kabla ya Julai 2020.
en-mt: The partners further announced plans for clinical doses for animals and Phase 1 dose regimens before July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: Tarehe 12 Machi 2020, Wizara ya Afya ya India ilitangaza kuwa wanafanya kazi na watu 11 waliojitenga, na kwamba hata wakifuatilia haraka itachukua angalau muda wa mwaka mmoja na nusu hadi miaka mbili kutengeneza chanjo.
en-mt: On 12 March 2020, India's Ministry of Health announced that they were working with 11 people in isolation, and that even if they follow up quickly it would take at least a year and a half to two years to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: Tarehe 12 Machi 2020, Medicago, kampuni ya bioteknolojia katika Jiji la Quebec, iliripoti maendeleo ya chembe kama ya virusi vya korona chini ya ufadhili wa sehemi kutoka kwa Taasisi za Kanada za Utafiti wa Afya.
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, reported the development of coronavirus-like particles under sehemi funding from the Canadian Institutes of Health Research.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: Mtahiniwa wa chanjo ako katika utafiti wa maabara, na mpango wa kupima mwanadamu umepangwa mwezi wa Julai au Agosti 2020.
en-mt: The vaccine candidate is in a lab study, and a human testing program is scheduled for July or August 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: Mapema wiki hiyo, The Guardian iliripoti kwamba Rais wa Marekani Donald Trumo alitoa CureVac, "kiwango kikubwa cha fedha kwa ajili ya ufikiaji wa kipekee wa chanjo ya Covid-19", ambayo serikali ya Ujerumani ilipinga.
en-mt: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that US President Donald Trumo offered CureVac, "a large sum of money for exclusive access to the Covid-19 vaccine", which the German government opposed.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: Tarehe 17 Machi 2020, Kampuni ya Marekani ya Bidhaa za famasia Pfizer ilitangaza ushirikiano na kampuni ya Ujerumani ya BioNTech ili kwa pamoja kuunda chanjo inayotegemea mRNA.
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, U.S. pharmacist Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop an mRNA-based vaccine.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: Chanjo iliyoteuliwa inayotegeme mRNA, BN162, kwa sasa inapimwa kwa wanyama na vipimo hivyo vya kliniki vinatarajiwa kuanza mwezi wa Aprili 2020.
en-mt: The designated mRNA-based vaccine, BN162, is currently being tested in animals and those clinical tests are expected to begin in April 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: Huko Italia tarehe 17 Machi 2020, Takis Biotech, kampuni ya bioteknolojia ya Italia ilitangaza kuwa watakuwa na matokeo vipimo kwa wanyama mwezi wa Aprili 2020 na chanjo ya mwisho iliyoteuliwa inaweza kuanza kufanyiwa vipimo wakati wa majira ya kupuputika kwa majani.
en-mt: In Italy on March 17, 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotechnology company announced that they will have results tested on animals in April 2020 and the last vaccine designated can begin testing during the spring of leaf shedding.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: Huko Ufaransa tarehe 19 Machi 2020, Mseto wa Uvumbuzi wa Matayarisho ya Magonjwa ya Mlipuko (CEPI) ulitangaza uwekezaji wa dola milioni 4.9 katika ubia wa utafiti wa chanjo ya COVID-19 unaohusisha Taasisi ya Pasteur, Themis Biosciece (Vienna, Austria), na Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh, na kuleta uwekezaji wa jumla wa CEPI wa maendeleo ya chanjo ya COVID-19 kuwa dola milioni 29.
en-mt: In France on March 19, 2020, the Coalition for Disease Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a $4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research joint venture involving the Pasteur Institute, Themis Biosciece (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment of COVID-19 vaccine development to $29 million.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: Washirika wengine wa uwekezaji wa CEPI kwa ajili ya maendeleo ya chanjo ya COVID-19 ni Modema, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, Chuo Kikuu cha Hong Kong, Chuo Kikuu cha Oxford, Chuo Kikuu cha Queensland.
en-mt: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Modema, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, University of Hong Kong, University of Oxford, University of Queensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: Tarehe 20 Machi 2020, maafisa wa afya wa Urusi walitangaza kuwa wanasayansi wameanza upimaji wa wanyama kwa kutumia chanjo sita zilizoteuliwa.
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists had begun animal testing using six designated vaccines.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: Watafiti wa chuo cha Imperial huko London walitangaza mnamo tarehe 20 Machi 2020 kuwa wanakuza chanjo cha RNA yenye nguvu zaidi kwa ajili ya COVID-19.
en-mt: Researchers at Imperial College London announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a more potent RNA vaccine for COVID-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: Chanjo iliyoteuliwa iliandaliwa ndani ya siku 14 za kupokea utaratibu kutoka nchi ya Uchina.
en-mt: The selected vaccine was prepared within 14 days of receiving the procedure from China.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: Mwisho wa mwezi wa Machi, serikali ya Kanada ilitangaza dola milioni 275 ya kufadhili miradi 96 ya utafiti wa upimaji wa matibabu dhidi ya COVID-19, ikiwemo chanjo kadhaa zilizoteuliwa katika kampuni na vyuo vikuu vya Kanada, kama vile mipango ya Medicago na Chuo Kikuu cha Saskatchewan.
en-mt: At the end of March, the Canadian government announced $275 million to fund 96 medical testing research projects against COVID-19, including several vaccines designated at Canadian companies and universities, such as Medicago and University of Saskatchewan programs.

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: Wakati huohuo, serikali ya Kanada ilitangaza dola milioni 192 ya kukuza chanjo ya COVID-19 pekee, ikiwa na mipango ya kuanzisha "benki ya chanjo" ya kitaifa ya chanjo mpya kadhaa ambayo inaweza kutumika ikiwa mlipuko mwingine wa virusi vya korona itatokea.
en-mt: Meanwhile, the Canadian government announced $192 million to develop a COVID-19 vaccine alone, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" for several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: Tarehe 2 Aprili 2020, watafiti wa Chuo Kikuu cha Pittsburgh cha Shule ya Tiba iliripoti kupima PittCoVacc, chanjo inayowezekana ya COVID-19 katika panya, ikisema kuwa "MNA ilitoa chanjo ndogo za SARS-CoV-2 S1 ilishawishi antijeni yenye nguvu-majibu maalum ya kingamwili [ndani ya panya] ambayo yalionekana wazo kuanzia wiki 2 baada ya chanjo."
en-mt: On April 2, 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported testing PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA immunizations limited SARS-CoV-2 S1 vaccines induce a potent antigen—a specific antibody response [in mice] that appeared to be thought beginning 2 weeks after vaccination."

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: Huko Kanada tarehe 16 Aprili 2020, Chuo Kikuu cha Waterloo cha Shule ya Kusomea Dawa ilitangaza muundo wa chanjo iliyoteuliwa inayotegemea DNA kama dawa ya kinyunyizio cha pua inayowezekana.
en-mt: In Canada on April 16, 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Medicine announced the design of a designated DNA-based vaccine as a possible nasal spray.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: Kutumia bacteriophages, DNA itatengenezwa kutoka nakala ndani ya bakteria ya mwanadamu ili kutoa chembe kama virusi zisizodhuru, ambazo zinaweza kuchochea mfumo wa kinga kutoa kinga mwili dhidi ya virusi vya SARS-CoV-2.
en-mt: Using bacteriophages, DNA will be made from copies inside human bacteria to render virus-like particles harmless, which can stimulate the immune system to provide antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: Mwezi wa Machi 2020, serikali, tasnia, na vyuo vikuu vitatu vya Marekani vilitoa rasilimali ya kufikia tarakilishikuu kutoka IBM, pamoja na rasilimali za kutoa huduma za kompyuta kutoka kwa Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, na Google.
en-mt: In March 2020, the government, industry, and three U.S. universities released computer access resources from IBM, as well as resources to provide computer services from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: Chanjo zingine zina athari tofauti, pia hujulikana kama athari zisizo maalum.
en-mt: Some vaccines have different side effects, also known as non-specific side effects.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: Hiyo inamaanisha kuwa zinaweza kuwa na manufaa zaidi ya ugonjwa ambao zinazuia.
en-mt: That means they can be more beneficial than the disease they prevent.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: Jaribio zaidi zisizokuwa na utaratibu maalum huko Australia inatafuta kuajiri wafanyakazi 4,170 wa huduma ya afya.
en-mt: A further non-specific trial in Australia seeks to recruit 4,170 health care workers.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: Inawezekana kuwa chanjo zinazokuzwa hazikuwa salama au hazitaleta matokeo yanayotarajiwa.
en-mt: It is possible that the vaccines being promoted were not safe or would not produce the expected results.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: Utafiti wa mapema wa kutathmini ufanisi wa chanjo kwa kutumia mifamo maalum ya covid-19 ya wananyama, kama vile ACE2 yenye jeni kutoka kwa panya, wanyama wengine wa maabara, na chembe zingine zisizo za kibinadamu, unaonyesha hitaji za hatua za uzuizi wa kiwango cha 3 cha usalama wa chembe za kuambukiza, na uratibu wa kimataifa ili kuhakikisha taratibu sanifu za usalama.
en-mt: Early research evaluating vaccine efficacy using specific covid-19 mutations of mutants, such as ACE2 containing genes from mice, other laboratory animals, and other nonhuman particles, highlights the need for measures for Level 3 prevention of infectious particulate matter safety, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: Chanjo dhidi ya SARS na MARS zimepimwa katika mifano ya wanyama isiyo ya kibinadamu.
en-mt: Vaccines against SARS and MARS have been tested in non-human animal models.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: Kufikia 2020, hakuna tiba au chanjo ya kulinda dhidi ya SARS ambazo zimeonyeshwa kuwa salama na kulera matokeo yanayotarajiwa kwa binadamu.
en-mt: As of 2020, there are no treatments or vaccines to protect against SARS that have been shown to be safe and to withstand the expected results in humans.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: Kulingana na makaratasi ya utafiti yaliyochapishwa mwaka 2005 na 2006, utambuzi na ukuaji wa chanjo na dawa mpya za kutibu SARS ulikuwa suala la kipaumbele kwa serikali na mashirika ya afya ya umma kote duniani. Pia hakuna chanjo iliyothibitishwa dhidi ya MERS.
en-mt: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and growth of new vaccines and drugs to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world. There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: Wakati MARS ilianza kuenea, iliaminika kuwa utafiti uliopo wa SARS unaweza kutoa kiolezo muhimu cha kukuza chanjo na matibabu dhidi ya maambukizo ya MERS-CoV.
en-mt: When MARS first began to spread, it was believed that existing SARS research could provide a useful template for developing vaccines and treatments against MERS-CoV infections.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: Hadi Machi2020, kulikuwa na chanjo moja ya MERS (inayotegemea DNA) iliyokamilisha majaribio ya awamu ya I ya kliniki kwa wanadamu, na zingine tatu zinaendelea, zote ambazo ni chanjo ya kuzuia virusi, virusi viwili ya DNA (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), na MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
en-mt: As of March2020, there was one MERS (DNA-based) vaccine completing phase I clinical trials in humans, with three others underway, all of which are anti-viral vaccines, two DNA viruses (ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac), and MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: Machapisho ya mitandao ya kijamii imekuza nadharia ya kihasidi inayodai kuwa virusi vinavyosababisha COVID-19 vilijulikana na kwamba chanjo ilikuwa tayari inapatikana.
en-mt: Social media posts have promoted a nefarious theory claiming that the virus that causes COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: Haki miliki zilizotajwa na machapisho mbalimbali ya mitandao ya kijamii zinarejelea haki miliki zilizopo za mfululizo wa kijentiki na chanjo kwa aina nyingine ya virusi vya korona kama vile virusi vya korona vya SARS.
en-mt: The copyrights cited by various social media posts refer to existing patents for genetic and vaccine series for other types of coronavirus, such as the SARS coronavirus.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: Ugonjwa wa virusi vya korona 2019 (COVID-19) ni ugonjwa wa kuambukiza unaosababishwa na virusi vya korona vya ugonjwa mkali wa matatizo ya kupumua (SARS-CoV-2).
en-mt: Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by the novel coronavirus of severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS-CoV-2).

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Dalili za kawaida zinajumuisha homa, kukohoa, na matatizo ya kupumua.
en-mt: Common symptoms include fever, coughing, and breathing difficulties.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: Dalili zingine zinaweza kujumuisha uchovu, maumivu ya misuli, kuhara, vidonda vya koo, kupoteza hisia ya kuhisi harufu, na maumivu ya tumbo.
en-mt: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of sense of smell, and abdominal pain.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: Kuanzia muda wa kuambukizwa na dalili kuonekana kwa kwaida ni karibu siku tano lakini inaweza kuanzia siku ya pili au ya kumi na nne.
en-mt: The time of infection and symptoms is around five days but can start on the second or fourteenth day.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: Wakati idadi kubwa ya visa husababisha dalili kali, baadhi huendeleza kuwa nimonia ya virusi au viungo anuwai viache kufanya kazi.
en-mt: While the vast majority of cases cause mild symptoms, some develop into viral pneumonia or the various organs stop functioning.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: Kufikia tarehe 17 Aprili 2020, zaidi ya visa milioni 2.24 vimeripotiwa katika mataifa na himaya 210, na kusababisha zaidi ya vifo 153,000.
en-mt: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported in 210 nations and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: Zaidi ya watu 568,000 wamepona. Virusi hivi husambazwa hasa kati watu wanaotangamana kwa karibu, mara nyingi kupitia matone madogo yanayotolewa wakati wanakukohoa, kupiga chafya, au kuongea.
en-mt: More than 568,000 people have recovered. The virus is mainly spread between people who are in close contact, often through small droplets released when they cough, sneeze, or talk.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: Ingawa matone haya yanazalishwa unapomua nje, huwa yanaanguka kwenye sakafu au kwenye maeneo  kuliko kuambukizana katika umbali wa mita mirefu.
en-mt: Although these droplets are produced when you are outside, they tend to fall on the floor or in places rather than infect each other at a long distance of a meter.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: Pia watu wanaweza kuambukizwa kwa kugusa eneo lililoambukizwa na kisha kugusa macho, pua, au mdomo wao.
en-mt: People can also be infected by touching an infected area and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: Virusi hivyo vinaweza kuishi kwenye maeneo hadi saa 72.
en-mt: The virus can live in places up to 72 hours.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: Inaambukizwa zaidi katika kipindi cha siku tatu za kwanza baada ya dalili  kuonekana, ingawa kuenea kwake kunawezekana kabla ya dalili kuonekana na katika hatua za baadaye za ugonjwa.Mbinu ya kawaida ya kuchunguza kubadilishwa kwa muda halisi kwa manukuu ya msururu wa polimerasi (rRT-PCR) kutoka kwa chembe zinazotolewa puani.
en-mt: It is most contagious in the first three days after symptoms appear, although its spread is possible before symptoms appear and in the later stages of the disease. A standard technique for detecting real-time modification of polimerasi sequence substitutions (rRT-PCR) from particles emitted in the nose.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: Watu wanaoshuku kuwa na virusi na walezi wao wanapendekezwa kumtumia barakoa.
en-mt: People who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers are recommended to send them masks.

sourceString: Recommendations for mask use by the general public vary, with some authorities recommending against their use, some recommending their use, and others requiring their use.
targetString: Mapendekezo ya umma kwa jumla kuvaa barakoa yanatofautiana, huku baadhi ya mamlaka zikipendekeza kutotumika kwao, baadhi zikipendekeza zitumike na zingine zikitaka watu wazitumie.
en-mt: Recommendations for the general public to wear masks vary, with some authorities recommending their non-use, some recommending they be used and others calling for people to use them.

sourceString: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific antiviral treatment for COVID-19.
targetString: Kwa sasa, hakuna chanjo au tiba maalum ya kukinga virusi vya COVID-19.
en-mt: Currently, there is no vaccine or specific therapy to protect against COVID-19.

sourceString: Local transmission of the disease has been recorded in most countries across all six WHO regions.
targetString: Maambukizo ya ndani ya ugonjwa huo umeripotiwa katika nchi nyingi kwa maeneo yote sita ya WHO.
en-mt: Locally transmitted infections have been reported in many countries for all six WHO regions.

sourceString: Those infected with the virus may be asymptomatic or develop flu-like symptoms such as fever, cough, fatigue, and shortness of breath.
targetString: Walioambukizwa na virusi hivyo wanaweza kosa kuhusi dalili au kuonyesha dalili kama za mafua kama vile homa, uchovu, na matatizo ya kupumua.
en-mt: Those infected with the virus may mistake symptoms or show flu-like symptoms such as fever, fatigue, and respiratory problems.

sourceString: Emergency symptoms include difficulty breathing, persistent chest pain or pressure, confusion, difficulty waking, and bluish face or lips; immediate medical attention is advised if these symptoms are present.
targetString: Dalili za dharura zinajumuisha matatizo ya kupumua, maumivu au shinikizo inayoendelea kwenye kifua, kuchanganyikiwa, matatizo ya kutembea, na uso au mdomo wa rangi ya samawati; inashauriwa kutafuta matibabu ikiwa dalili hizi zipo.
en-mt: Emergency signs include breathing difficulties, pain or persistent pressure on the chest, confusion, difficulty walking, and a pale face or mouth; It is recommended to seek medical attention if these symptoms are present.

sourceString: Less commonly, upper respiratory symptoms such as sneezing, runny nose or sore throat may be seen.
targetString: Zisizo kawaida; dalili katika sehemu ya juu ya kupumua kama vile kupiga chafya, kamasi puani au maumivu ya koo yanaweza kuonekana.
en-mt: The Unusual; Symptoms in the upper respiratory area such as sneezing, mucus in the nose or throat pain can be seen.

sourceString: Gastrointestinal symptoms such as nausea, vomiting and diarrhoea have been observed in varying percentages.
targetString: Dalili kwenye tumbo kama vile kichefuchefu, kutapika, kuhara zimeonekana katika asilimia tofauti.
en-mt: Symptoms in the stomach such as nausea, vomiting, diarrhea have been seen in different percentages.

sourceString: Some cases in China initially presented only with chest tightness and palpitations.
targetString: Visa vingine nchini Uchina vilionyesha mkazo kifuani na mapapatiko wa moyo pekee.
en-mt: Other cases in China showed chest stress and heart failure alone.

sourceString: In some, the disease may progress to pneumonia, multi-organ failure, and death.
targetString: Katika visa vingine, ugonjwa unaweza kuendelea kuwa nimonia, viungo anuwai kutofanya kazi na kifo.
en-mt: In some cases, the disease can develop into pneumonia, various organs not functioning and death.

sourceString: This is called the incubation period.
targetString: Hii inajulikana kama kipindi cha kupevuka.
en-mt: This is known as the ripening period.

sourceString: The incubation period for COVID-19 is typically five to six days but may range from two to 14 days.
targetString: Kipindi cha kupevuka cha COVID-19 kwa kawaida ni siku tano hadi sita lakini kinaweza kuanzia ya pili au kumi na nne.
en-mt: The COVID-19 maturation period is usually five to six days but can start from the second or fourteenth.

sourceString: 97.5% of people who develop symptoms will do so within 11.5 days of infection.Reports indicate that not all who are infected develop symptoms.
targetString: Asilimia 97.5 ya watu ambao wanaonyesha dalili wataonyesha ndani ya siku 11.5 baada ya kuambukizwa. Ripiti zinaonyesha kuwa sio wote walioambukizwa wataonyesha dalili.
en-mt: 97.5% of people who show symptoms will show within 11.5 days of infection. Ripiti suggests that not all infected people will show symptoms.

sourceString: The role of these asymptomatic carriers in transmission is not yet fully known; however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the spread of the disease.
targetString: Jukumu la waenezaji hawa wasioonyesha dalili katika maambukizo bado halijulikani kabisa, hata hivyo, ushahidi wa awali unaonyesha kuwa wanaweza kuchangia kwa usambazaji wa ugonjwa.
en-mt: The role of these non-symptomatic spreaders in infection is not yet fully known, however, preliminary evidence suggests that they may contribute to the transmission of the disease.

sourceString: The proportion of infected people who do not display symptoms is currently unknown and being studied, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20% of all confirmed cases remained asymptomatic during their hospital stay.
targetString: Uwiano wa watu walioambukizwa amabao hawaonyeshi dalili haujulikani kwa sasa na unafanyiwa utafiti, na Vituo vya Korea vya Udhibiti na Uzuizi wa Ugonjwa (KCDC) vikiripoti kwa asilimia 20 ya watu wote waliothibitishwa waliendelea kukosa kuonyesha dalili wakiwa hospitalini.
en-mt: The proportion of people infected with symptoms is currently unknown and under study, with the Korea Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (KCDC) reporting that 20 percent of all confirmed people continued to show no symptoms while in hospital.

sourceString: China's National Health Commission began including asymptomatic cases in its daily cases on 1 April; of the 166 infections on that day, 130 (78%) were asymptomatic at the time of testing.
targetString: Tume ya Kitaifa ya Afya ya Uchina ilianza kujumuisha watu wasioonyesha dalili katika visa vyao vya kila siku tarehe 1 Aprili; watu 166 walioambukizwa siku hiyo, watu 130 (asilimia 78) hawakuonyesha dalili wakati wa kupimwa.
en-mt: China's National Health Commission began including people who show no symptoms in their daily cases on April 1; Of the 166 people infected that day, 130 people (78 percent) showed no symptoms when tested.

sourceString: Both sputum and saliva can carry large viral loads.
targetString: Kohozi na mate yanaweza kuwa na viwango vikubwa vya virusi,
en-mt: Cough and saliva can have high levels of virus,

sourceString: Loud talking releases more droplets than normal talking.
targetString: Kuzungumza kwa sauti kunatema matone mengi kuliko kuzungumza kawaida.
en-mt: Talking aloud spits out more drops than speaking normally.

sourceString: A study in Singapore found that an uncovered cough can lead to droplets travelling up to 4.5 meters (15 feet).
targetString: Utafiti huko Singapoo ulionyesha kuwa kukohoa bila kujifunika kunaweza kusababisha matone kwenda hadi mita 4.5 (futi 15).
en-mt: Research in Singapoo showed that coughing without covering can cause droplets to go up to 4.5 metres (15ft).

sourceString: Though the virus is not generally airborne, the National Academy of Science has suggested that bioaerosol transmission may be possible and air collectors positioned in the hallway outside of people's rooms yielded samples positive for viral RNA.
targetString: Ingawa kwa kawaida virusi hivyo haviwezi kusambazwa hewani, Chuo cha Kitaifa cha Sayansi kimependekeza kuwa inawezekena kuambukiza kupitia chembechembe za hewa na vikusanya hewa vilivyo katika njia nje ya vyumba vya watu vilikuwa na sampuli chanya za virusi vya RNA.
en-mt: Although the virus normally cannot be transmitted in the air, the National Academy of Sciences has suggested it is possible to infect through airborne particulates and air collectors located in channels outside people's rooms had positive viral RNA samples.

sourceString: Some medical procedures such as intubation and cardiopulmonary resuscitation (CPR) may cause respiratory secretions to be aerosolised and thus result in airborne spread.
targetString: Baadhi ya taratibu za kimatibabu kama vile kuingiza tubu na kufufua moyo na mapafu (CPR) kunaweza kusababisha majimaji ya pumu kugeuzwa kuwa hewa na hivyo kusababisha maenezi kupitia hewa.
en-mt: Some medical procedures such as intubation and heart and lung recovery (CPR) can cause asthmatic fluid to be turned into air, causing it to spread through the air.

sourceString: While there are concerns it may spread via feces, this risk is believed to be low.The virus is most contagious when people are symptomatic; while spread may be possible before symptoms emerge, the risk is low.
targetString: Ijapokuwa kuna wasiwasi ya kuwa inaweza kuenezwa kupitia kinyesi, hatari hii inaaminika kuwa ya chini. Virusi hivyo vinaweza kuambukizwa sana wakati watu wanaonyesha dalili; ijapokuwa maambukizo yanawezekana kabla ya dalili kuonekana, hatari yake ni ndogo.
en-mt: Although there are concerns that it can be spread through feces, this risk is believed to be low. The virus can be highly contagious when people show symptoms; Although infection is possible before symptoms appear, its risk is low.

sourceString: The European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) says while it is not entirely clear how easily the disease spreads, one person generally infects two to three others.The virus survives for hours to days on surfaces.
targetString: Kituo cha Ulaya cha Kuzia na Kudhibiti Ugonjwa (ECDC) kinasema ijapokuwa haijulikani wazi jinsi ugonjwa huo unaenea, mtu mmoja kwa ujumla huambukiza wengine wawili au watatu. Virusi hivyo hukaa juu ya maenea kwa saa hadi siku kadhaa.
en-mt: The European Centre for Disease Control and Control (ECDC) says although it is unclear how the disease spreads, one person generally infects two or three others. The virus stays on top of the spreads for hours to days.

sourceString: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, for up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and for up to four hours on 99% copper.
targetString: Hasa, virusi hivyo vilipatikana kuwa vinaweza kugunduliwa kwa siku moja kwenye  kadibodi, hadi siku tatu kwenye plastiki (polypropylene) na chuma cha pua (AISI 304), na hadi saa nne kwenye shaba ya asilimia 99.
en-mt: Specifically, the virus was found to be detectable for one day on cardboard, up to three days on plastic (polypropylene) and stainless steel (AISI 304), and up to four hours on 99 percent copper.

sourceString: This, however, varies depending on the humidity and temperature.
targetString: Hii, hata hivyo, inatofautinana kulingana na unyevu na joto.
en-mt: This, however, differs depending on humidity and temperature.

sourceString: Soap and detergent are also effective if correctly used; soap products degrade the virus' fatty protective layer, deactivating it, as well as freeing them from skin and other surfaces.
targetString: Sabuni na dawa ya kusafisha pia ni bora ikiwa inatumika vizuri; bidhaa za sabuni hudhoofisha safu ya kinga ya mafuta ya virusi, ikilemaza nguvu yake, na pia kuvitoa kutoa kwa ngozi na maeneo mengine.
en-mt: Soap and cleaning spray are also effective if used properly; Soap products weaken the protective layer of viral oil, eroding its strength, as well as releasing them to the skin and other areas.

sourceString: Other solutions, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical disinfectant), are less effective.In a Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken a median of two days after the start of hospitalization.
targetString: Uoevu mwingine, kama vile benzalkonium chloride na chlorhexidine gluconate (kemikali ya upasuaji), hazifanyi kazi vizuri. Katika utafiti huko Hong Kong study, sampuli za mate zilichukuliwa kwa wastani wa siku mbili baada ya kuanza kulazwa hospitalini.
en-mt: Other liquids, such as benzalkonium chloride and chlorhexidine gluconate (a surgical chemical), do not work well. In a study in Hong Kong study, saliva samples were taken an average of two days after starting hospitalization.

sourceString: In five of six patients, the first sample showed the highest viral load, and the sixth patient showed the highest viral load on the second day tested.
targetString: Miongoni mwa wagonjwa sita, sampuli ya kwanza ilionyesha kiwango cha juu zaidi cha virusi na mgonjwa wa sita alionyesha kiwango cha juu zaidi cha virusi siku ya pili ya kupimwa.
en-mt: Among the six patients, the first sample showed the highest level of virus and the sixth patient showed the highest level of virus on the second day of testing.

sourceString: Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is a novel severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus, first isolated from three people with pneumonia connected to the cluster of acute respiratory illness cases in Wuhan.
targetString: Ugonjwa kali wa matatizo ya kupumua, virusi vya korona (SARS-CoV-2) ni virusi vipya vya korona vya matatizo kali ya kupumua,
en-mt: Severe acute respiratory syndrome, coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) is a new coronavirus of severe respiratory problems,

sourceString: All features of the novel SARS-CoV-2 virus occur in related coronaviruses in nature.
targetString: Vipengele vyote vya virusi vipya vya SARS-CoV-2 hujitokeza katika virusi vinavyohusiana na korona kwa asili.
en-mt: All aspects of the new SARS-CoV-2 virus appear in coronaviruses related in nature.

sourceString: Outside the human body, the virus is killed by household soap, which bursts its protective bubble.SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.
targetString: Nje ya mwili wa mwanadamu, virusi hivyo huuliwa na sabani ya kutumiwa nyumbani, ambayo hupasua kiputo chake cha kinga. SARS-CoV-2 inahusiana sana na SARS-CoV ya asili.
en-mt: Outside of the human body, the virus is killed by a home-grown fungus, which bursts its immune bubble. SARS-CoV-2 is closely related to the original SARS-CoV.

sourceString: The lungs are the organs most affected by COVID-19 because the virus accesses host cells via the enzyme angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2), which is most abundant in the type II alveolar cells of the lungs.
targetString: Mapafu ndiyo viungo vinavyoathirika zaidi na COVID-19 kwa sababu virusi hufikia seli zinazobeba virusi kupitia enzaimu angiotensin-inayogeuza enzaimu 2 (ACE2), ambayo hupatikana kwa wingi kwenye seli za II alveolar za mapafu.
en-mt: The lungs are the most susceptible organs to COVID-19 because the virus reaches virus-carrying cells through enzaimu angiotensin-converting enzaimu 2 (ACE2), which is found in abundance in the II alveolar cells of the lungs.

sourceString: The virus uses a special surface glycoprotein called a "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the host cell.
targetString: Virusi hivyo hutumia glikoprotini maalum ya maeneo inayojulikana kama "spike" (peplomer) ili kuungana na ACE2 na kuingia kwenye seli enyeji.
en-mt: The virus uses a specific glikoprotein of the regions known as the "spike" (peplomer) to connect to ACE2 and enter the cells.

sourceString: Acute cardiac injury was found in 12% of infected people admitted in hospital in Wuhan, China, and is more frequent in severe disease.
targetString: Jeraha kali la moyo ulipatikana katika asilimia 12 ya watu walioambukizwa na kulazwa hospitalini huko Wuhan, Uchina, na linatukia sana katika ugonjwa kali.
en-mt: Severe heart injury was found in 12 percent of people infected and hospitalized in Wuhan, China, and is most common in severe disease.

sourceString: Rates of cardiovascular symptoms is high, owing to the systemic inflammatory response and immune system disorders during disease progression, but acute myocardial injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.
targetString: Viwango vya dalili za ugonjwa wa moyo ni ya juu, kwa sababu ya ugonjwa wa mfumo wa kujibu uchochezi na mfumo wa kinga wakati wa maendeleo ya ugonjwa huo, lakini jeraha kali la ukuta wa moyo unaweza pia unahusiana na vipokezi za ACE2 moyoni.
en-mt: Rates of heart disease symptoms are high, due to the disease of the inflammatory response system and immune system during the development of the disease, but severe heart wall injury may also be related to ACE2 receptors in the heart.

sourceString: ACE2 receptors are highly expressed in the heart and are involved in heart function.
targetString: Vipokezi vya ACE2 vinaonekana sana moyoni na vinahusika na utendakazi wa moyo.
en-mt: ACE2 receptors are highly visible in the heart and are responsible for cardiac functioning.

sourceString: A high incidence of thrombosis (31%) and venous thromboembolism (25%) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and may be related to poor prognosis.Autopsies of people who died of COVID-19 have found diffuse alveolar damage (DAD), and lymphocyte-containing inflammatory infiltrates within the lung.
targetString: Visa vingi vya mvulio moyoni (asilimia 31) na damu kuanza kuganda kwenye mshipa (asilimia 25) umepatikana kwa wagonjwa wa ICU wenye maambukizo ya COVID-19 na yanaweza kuhusishwa na ubashiri mbaya. Uchunguzi wa maiti ya watu ambao walikufa kwa sababu ya COVID-19 umepata maabadiliko maalum kwa sababu ya ugonjwa huo (DAD), na chembe za limfu-zenye mipenyezo kwenye uvimbe ndani ya mapafu.
en-mt: Multiple cases of heart fungus (31 percent) and blood start to clot in the vein (25 percent) have been found in ICU patients with COVID-19 infections and can be attributed to a poor prognosis. Tests of the corpses of people who died due to COVID-19 have found specific changes in the cause of the disease (DAD), and the lymph-positive particles in tumors inside the lungs.
